Hotels: Majestic 4BR/4BATH apartment in Sagrada Familia area
Full_Descriptions:
Situated in Barcelona, 800 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.6 km from La Pedrera, Majestic 4BR/4BATH apartment in Sagrada Familia area features spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property has city views and is 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.3 km from Casa Batllo.

This apartment has 4 bedrooms, a kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 4 bathrooms fitted with a bidet.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 15 km from Majestic 4BR/4BATH apartment in Sagrada Familia area, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

Situated in Barcelona, in the Gracia district, 1 km from Park Güell, Sonder l Le Palacete features an interior garden and courtyard.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Some units feature a seating area and a private terrace. You will find a coffee machine in the room. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Sonder l Le Palacete features free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers contact-free check-in and 24/7 virtual support which limits in-person interaction.

Sagrada Familia is 1.3 km from Sonder l Le Palacete, while La Pedrera is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Sonder l Le Palacete.

This pleasant guest house is set behind La Boqueria Market, 100 metres from Las Ramblas. It offers bright rooms, a free Wi-Fi zone and 24-hour reception.

La Palmera’s air-conditioned rooms feature smart decor and laminate floors. All have a sink and bathrooms are shared or private. Sheets and towels are included.

The guest house offers coffee, tea and cold drinks for sale at reception. There are numerous bars, restaurants and shops within 2 minutes’ walk and Plaza Real Square is 300 metres away.

Hostal la Palmera is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral in the Gothic Quarter, while Gaudi’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 20 minutes’ walk away.

Hostal la Palmera is 2 minutes’ walk from Liceu Metro Station. Direct buses to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from Plaza Catalunya Square, 600 metres away and Port Vell is 10 minutes’ away by foot

Hotel Alimara is a modern hotel located in Barcelona’s Horta district. It has a central garden, several meeting rooms, rooms with flat-screen TVs, and a fitness centre.

All rooms at the Alimara Hotel have both air conditioning and heating. They all have a private bathroom with hairdryer.

The Alimara’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food with a modern twist and there are children’s menus available. The hotel bar, SUMMUM, features a terrace and serves food, drinks and snacks.

The hotel is located 1 minutes' walk from Mundet Metro Station, and it is a 12-minute journey into central Barcelona. Gaudí’s iconic Parc Güell is 4 Metro stops away from Mundet.

Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the Atenas Catalonia has a rooftop swimming pool, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and Sagrada Familia. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath.

The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge with complimentary water, and satellite TV.

The hotel's buffet breakfast features a show kitchen. There is a snack bar and guests can enjoy stunning city views from the pool, set on the 11th floor.

The Sagrada Familia is just over one kilometre from the hotel, while Glòries shopping centre can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.

The Catalonia Atenas has a convenient left luggage service, on-site parking, and is 2 minutes’ walk from Clot Metro Station; and 200 metres from Clot Train Station; here you can take a direct train to Barcelona Airport.

Acta CITY47 is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Train Station and 15 minutes from the Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

The rooms at Acta CITY47 feature simple, modern décor and a private bathroom. Each one comes with a TV, free safe, and a work desk. Guests have free access to an ironing room open 24 hours.

The hotel’s modern Nass City restaurant serves international food and a gluten-free breakfast is available on prior request. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink.

The Acta CITY47 is 20 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. Sants Metro Station connects you with the centre of Barcelona in 15 minutes.

Avinyo 1 in Barcelona offers accommodation with free WiFi, 1.8 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 1.9 km from Barceloneta Beach and 200 metres from Plaça Reial. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya, and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 1.8 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

Towels and bed linen are offered in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Cathedral of Barcelona, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Avinyo 1.

Well situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Hotel Sansi Barcelona is set 600 metres from Plaça Catalunya, 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 500 metres from Casa Batllo. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Sansi Barcelona include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

A 15-minute walk from Gaudí's Sagrada Família, Catalonia Sagrada Familia is just 300 metres from Clot Metro and Train Station. It features a restaurant, a seasonal outdoor pool and a gym.

The Catalonia Sagrada Familia features traditional, bright décor and its rooms are have a desk, a mini fridge with complimentary water and a safety deposit box. Free Wi-Fi access is available.
All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

The restaurant serves a range of Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine, as well as a buffet breakfast. The café-bar offers a selection of drinks and snacks throughout the day and there is also a bar.

Car hire is available on site, and staff at the Catalonia Sagrada Familia’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona and its many attractions. The hotel is 200 metres from the Torre Agbar Tower.

Clot Metro Station connects guests to the city centre in 4 stops and the airport train also stops here.

Set in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Bogatell Beach, Acta Voraport offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features an ATM, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, all rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. Each room is equipped with a safety deposit box and some rooms also feature city views. At Acta Voraport the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include Catalan, English, Spanish and French.

Popular points of interest near Acta Voraport include Mar Bella Beach, Nova Icaria Beach and Somorrostro Beach. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

Situated 10 minutes' walk from the Arc de Triomf Metro and Train Station, the Ilunion Auditori features a rooftop swimming pool 3 m wide by 5 m long and gym. Free WiFi is available throughout.

All modern rooms at the Auditori have wooden floors, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a safe. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

The Ilunion Auditori serves a daily breakfast and offers à- la-carte dishes made with seasonal products. There is also a special menu for celiac and food intolerant guests. Room service is available during limited hours, and a snack bar is open during the evening. A range of restaurants and bars can be found in the nearby areas of the Eixample, Born and Gothic Quarter.

Guests can enjoy a work out at the gym, which is equipped with cardiovascular equipment. The seasonal rooftop pool, which is surrounded by sun loungers, offers the ideal place for relaxation with stunning views over the city.

Free internet access is available at the computers in the reception area. The famous Barcelona Auditorium is a 5-minute walk away, while the the Sagrada Familia and the Ciutadella Park are 1.5 km away. Underground private parking is available on site for an additional charge.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

Set in Barcelona’s Born District, right beside Ciutadella Park, Motel One Barcelona-Ciutadella offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and an interactive TV.

Motel One Barcelona-Ciutadella features a 24-hour lounge bar and a continental breakfast is available each morning at the property. The hotel also has a rooftop terrace with views of Ciutadella Park, the sea and the Barcelona skyline.

Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas can be reached in a 20-minute walk, as can Barcelona’s Olympic Port. The Sagrada Familia is 30 minutes’ walk away.

Arc de Triomf metro and train station is just 400 metres away. Motel One is only 20 minutes from the International Convention Center – CCIB FORUM and 30 minutes from the Fira Barcelona Exhibition Centre in public transport.

Zenit Barcelona is 250 metres from Plaza Francesc Macià on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue. This modern hotel offers stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms, with free Wi-Fi and a pillow menu.

The Zenit is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, where Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló can be found. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a further 15 minutes’ walk away.

Rooms at the Zenit Barcelona feature satellite TV and a safe and minibar. There is a work desk and a kettle with free tea and coffee set; the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Zenit Hotel’s restaurant offers gourmet Spanish and international cuisine. A special gluten-free breakfast and children's menus are available, and packed lunches and room service can be requested.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. A laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service is offered. Parking is available 10 minutes' walk away, for an extra cost.

This minimalist hotel is situated in the Poble Nou district of Barcelona, 15 minutes’ by foot from Bogatell Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool surrounded by wooden decking and loungers.

The suites at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites feature monochrome decoration and a flat-screen TV. They also include air conditioning and a modern bathroom.

The Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites complex offers a stylish café-bar and restaurant. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine from the á la carte and daily menus. In summer meals can be enjoyed on the terrace by the pool.

Guests have access to the hotel's large spa for an additional cost. It includes an indoor treatment pool, Finnish sauna, Turkish baths, jacuzzis, hot tubs, several types of shower and an ice fountain. There is also a gym.

Barcelona Port is 15 minutes' walk away and Bogatell Metro Station is 100 metres from the hotel. Guests can walk to the lively Villa Olimpica area in 5 minutes.

All rooms include 1 complimentary access per person per stay to the hotel spa (subject to availability and upon reservation).

Acta BCN 40 Hotel is centrally located 350 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Universitat, and a 5-minute walk from the Ramblas. It offers modern rooms with flat-screen satellite TVs.

Rooms at the Acta are air-conditioned in summer and heated in winter, and have a free safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities, and you can request an iron at reception.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast in the hotel’s stylish breakfast room. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. There are many bars, shops and restaurants within a short walk of the hotel.

The Acta BCN 40 has a 24-hour front desk and offers luggage storage. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

Pere IV is situated in the Poble Nou District, 10 minutes’ walk from the lively Port Olimpic area and Barcelona's beaches. This hotel features a free spa, free Wi-Fi and 24-hour reception.

Each of the spacious rooms comes with a minibar, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The à la carte Garum Restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel serves a daily, buffet breakfast.

Guests enjoy free access to the Pere IV's spa, which includes a Finnish sauna, a hammam, indoor pool and sensation showers.

The Pere IV is a short walk from the beach and the new marina. Nearby Bogatell Metro Station offers easy access to the beach and the city centre, which can both be reached within 15 minutes.

Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia, Golden Hotel Barcelona is a sustainable property with the Biosphere certificate. It provides a rooftop terrace with outdoor swimming pool, jacuzzi and bar. 1.5 km from Port Olympic, the property is also 1.7 km from Sagarda Familia and 1.9 km away from Picasso Museum. There is a gym, a restaurant and a shared lounge.

 All guests staying at the Golden Hotel Barcelona get 1 free entry for person and stay to the spa at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpic@ Suites complex (subject to availability and with prior reservation), located 450 meters away.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property.

Speaking Spanish, Catalan, German and English at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Astoria is just off Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from Diagonal Metro Station and Paseo de Gracia Avenue. It features a rooftop pool with views, and a gym.

The Astoria Hotel combines original Art Nouveau features with modern facilities. Air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV, a safe and minibar. They feature wooden floors and free Wi-Fi, and the modern bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

The restaurant at the Astoria offers traditional Catalan cuisine, and room service is available. There is also a terrace and a bar.

There is a 24-hour front desk

Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi. It is just 300 metres from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Speciality Monument status.

All soundproofed en-suite rooms sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool.

A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available.

Catalonia Eixample 1864 boasts a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away.

The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

Located in the quiet San Gervasi district of Barcelona, this elegant hotel offers modern rooms with free internet connection. The Silken is just 8 minutes by train from Plaza Catalunya.

The restaurant at Silken San Gervasi offers traditional cuisine with modern influences. A breakfast buffet is served in the cafeteria, and drinks and snacks are also available throughout the day.

Functional rooms include a free safe and central heating and air conditioning. The marble bathroom is complete with a hairdryer.

Silken St. Gervasi is a 15-minute walk from Park Guell, with impressive structures, mosaics and architecture by Antoni Gaudí. El Putxet Station can be found 50 metres from the hotel with direct access to the city centre.

Situated just 200 metres from Sagrera Metro Station in Sant Andreu, the modern Hotel Acta Laumon is 25 minutes from the centre of Barcelona by metro.

It features stylish rooms with air conditioning, a plasma TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is offered. Hotel Acta Laumon also offers apartments, located in front of the hotel. Guests have access to the hotel facilities.

The hotel have a spacious lounge to rest, work or have a coffee.
There are also 24-hour vending machines for snacks and drinks.

The hotel offers tourist information and ticket services.

Situated 200 metres from Las Ramblas in central Barcelona, Catalonia Avinyo features a rooftop pool and gym. It offers chic, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are decorated in a modern, minimalist style with large wall photos. They include a minibar, safe and telephone. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. The modern bathrooms have a shower and a hairdryer.

Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Catalonia Avinyo. The Liceu and Jaume I Metro Stations are just 300 metres away and Barcelona Cathedral is 4 minutes' walk away.

The Avinyo’s central location means there are many shops, bars and restaurants close to the hotel. Bicycle and car hire can be arranged at the tour desk.

Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, 430 BCN Apartments is situated in Barcelona. Sagrada Familia is 600 metres away.

The accommodation has a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchen, fitted with a microwave and toaster. A fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a bidet in each unit. Towels and bed linen are available.

Casa Batllo is 1.1 km from 430 BCN Apartments, while La Pedrera is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the property.

Luggage storage is available and there is a car park nearby which offers special prices to guests.

Zenit Borrell is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, 15 minutes’ walk from the stylish Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers modern, soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

The Marés restaurant offers Mediterranean and international cuisine, and has an elegant outdoor terrace. There is also a bar with a large TV screen.

All rooms at the Zenit Borrell have air conditioning and a minibar. The private bathrooms come equipped with a hairdryer.

The tour desk can provide useful information on Barcelona and the surrounding area. The hotel is 12 minutes from Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas by metro, while the Hospital Clinic Metro Station and hospital are 200 metres way from the hotel.

Set next to Barcelona University on Gran Vía, Hotel Center Gran Via offers modern rooms in the centre of Barcelona. It is within 5 minutes’ walk of Plaza de Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Passeig de Gràcia.

Set in the principal floor of a beautiful Modernist building, Hotel Center Gran Via features French balconies and high, painted ceilings. The rooms offer simple, contemporary décor.

All rooms at Hotel Center Gran Via are on the main floor, featuring an air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms according to category have a balcony or a terrace.

Universitat Metro station is 100 metres from the hotel and the famous Sagrada Família is just 5 stops from here. The Gaudí houses, the Gothic Quarter and Born district can all be reached in 20 minutes by foot.

The airport bus stops 100 metres away and Catalunya Railway and Metro Station is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the Gran Via.

The Acta Antibes is set in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 10 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia. This hotel features a 24-hour reception, buffet breakfast and free Wi-Fi.

Each of the Acta Antibes’s rooms has simple, stylish décor and wooden flooring. All air-conditioned rooms have a TV and a desk.

Whilst visiting the city’s tourist attractions, guests at the Antibes can make use of its luggage storage. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request.

The hotel is ideally located for visiting sights such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, which are around 20 minutes’ walk away.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over one kilometre away. The nearest Metro station, Monumental, is just 200 metres from the hotel.

Hotels: Hotel Granados 83, a Member of Design Hotels
Full_Descriptions:
Located 250 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station, Granados 83 offers a small gym and roof terrace with a small pool and cocktail bar. Rooms feature Zen-style design and LCD TV.

This design hotel has an impressive glass and stone façade and it combines neoclassical details with industrial and natural components which has become representative of the entire city and which gives it the Speciality Monument status. It also features beautiful Art Deco interiors.

Decorated with wood, leather and glass, the Granados 83’s stylish air-conditioned rooms include a minibar, bathrobe and slippers.

There are many popular tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, on Rambla de Catalunya.

Passeig de Gràcia is 400 metres away, and is home to Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló.

There is a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. On-site parking is offered for an extra charge.

Located just 2 blocks from the Sagrada Familia, this hotel has a rooftop terrace overlooking Gaudí’s world-famous temple. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Sagrada Familia feature parquet floors and modern furniture. They are equipped with a minibar and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Glòries Shopping Centre and Arc de Triomf are under 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located a 3-minute walk away, connects you with the city centre in 5 minutes.

Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic is in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, just 100 metres from the port and 500 metres from Las Ramblas.

Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute stroll from the Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gotic.

Its bright, modern rooms offer free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. They also have air conditioning or heating and a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and toiletries.

You can find a range of lively bars in the surrounding streets.

Barcelona Aquarium and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are 800 metres away.

Conveniently located less than 10 minutes’ walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station, Hotel Viladomat by Silken is located in Barcelona. This property features free WiFi and an on-site bar.

Each room at this property is air conditioned and has satellite TV, safe, desk, and minibar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.

Hotel Viladomat by Silken has a 24-hour front desk and offers a ticket service. A shuttle to the airport is available for an extra charge, and there is luggage storage on site.

Plaza Catalunya and Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas are 20 minutes away by foot. The friendly staff are happy to provide information on the city and its main points of interest. Sants Station is 1 km away from Hotel Viladomat by Silken, with direct links to Barcelona Airport.

Acta Splendid is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Staff at the Hotel Splendid’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is also a computer in the lobby that guests can use for free.

There is a public car park 450 metres from the hotel, around a 7-minute walk. You can walk to the Palau de la Música Catalana, a Modernist auditorium and UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 15 minutes.

Gluten-free breakfasts are available upon request.

Catalonia Barcelona 505 offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and an outdoor swimming pool in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi area. From El Putxet Train Station, 400 metres away, you can reach the centre in 15 minutes.

The hotel is close to important medical centres, such as the Teknon Clinic, Sant Jordi Clinic, Dexeus and Barraquer. It is also next to the Blue Tram, which takes you to the cable car for Tibidabo.

Air-conditioned rooms have a satellite TV, a safe and minibar. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The restaurant C50&5 offers international cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available.

You can hire a car from the 24-hour front desk. On-site parking is offered for an additional charge, and the hotel has easy access to the B20 Motorway.

The stylish Catalonia Rigoletto is set 500 metres from FC Barça’s Camp Nou stadium and 5 minutes’ walk from Maria Cristina Metro Station. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs.

The Rigoletto’s spacious rooms are air conditioned and decorated with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. All rooms have satellite TV, free smartphone, a minibar and safety deposit box.

A buffet breakfast is on offer in the dining room and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the stylish La Traviata restaurant. There is also a bar in the hotel featuring attractive art work.

Sights including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro. Sants Railway Station, where there is an airport train connection, is just 1.5 km from the Rigoletto.

Set in a 19th-century building in Barcelona’s El Born district, Catalonia Born offers a rooftop pool, an attractive central courtyard and free Wi-Fi. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The classic rooms at Catalonia Born Hotel come with an elegant marble bathroom. They also include a satellite TV and centrally controlled heating or air conditioning, depending on the season.

A buffet breakfast is served, and the snack bar is open for lunch and dinner. There is also a bar in the lobby.

Located minutes from França Train Station, the hotel is well-connected to the rest of the city and its surroundings. Car rental is also available from the tour desk.

Catalonia Albeniz offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is situated 150 metres from Clot Train Station, and a 15-minute walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia Church.

The property has a gym and an outdoor pool. You can also use the luggage storage facility on site at the Albeniz.

The varied buffet breakfast at the Catalonia Albeniz includes typical local dishes, such as potato omelette and bread with tomato.

The Albeniz offers bright, modern rooms with simple décor and wooden floors. Each room includes a minibar and a marble bathroom with a hair dryer, plus a safe. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Catalonia Albeniz is just 700 metres from the shops and restaurants of Glòries Shopping Centre, while Encants Flea Market is a 5-minute walk away. Metro services and direct airport trains are available from nearby Clot Station.

Hotel Lleó is situated next to Barcelona's Plaza Catalunya and the famous Las Ramblas. It has a small rooftop pool with sun terrace and loungers, free Wi-Fi access and rooms with flat-screen TVs.

The Hotel Lleó is elegantly decorated with polished floors, glass features and attractive lighting throughout. Its air-conditioned rooms are spacious and have fridges and satellite TV.

The restaurant serves a range of Mediterranean cuisine. It also serves a daily breakfast from 07:00 until 11:00.

The Lleó has a lounge area and snack bar, where guests can relax with a drink.

Hotel Lleó is within walking distance of many of Barcelona's attractions and Las Ramblas is just a minute's walk away. The nearest Metro Station is 100 metres from the hotel and connects guests to sights such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and the Sagrada Familia, within 10 minutes.

Offering city views, Magatzem 128 is an accommodation situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is set 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station and offers a lift. The guest house has family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

All units feature air conditioning and a cable flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also have free WiFi. At the guest house, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Casa Batllo and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Magatzem 128.

This hotel is located next to Avinguda Diagonal and Passeig de Gràcia, ideal for shopping. Guests can easily access Plaza Cataluña and the city’s historic gothic quarter. Free Wi-Fi is available.

Situated along the modernist route, Hotel Catalonia Gracia is surrounded by much of the interesting architecture that Barcelona is famous for, such as Gaudí and Domenech i Muntaner's key buildings, including La Pedrera.

A buffet breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant; room service is also available.

Guests can easily enjoy this cosmopolitan city as Hotel Catalonia Gracia is within walking distance of Barcelona’s many attractions. As well as the excellent public transport links providing swift access to the entire city and the surrounding area, the hotel offers great value for money. The hotel also includes meeting amenities and conference rooms available for business events and banquets.

Featuring a sunroof terrace with a pool and views over Barcelona, Catalonia Park Putxet offers tranquil rooms and a modern fitness centre onsite. There is free WiFi available throughout.

The Park Putxet has simple, bright décor. Each air-conditioned room comes with a mini fridge with complimentary water, a satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom with a hairdryer.

You can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast with Show Cooking. Light meals are prepared at the hotel snack bar; and room service, including sushi room service, is available.

The hotel is located in a residential area. There is a wide selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the neighbouring district of Gràcia, which is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Gaudi's famous Park Guell is just 600 metres away. The closest metro station is Lesseps, 600 metres away.

This casual-style, urban hotel is set in Barcelona’s quiet Sarrià-Sant Gervasi district, 10 minutes’ from the centre via nearby Sant Gervasi FGC Train Station. It offers modern and contemporary rooms with views.

The bright, air-conditioned rooms at Mercure Barcelona Condor come with free WiFi, satellite TV, a work desk, minibar, safe and private bathroom with hairdryer. Some rooms also have a terrace.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at the hotel's restaurant. Room service and laundry facilities are also available.

When booking 5 rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

Guests have free access to the fitness centre which overlooks the Tibidabo mountain and the city. Massage services are available for a supplement. Events and meetings can also be catered for.


There are various bars, shops and pleasant squares within 5 minutes’ walk in the Gracia district. The famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, with Gaudi’s La Pedrera, as well as Park Güell are just 15 minutes away by foot.

Diagonal Avenue , a popular shopping area, is just 750 metres away from Mercure Barcelona Condor and Muntaner FGC Station is a 3-minute walk away.

Located 10 minutes away from Bogatell Beach in the 22 district, the modern Ilunion Barcelona features a rooftop swimming pool, sun terrace, and a gym. The CCIB Conference Centre is 2 km away. Free WiFi is available.

Rooms at Ilunion Barcelona feature air conditioning, a desk and a TV. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A safe and minibar are provided. Superior rooms also feature a furnished terrace with sea or city views.

This hotel is officially adapted for disabled guests. It has rooms adapted for people with reduced mobility or hearing/visual impairment, available upon request.

Ilunion Barcelona's restaurant serves breakfast and also offers an à la carte menu. The hotel has a bar and provides room service. A menu for guests with specific dietary requirements is also available.

Just a few minutes walk from the hotel is Rambla de Poblenou and Bogatell Beach, which are home to a wide variety of shops, bars and restaurants. The shopping centre is a 4-minute drive away and the Diagonal Mar shopping centre is an 8-minute drive away.

Ilunion Barcelona has pleasant, renovated common areas and free internet access. Private underground parking is available for an extra cost.

Llacuna and Poble Nou Metro Station is located less than 300 metres from the hotel. The bus stop of the line number 6 is located 50 metres from the hotel.

Gran Via is 15 minutes away by bus. There is a tourist bus stop near the hotel. Barcelona-El Prat airport is located 20 km away, with quick access to the Ronda Litoral.

Situated 300 metres from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre, the Derby is a 20-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou stadium. Each air-conditioned room offers flat-screen satellite TV and free internet access.

The stylish Derby Hotel has an impressive collection of Catalan art, including pieces by Miró and Tàpies. Rooms have functional design and parquet flooring. They all include a safe and a minibar.

Hotel Derby features Italian pizzeria Santa Napoli and cocktail bar with Peruvian nuances Lima Bruja.

Located just 10 metres away, the Gran Derby Hotel allows guests access to its gym and swimming pool. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 800 metres away, while the Feria Trade Fair in Plaza Espanya can be reached in a 20-minute walk.

Hotels: Hotel Balmes, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
Full_Descriptions:
Balmes is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a swimming pool, a gym/fitness center and modern rooms with satellite TV.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Balmes feature parquet floors and smart, simple décor. They all come with a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

B Bar, like the rest of the hotel, is decorated with works of African art.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is a computer in the lobby which guests can use for free.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are both under 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can walk to Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s charming Gothic Quarter in around 15 minutes.

Catalonia Diagonal Centro is set in the heart of Barcelona’s Eixample district, 300 metres from Diagonal Metro Station. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

At the Catalonia Diagonal Centro, you can enjoy modern, comfortable accommodation next to some of Barcelona’s most popular sights. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app

Only 300 metres away on Passeig de Gràcia is La Pedrera, one of Gaudi’s famous creations. Take a stroll past the Modernista buildings to reach Plaça Catalunya and the lively Ramblas area.

Back at the hotel, relax in your stylish bedroom with contemporary wooden furniture and marble en suite bathroom. Watch satellite television or take advantage of the free wireless internet connection.

A short stroll from the hotel takes you to trendy Gràcia, with its bohemian shops and leafy squares, and a huge selection of bars and restaurants. Nearby metro and bus lines make it easy to see the whole of this cosmopolitan city.

Ibis Barcelona Plaza Glòries 22@ is located in Barcelona’s Glòries district, 500 metres from Torre Agbar. It offers a fitness centre, 24-hour bar and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV.

All rooms at the Ibis Plaza Glòries have air conditioning and heating. They also have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout.

The Hotel Ibis Plaza Glòries has a restaurant which serves a buffet breakfast. Rates with breakfast included does not include breakfast for children. Children under 12 can enjoy breakfast for 4 euros per person

Llacuna and Glòries Metro Stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. From here you can reach Plaza Catalunya or Barceloneta Beach in under 10 minutes.

Free Wi-Fi and a TV are included in Hostalet de Barcelona’s bright, functional rooms. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 300 metres away.

The Hostalet is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia. This famous street is home to the Gaudi buildings, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló.

Hospital Clinic Metro Station offers direct trains to Sagrada Familia and Camp Nou Football Stadium. Provença Station is 800 metres away, and provides easy access to Plaza Catalunya Square.

Each simple, stylish room at the Hostalet has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony, with views of the street or central patio. Guests receive a welcome gift of bottled water and a packet of biscuits.

Hostal Operaramblas is situated less than 100 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station. This guest house features rooms with private bathrooms, a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi.

The Operaramblas’ rooms offers simple décor with tiled floors. Each room has heating and a telephone.

The guest house has a drinks machine and sells snacks in the reception, where there is also a computer with internet access.

The guest house has an ideal location in the centre of Barcelona. It is 5 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where there are a range of cafés, bars and restaurants. The city’s cathedral is 500 metres from the Opera and the Old Port is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Hotels: Gran Hotel Havana 4Sup by Escampa Hotels
Full_Descriptions:
This elegant, design hotel is set in Barcelona’s city centre, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. It features a sauna and a seasonal rooftop pool with a terrace.

The Gran Hotel Havana is located in Casa Fradera, a historic building dating from 1882. Rooms are decorated in a classic style and feature a marble bathroom. They come with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

The Grand Place restaurant serves traditional cuisine, and in summer guests can enjoy light meals on the hotel’s rooftop bar-terrace.

Please note that the rooftop bar-terrace may be closed to the public at certain times due to private events.

Girona Metro Station is 200 metres away while the stylish Paseo de Gracia is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, with many shops, bars and restaurants.

Hotels: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia
Full_Descriptions:
Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia is located just 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s famous Sagrada Familia. It has a rooftop sun terrace with panoramic views of Barcelona and rooms with free Wi-Fi.

All modern, outward-facing rooms at theLeonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia are equipped with air conditioning and heating. They have a flat-screen TV and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia serves a daily buffet breakfast, and gluten-free meals are available on prior request. In summer, breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace. There are also vending machines with snacks and drinks.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Clot Metro Station is 200 metres away, allowing you to reach the city centre in 10 minutes.

This modern hotel has 250 spacious and fully equipped rooms, a Snack-Bar open 24 hours where clients can enjoy a buffet breakfast, as well as light meals for lunch and dinner. It also has vending machines and private paid parking. All its facilities are perfectly adapted and accessible for people with reduced mobility.
It is a hotel with free and unlimited high-speed Wi-Fi in the common areas. Wi-Fi internet is available in the rooms at an extra cost.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou is a pet-friendly hotel that will be happy to offer you and your pet the best experience.
It is located in the traditional Poblenou neighborhood, within streets full of restaurants, bars and shops. One of the most charming neighborhoods in the city, and 600 meters from the Bogatell beach. Barcelona city center can be reached in 10 minutes by metro and Barcelona’s Port Olímpic, with its vibrant night life, is just a 20-minute walk away.
This is considered the most innovative neighborhood in the city. It´s in the heart of the 22@ District and concentrates a multitude of technology and R+D companies. Therefore, thanks to its location and facilities, it is also a perfect accommodation for business trips.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou offers all you need to have the best experience in Barcelona city.

Located 600 metres from Plaza Reial in Barcelona, Niu Barcelona Hotel features an outdoor pool on the rooftop. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Every room at this hotel comes with a flat-screen TV; while the private bathrooms come with shower and hairdryer. Rooms are air-conditioned in summer and heated in winter.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests benefit from a complimentary bottle of water upon arrival.

Portal de l'Angel is 800 metres from Niu Barcelona Hotel, while Plaça Catalunya is 900 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Niu Barcelona Hotel.

Offering stylish, well-equipped apartments with free Wi-Fi, Charmsuites Paralel is set next to Parallel Metro Station and Victoria Theatre. It features air-conditioned accommodation with kitchen facilities.

These spacious, newly built apartments have attractive, modern décor. All have a spacious living room with a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV. Kitchens and kitchenettes come with an electric hob, oven, kettle and coffee maker.

Shops, cafés and bars can be found in the streets surrounding the apartments. There are many restaurants in the nearby Raval district and around Las Ramblas, a 10-minute walk away.

Barcelona’s Port Vell marina is just over 1 km from Charmsuites Paralel, and the Funicular Train to Montjuïc Hill leaves from Parallel Station. Barcelona's Fira Exhibition Centre is around 15 minutes' walk away.

Catalonia Roma is 600 metres from Sants AVE Train and Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, and you can reach Barcelona city centre in 10 minutes by Metro or bus.

There are direct train links to Barcelona Airport from Sants Station and the Airport Bus also stops outside it.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms have wooden floors, a mini fridge with complimentary water and satellite TV. There is a safe and minibar, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant. Room service is available and there is also a bar.

Plaza Espanya, Montjuic’s Magic Fountain and the Fira Conference Centre are all within 15 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

The 24-hour front desk at Catalonia Roma boasts a large stained-glass skylight. You can rent a car and currency exchange is offered.

Pets: Only one dog or cat less than 20 kg is allowed per room (on request). Supplement of 22€ night/animal and deposit of 200€.

Located just 8 minutes’ walk from central Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya, Hotel HCC Taber is housed in an impressive Modernist building. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The rooms at HCC Taber feature satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The building of the HCC Taber was originally designed by the famous Barcelona architect, Domènech i Montaner, who also designed the amazing Palau de la Música Catalana. It still retains its characteristic wrought-iron balconies and large bay windows.

The hotel’s buffet breakfast offers a wide range of dishes, and there are à-la-carte breakfast options. There is also a snack bar and room service.

The Ramblas are just 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and Gaudí’s iconic Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are also within a 10-minute walk. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya.

Located next to Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup offers an outdoor pool, a free gym, a terrace, free Wi-Fi and paid private parking.

All the rooms at Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup has a smart TV with Chromecast app.

The restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine with a selection of dishes from the "Gourmet Corner" menu. Gluten-free menus are available on request.

There is also a gastrobar and a bar with a cocktail menu. An electric vehicle charging station is available.

The property is 500 metres from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, 13-minute walk from La Pedrera and 7-minute walk from Palau de la Música Catalana. Airport buses can be reached within 350 metres.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 350 metres away.

Catalonia Gran Via BCN is set on Gran Vía and within 5 minutes’ walk of Urgell and Universitat Metro Stations, and beside the airport bus stop. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and free Wi-Fi.

Each of the modern rooms at Catalonia Gran Via BCN is themed around a different city and air travel. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and an iPod docking station.

You can enjoy breakfast in Catalonia Gran Via BCN, while à la carte options are offered in the Gourmet Corner.

You can walk to both Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 10 minutes. Plaza de España, the Magic Fountains and the FIRA are just 2 stops from Urgell Station.

This modern hotel is located 200 metres from Barcelona’s Monumental Bull Ring and 12 minutes from the Sagrada Familia. The rooms all have air conditioning and heating, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Monumental Metro Station is just 3 minutes’ walk away from Hotel Glòries, and offers a direct service to Plaza Catalunya in around 5 minutes.

The hotel is well located for the 22@ high-tech area, as well as the Agbar Tower. The National Theatre of Catalunya and the Auditori Concert Hall are just 400 metres away.

The Hotel Glòries’s 24-hour front desk offers car and bike hire. They can also exchange currency and reserve tickets.

This guest house offers free Wi-Fi in a location by Barcelona Port. Yomo Hostal BCN Port is just 100 metres from Las Ramblas and 400 metres from the Gothic Quarter.

Paral•lel Metro is a short walk away. This offers direct access to Plaça Catalunya, Plaça Espanya and the Sagrada Familia. The funicular to Montjuic also leaves from here.

The guest house is set opposite the Cruise Terminals, 10 minutes from Barcelona Beach. There are many buses and bicycle lanes nearby.

All rooms at the Yomo Hostal BCN Port have a TV, heating and air conditioning. Standard rooms are en suite and economy rooms have a shared bathroom.

Family rooms and rooms for disabled guests are available. Daily cleaning is provided.

This stylish boutique hotel offers colourful, modern rooms in the historic city centre, just 4 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya. There is a rooftop hot tub and terrace.

Guests at the Ciutat Vella enjoy free coffee. There is also a free internet terminal, and free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

The rooms in the Ciutat Vella have large windows and flat-screen TVs. The bathrooms are modern and have showers.

Ciutat Vella’s central location makes it ideal for exploring Barcelona’s historic heart. Many great bars, cafés and restaurants are less than 10 minutes’ walk away. Universitat Metro Station is just 3 minutes away.

Set within 3 km of La Pedrera and 3 km of Sants Railway Station in Barcelona, Isabella's House offers accommodation with seating area. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel features family rooms.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a a bath or shower. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a fridge, a stovetop, and kitchenware. At the aparthotel, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

A bar can be found on-site.

Sightseeing tours are available in the neighbourhood.

Camp Nou is 3.1 km from the aparthotel, while Casa Batllo is 3.2 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Isabella's House.

Centrally located in Barcelona, just 900 metres from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia, Bed and Bike Barcelona offers private and shared rooms with free WiFi. Tetuan metro Station is 5 minutes’ walk away.

Air-conditioned rooms at this hostel come with a wardrobe and a private or shared bathroom. They include bed linen and lockers. Guests can make use of the shared kitchen and TV area. Bed linen and towels can be rented on site for an additional charge.

Bed and Bike Barcelona offers a bicycle rental service. There is also a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and a ticket service.

The hostel is 900 metres from Arc de Triomf and a 20-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from Bed and Bike Barcelona.

This boutique guest house is set in Barcelona’s chic Eixample district, 300 metres from Plaza Catalunya. It offers air-conditioned rooms, most with a balcony, 200 metres from Urquinaona Metro Station.

Set in a restored 19th century building, rooms at Violeta Boutique feature contemporary décor. All include city views, free Wi-Fi, a plasma TV and a spacious private bathroom.

There is a terrace where you can relax and there are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk. Las Ramblas are just 7 minutes’ walk away.

Violeta Boutique is 250 metres from Passeig de Gracia, with its exclusive shops and Gaudí monuments. You can walk to the Palau de la Musica Catalana and the bohemian Born area in 5 minutes. Estació del Nord Bus Station and Ciutadella Park are both 15 minutes' walk away.

Hotels: Serennia Cest Apartamentos Arc de Triomf
Full_Descriptions:
These modern apartments are located 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf. Each air-conditioned apartment includes a flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The apartments at Arc de Triomf Apartments feature parquet floors and light wood furniture. The modern kitchen has an oven, hob, washing machine and dishwasher.

There are plenty of bars, restaurants and supermarkets within a 2-minute walk of the apartments.

Arc de Triomf Apartments are just 200 metres from Estació del Nord Bus Station, and you can walk to Plaza Catalunya in 15 minutes. Ciutadela Park is a 10-minute walk away.

Located just 50 metres from the famous Las Ramblas in Barcelona, Gaudi Hotel features a shared terrace with views of the Palau Güell and the city. Free WiFi is available.

The hotel is 300 metres from Liceu Metro Station. You can visit many of the city’s attractions on foot. The Boqueria Market is 450 metres from the hotel. The Port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are a 10-minute walk away.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Gaudi Hotel have a private bathroom and a TV. Some have a private balcony and safe. Rooms are modern, with wooden floors, and some offer excellent views of the city or Palau Güell.

A continental breakfast is served in the Gaudi’s restaurant. There is a bar and a snack bar.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and a laundry and ironing service are available. Guests also have free use of the hotel's 2 computers with internet access.

This motorcycle-friendly hotel is 3 Metro stops from Plaza Catalunya and 15 minutes’ walk from the Barcelona’s beaches. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers chic air-conditioned and spacious suites and apartments with a flat-screen cable TV and a seating area. There is a fully-equipped kitchenette, a work desk and a safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The property has a free self-service laundry room open 24 hours a day and a gym.

For guests coming by motorcycle, Capri by Fraser offers free indoor parking with direct elevator to the rooms and a “pit stop” service including complete toolkit for small repairs and chain lubricant, free suede, helmet visor cleaner, battery charger and compressor to check the pressure level of tyres.

Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers a buffet breakfast every day and a set menu at lunch time during week days. Room service is also available.

The hotel has a 24-hour front desk.

This classically decorated guest house is set in the late 19th-century modernist district of Eixample, in the centre of Barcelona. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Refurbished in 2018, all air-conditioned rooms boast wooden floors, and includes a  smart TV and a free safe. They all have a private bathroom completed with a professional hairdryer.

From Hostal Central Barcelona you can walk into the city centre to explore Gaudi's Modernist monuments, including Casa Batllò, and La Pedrera.

Hostal Central Barcelona is a pleasant place to stay, providing an attractive and artistic interior decor.

This design hotel is situated 15 minutes’ from the beach, in the 22@ business area of Barcelona’s Poble Nou district. Bogatell Metro Station, 350 metres away, connects with central Barcelona in 25 minutes.

The modern rooms at NH Barcelona Diagonal Center feature a flat-screen satellite TV, desk, minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast.

You will find cafés and restaurants on Poblenou Rambla, 10 minutes’ walk away. Glòries Shopping Centre is also within a 10-minute walk.

This NH hotel features a 24-hour reception desk and a business centre. Rooms and facilities are adapted for disabled guests. There is free Wi-Fi throughout.

Barcelona Airport is about 18 km away, while CCIB Convention Centre is 3km away. Car rental is available at the hotel and private parking is available at an additional cost.

The Catalonia Catedral is set in a traditional Modernist building, just 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers free use of Smartphones, Wi-Fi access, a rooftop seasonal pool and a Japanese-style terrace and garden.

The Catedral has stylish rooms, which have contemporary décor. Each has a flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app, air conditioning, a minibar, a Nespresso machine. A smartphone is available for guests during their stay free of charge.

The hotel’s Ascent Restaurant by Eboca serves Mediterrean cuisine and offers views of the nearby Palacio Pignatelli Art Gallery. There is also a bar in the hotel lobby where guests can use the computers with internet access and printers for free.

The Catalonia Catedral is around 10 minutes’ walk from landmarks such as Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya Square. Barcelona’s Old Port and Marina are less than one kilometre away. Jaume I Metro Station is 5 minutes' walk away.

This design hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station and Estació del Nord Bus Station.  It has a gym, and offers free Wi-Fi and free bottled water.

Rooms at the Sercotel Caspe are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They feature satellite TV, a minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The Sercotel Caspe has an outdoor terrace, an attractive restaurant and a café-bar. Room service is also available.

The hotel is a short walk from Gaudí's buildings on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is approximately 20 minutes' walk away.

There is a tour desk and 24-hour reception. Car hire is available and there is on-site parking for an extra charge.

Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel is set in  Barcelona, 200 metres from the Cathedral of Barcelona and offers a terrace with an outdoor pool with views of the Cathedral and a spa. Portal de l'Angel is 200 metres away.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned, soundproofed and features a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso Coffee Machine. The bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property, There is also a spa with a hot tub and a gym. The hotel offers show-cooking during breakfast.

Plaça Catalunya is 400 metres from Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel, while Picasso Museum is 600 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Situated in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira features air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Camp Nou is 2.9 km away and Boqueria Market is 4 km from the hotel.

At Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira offers a terrace.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2 km from the hotel, while Montjuïc is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 8 km from Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira.

Set in a striking, contemporary building on Passeig de Gràcia and facing Gaudí’s La Pedrera, Suites Avenue offers stylish accommodation. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and sauna.

Each of the Avenue’s apartments has simple, chic décor with parquet floors and leather sofas. All apartments have a large kitchen with an oven, fridge and dishwasher. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The property has a concierge service, which guests can use to arrange excursions, beauty treatments and babysitting.

The apartments are a 5-minute walk from a selection of upmarket shops and close to a range of cafés and restaurants.

Casa Batlló is 5 minutes’ walk from the apartments, while Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over 1 km away. Diagonal Metro Station is a 2-minute walk from the Suites.

Barcelona Center is 400 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, and a 15-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. Guests have free access to the small gym and rooftop hydromassage tub.

The modern rooms at the Barcelona Center Hotel have satellite TV and free WiFi. There is a minibar and safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The Center Hotel has a traditional Spanish restaurant. There is also a bar and a terrace.

There is a 24-hour front desk. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

Hotel Catalonia Plaza Cataluña offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. It is housed in a building 50 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya. All hotel rooms have smart TVs equipped with Chromecast app.

The hotel serves a continental buffet breakfast with show cooking and it includes a wide variety of regional products and home-made cakes.

Catalonia Plaza Cataluña Hotel has a sun terrace with loungers, a gym and a pool. Guests can also enjoy the on-site spa and cabin for spa treatments and massages.

Hotel Catalonia Plaza is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the Palau de la Música Catalana. A regular bus service to the airport leaves from the other side of Plaza Catalunya, just 100 metres away.

Located just 500 metres from Plaza Espanya, MH Apartments Urban offers modern apartments with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and safes. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute metro ride away.

Decorated in black and red, the air-conditioned apartments feature large windows and parquet floors. Each one includes a living-dining area and a kitchenette equipped with an oven, Nespresso coffee machine and washing machine.

Located between the lively Poble Sec and Raval districts, many dining options and bars surround MH Apartments Urban.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Espanya.  Barcelona Sants Train Station is just 15 minutes’ walk away.

Centrally located, Hostal Cèntric offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception, free luggage storage and free safe. The guest house is 400 metres from Barcelona's Plaza Universitat and the Rambla is 10 minutes’ walk away.

Air-conditioned rooms at Hostal Cèntric have a private bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. They all feature a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe. Some rooms have a balcony and there is a shared terrace with table and chairs. Bed linen and towels are also provided.

There are plenty of restaurants, shops and supermarkets open until late in the surrounding area. You can also find some of the trendiest bars in Raval District and around Sant Antoni Metro Station, 400 metres away.

Hostal Cèntric is 400 metres from Universitat Metro Station and the famous MACBA Museum is 6 minutes’ walk away. Regular airport buses leave from Sepulveda Bus Stop located just 400 metres away. Discounted public parking is available nearby.

The modern Hotel Grums is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Barcelona’s port, ferry terminal and cruise terminal. The Ramblas are 600 metres away, and Parallel Metro Station 300 metres away.

Hotel Grums Barcelona offers elegant, bright and spacious rooms with themed design décor and panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

All our rooms have free RITUALS Cosmetics amenities.

The Hotel Grums Barcelona features a wellness spa which is not included in the room rate and can be accessed for a small surcharge. Guests can relax in the hot tub, Finnish sauna or steam bath. A selection of massage and treatments are also available at an extra cost.

Hotels: Barcelona with rooms and lofts in front of the tourist metro stop
Full_Descriptions:
Ideally set in the Nou Barris district of Barcelona, Barcelona with rooms and lofts in front of the tourist metro stop is situated 7.5 km from Sagrada Familia, 8.7 km from Park Güell and 9.4 km from La Pedrera. During your time staying in this recently renovated apartment, dating back to 1982, you will have access to free WiFi. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and organising tours for guests.

There is a supermarket a short distance from the apartment.

Casa Batllo is 10 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 21 km from Barcelona with rooms and lofts in front of the tourist metro stop.

With a small rooftop pool offering great views over Barcelona, Andante Hotel is centrally located 350 metres from Drassanes Metro Station and La Rambla. It offers free Wi-Fi and a gym.

Modern air-conditioned rooms feature parquet floors, a laptop safe and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom comes with a full-length mirror and a high-powered hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast with show cooking is available. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. There is a self-service area with a microwave and vending machines for drinks, sandwiches and snacks, as well as a large terrace.

You can hire a car from the tour desk and a private shuttle from and to Barcelona El Prat Airport is available on prior request at an extra cost. There is a luggage storage room and a laundry and ironing service are offered.

The rooftop terrace will be closed for maintenance from January 15, 2024, to January 25, 2024.

Hotel Medicis is 5 minutes’ walk from Sant Pau Metro Station, allowing you to reach central Barcelona in around 10 minutes. There is Wi-Fi access and a rooftop sun terrace.

The Medicis Hotel is chic and functional, and offers reasonably priced accommodation in a good location. All air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and a safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.

Just next to the hotel is one of Barcelona’s emblematic Art Nouveau buildings, the Sant Pau Hospital, designed by Domènech i Montaner. From here it is a 10-minute walk down Avinguda de Gaudí to The Sagrada Família. You can stop for a coffee, or a meal, in one of the many café-restaurants that line this avenue.

The hotel has a tour desk, and you can hire a bicycle or car. There is a 24-hour front desk.

Featuring an outdoor pool and a fitness centre, Catalonia Square is located in Barcelona’s historic centre. The 4-star hotel is only 100 metres from Plaça Catalunya and offers free Wi-Fi

Each air-conditioned room has wooden floors and modern décor and comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, minibar and a battery charger for iPhone/iPad. Featuring a hairdryer, private bathrooms also include free toiletries and towels. Private pool and terrace are available in some rooms. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Guests can enjoy drinks, snacks and traditional tapas at Catalonia Square Bar. The breakfast is served until 12:00. Room service is also available.

La Rambla and the Gothic District are only 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Within 300 metres, guests can find the metro stations of Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya and Urquinaona, offering connection to most parts of Barcelona.

Boasting a terrace, The Moods Oasis is situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, 1.1 km from La Pedrera and 1.5 km from Casa Batllo. Featuring a fitness centre, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. At The Moods Oasis the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The Moods Oasis provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.8 km from the hotel, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from The Moods Oasis.

Hostal Mayerling Centro is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 300 metres from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 400 metres from Tivoli Theatre. It is situated 2.4 km from Barceloneta Beach and features a 24-hour front desk. The property is 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

All units feature air conditioning and a cable flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also boast free WiFi. At the guest house, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Portal de l'Angel, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Hostal Mayerling Centro.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique is set in an impressive historic building, next to Barcelona’s Universitat Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi and bright, air-conditioned rooms, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla.

Rooms feature wooden floors and have a safe and minibar. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique offers a buffet breakfast each morning. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. Due to its central location, there are many bars and restaurants within a short walk.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique has a 24-hour front desk, and a public parking is available nearby for an additional charge. The Airport Bus stops opposite in Plaza Universitat.

Hotels: Hotel Gran Derby Suites, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
Full_Descriptions:
This lovely red-brick building is perfectly situated in a quiet area of Barcelona, and boasts an outdoor swimming pool and a fantastic collection of lithographs by Picasso, Dalí, Tàpies and others.

Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Gran Derby Suites features flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bathrobe, slippers and a hairdryer.

These two separate spaces allow guests to comfortably host visitors, hold meetings or work in their sophisticated rooms.

Sit back and relax around the outdoor swimming pool, where you will enjoy views of the pretty gardens.

The tour desk/ticket service and free wired internet make it easy to plan your days in Barcelona.

Take a short metro journey into the city centre, or enjoy the tourist bus, which stops right next to the Gran Derby.

You can also stroll along to the fashionable Avinguda Diagonal. Here you will find the huge L'Illa shopping centre, and a succession of stylish boutiques.

Hotel Gran Derby shares with Hotel Derby the Italian pizzeria Santa Napoli and the cocktail bar with Peruvian nuances Lima Bruja.

Aparthotel Napols is centrally located, 350 metres from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station. Air-conditioned rooms feature a well-equipped kitchen, and a living room with sofa and TV.

Estació de Nord Bus Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, and has direct connections to Girona Airport. You can walk to Plaza Catalunya and the Rambla in 15 minutes. There is free WiFi in the apartments.

Soundproofed rooms at the Napols have a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with amenities.

The modern kitchen has a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. There is a dishwasher and dining area.

The complex has a 24-hour reception and a shared terrace. You can hire a car, and Napols offers a laundry service and luggage storage.

Set beside Barcelona's Francesc Macià Square, Vincci Mae features a terrace with a plunge pool and fantastic views of Diagonal Avenue and Tibidabo Mountain.

Vincci Mae boasts an on-site restaurant and bar, it also has a 24-hour front desk and offers free WiFi throughout the property.  An assorted buffet breakfast is offered everyday.

Stylish rooms feature a simple and bright décor, air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, kettle, and minibar. The fancy private bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries ,and a hairdryer.

Casa Batlló is 1.6 km from Vincci Mae, while La Pedrera is 1.3 km away. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes in public transport.

Free Wi-Fi and a rooftop swimming pool are offered at Catalonia Park Güell. It is set in a residential area just outside Barcelona’s historic centre, 600 metres from Parc Güell.

Rooms at the hotel are simple and comfortable, with air conditioning or heated and satellite TV. There is also a restaurant, bar.

The Catalonia Park Güell is just 300 metres from Vallcarca Metro Station. This gives access to the city centre within 10 minutes. Stops for buses V19 and 22 are nearby. The sun terrace offers views over the city.

The hotel is close to some of Barcelona’s most famous medical centres. These include the Delfos and Quiron Clinics.

There are many sports clubs and parks around the hotel. The popular Gràcia district is also a short walk away. It has lively squares with bars and restaurants.

This modern hotel offers free wired internet access and colourful rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The beautiful Laberint d’Horta Park is around a 15-minute walk away.

Colors is situated in a quiet residential area, just 350 metres from Valldaura Metro Station. Direct trains connect to Barcelona city centre in around 15 minutes. Free parking can also be found nearby.

Colors is located next to Can Cortada, one of Barcelona’s most popular restaurants. The hotel also has a coffee bar, where you can enjoy a breakfast buffet and light meals.

Rooms at the hotel offer a functional design and simple, stylish décor. Each room is air-conditioned and includes a safe.

This spacious and modern hotel is located in Eixample district, built in 2004, the Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via, features wide-open public spaces covered in marble.

Rooms include flat-screen TV, Wifi, safebox, desk, minibar, private bathrooms with toiletries.

A good location for tourism, you can easily walk to the Gothic Quarter and Ramblas, or up to the attractions of Montjuic. The city’s major business districts are also nearby.

Rooms include satellite TV, free Wi-Fi access, air conditioning and a bathroom with free toiletries.

Parking is available on site at an additional cost.

Hotels: Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa- Adults Only
Full_Descriptions:
The area around the Hotel Axel Barcelona is known as the Gay-xample because of its lively gay scene. The staff has knowledge of the local gay scene, and the hotel is hetero-friendly too.

Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, this design hotel is close to Passeig de Gràcia's exclusive boutiques. The Axel Hotel’s 500m² Spa Centre includes a hydromassage pool and saunas, and the modern rooms have flat-screen satellite TVs.

The Axel’s Sky Bar features a large swimming pool, a terrace with a hot tub and a cocktail bar. Here you will find parties, art exhibitions and shows.

The Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa offers easy access to the Ramblas, the Picasso Museum and Gothic Quarter. The hotel occupies an attractive 19th-century building.

Situated next to Gràcia FGC Train Station, Hotel Via Augusta has a rooftop terrace with views of Barcelona. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Via Augusta is a historic building with a beautiful original foyer. Rooms have simple, modern décor and wooden floors. They include a work desk, a safe and a bathroom with a hairdryer.

A varied breakfast buffet is served in the hotel, and drinks are available from the vending machine. A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found in the popular Gràcia district, within a 5-minute walk.

Hotel Via Augusta is 400 metres from Fontana Metro Station, and Parc Güell is just 1 Metro stop away. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute journey from nearby Gracia Station.

This design hotel is in Barcelona’s trendy Born district, 250 metres from the Picasso Museum. It features a gym, 24-hour reception, and air-conditioned rooms with colourful LED lighting and flat-screen TVs.

Free coffee, tea and water are offered in a self-service area in the Chic & Basic Born. The hotel also has a lounge with free Wi-Fi and comfortable designer armchairs.

The Modernist-style building has high ceilings, large windows and marble staircases. It is within 100 metres of Ciudadela Park and Barcelona’s Chocolate Museum. La Rambla is a 10-minute walk away.

Rooms at the Chic & Basic Born Boutique Hotel feature a glass shower cubicle in the centre of the room. There is also a hairdryer, slippers and bathroom amenities.

Breakfast is served in the Chic & Basic's Moderna bar, where you can also enjoy a cocktail. It is open 7 days a week from 08:00 to 22:00

Housed in a traditional 19th-century building, this hotel is located between Plaza de Catalunya and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool surrounded by painted murals.

The Catalonia Portal de l'Angel maintains much of its original design. It features comfortable rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and coffee and tea facilities. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:30 to 11:00 at Catalonia Portal de l'Angel.

The famous Las Ramblas is less than 200 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral is 100 metres from the hotel. The Portal de l'Angel is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Metro and Railway Station.

Located 5 minutes’ walk from Les Corts Metro Station, this hotel offers modern accommodation in Barcelona. It has good access to the city's main attractions, such as the Nou Camp Football Stadium.

The air-conditioned rooms at the NH Barcelona Les Corts feature contemporary décor, free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private balcony or terrace. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and toiletries.

The hotel operates a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Helpful staff can organise bicycle and car rental, as well as provide information on Barcelona.

NH Les Corts is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Sants Train Station, providing access to Barcelona Airport. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away. Barcelona Airport is 15 km from the property.

Set in the centre of Barcelona, Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B is a recently renovated accommodation, which offers allergy-free rooms. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation features luggage storage space, a housekeeping service and organising tours for guests.

All units feature air conditioning and a satellite flat-screen TV. Units are equipped with a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities and champagne are available every morning at the bed and breakfast. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Guests at Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B will be able to enjoy activities in and around Barcelona, like walking tours. The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B.

Hotel Concordia Barcelona is situated 800 metres from Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. It features a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool, hot tub, cocktail bar and solarium.

The Hotel Concordia Barcelona’s bright, spacious rooms feature contemporary décor and air conditioning.  Each room includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with a range of amenities.

The Concordia Barcelona’s modern, elegant  Bistro Triple Sec Restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. The varied breakfast buffet includes healthy options. There is also a café and cocktail bar open daily. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and electrical cars charging station is available.

Located next to Poble Sec Station, the hotel is a 5-minute Metro journey from Barcelona Port and La Rambla. You can also walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes. Direct airport buses stop in Plaza España, a 15-minute walk away.

Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

This modern hotel is situated on the northern edge of the city of Barcelona, near Avinguda Diagonal and Barcelona FC's famous stadium, Camp Nou. Guests have free access to the seasonal outdoor pool, the gym, and the wellness area that is equipped with sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

The exterior facing rooms feature a flat-screen TV, minibar, and a safe. The bathroom comes with free toiletries, bath, and hairdryer.

Stroll around the gardens of the Abba Garden Hotel. There is also a paddle court, so you can play a quick game.
