Grab a bite to eat in the snack bar in the evening - complete with terrace.

Zona Universitaria Metro Station that takes you to the Barcelona city centre is a 10-minute walk away. Metro Line 9 is a 13-minute walk away and it takes you to the airport within 15 minutes and to La Fira within 30 minutes.

Hostal Conde Güell is located next to Barcelona’s famous Camp Nou Football Stadium. It offers basic rooms with a sink and free WiFi. All rooms have shared bathroom facilities.

Rooms at the Conde Güell come with a fan and heating. They include a TV, and guests can use the communal microwave. All rooms and apartments include air conditioning.

The 24-hour reception allows guests flexibility during their stay. The tour desk can offer information on the surrounding area.

Collblanc Metro Station is 200 metres away and guests can reach the city centre in 3 stops. There are many bars, restaurants and shops on Diagonal Avenue, a 15-minute walk from the guest house.

Set just off Avinguda Paral.lel, Charmsuites Nou Rambla offers bright, stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi. Paral·lel Metro and Funicular Station is within 100 metres of the property.

Each spacious apartment at Charmsuites Nou Rambla has a living area with a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. There is a dining area, and a kitchen with an electric hob, oven, coffee maker and fridge.

Shops can be found in the streets surrounding the hotel. There are many cafés, bars and restaurants in the nearby Raval district and on Las Ramblas, a 10-minute walk away.

Barcelona’s Old Port is less than 1 km from the apartments. Plaza España Square, the Fira Exhibition Centre and Sants Railway Station can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro.

Des Artistes is located on Barcelona’s Gran Vía Avenue, next to Tetuán Square. It offers a reading room and a shared terrace.

Rooms come with heating and a fan is available in summer. All have a shared bathroom and some have a balcony.

Des Artistes is just 5 minutes’ walk from Estació del Nord Bus Station and Arc de Triomf. You can also walk to Ciutadella Park and Gaudí’s famous Sagrada Família in under 15 minutes.

Located 250 metres away, Tetuán Metro Station is just 1 stop away from the central Passeig de Gràcia Station. Trains to Barcelona Airport leave from Passeig de Gràcia Train Station.

Situated on the seafront in Diagonal Mar, the Hesperia Barcelona del Mar (formerly Hesperia del Mar) features stylish rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is a 5-minute walk from the CCIB and Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre.

Air-conditioned rooms at Hesperia Barcelona del Mar come with flat-screen TV, safe, and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries.

The Ramblas and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter are only 5 km from the hotel. Poble Nou Metro Station is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

Hotels: Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal
Full_Descriptions:
Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal is situated 350 metres from Glòries Shopping Centre, in the modern 22@ district of Barcelona. It offers an elegant restaurant and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and TV.

Rooms at the Four Points Barcelona Diagonal are bright and spacious, with wooden flooring. Each room has a stylish bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Rooms on higher floors offer great views, some of the Sagrada Familia.

La Avenida Restaurant serves traditional Spanish cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast is offered daily, and free coffee is available from 05:00 until 07:00. Taste local crafted beers, snacks and enjoy the best sports projections at 4Taps Bar.

The Four Points Diagonal is 600 metres from the colourful Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel. There are many bars and restaurants on nearby Rambla del Poblenou, and Bogatell Beach is within a 15-minute walk. Poblenou Metro Station is only 500 metres away.

Set on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, the Hesperia Barcelona Presidente offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. There is a gym and a terrace offering city views.

This hotel has views of the city.

The Hesperia Barcelona Presidente is close to a shopping area, and the main sightseeing bus stops just 50 metres from the hotel. The popular Illa shopping centre is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Diagonal Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, and offers a direct link to Plaza Catalunya. Gaudi’s La Pedrera and fashionable Passeig de Gracia can be reached in about 15 minutes on foot.

Featuring free Wi-Fi and air conditioning or roof fans, Lodging Apartments Sagrada Familia is located within 5 minutes’ walk of Sagrada Familia and Plaza Gaudí Park. Set in Barcelona’s centre, these modern apartments offer a ticket service and tour desk.

Offering stylish and colourful décor, the apartments include a living-dining room with a flat-screen TV. The kitchenette is equipped with a washing machine and oven, and the bathroom comes with a bathtub. Towels as well as bed linen are provided.

Please check the excluded costs for cleaning fee and tourist tax: they are separate from the total rent amount, but clearly displayed before confirming the final payment. Lodging Apartments Sagrada Familia is centrally located and there is a wide range of shops, bars and Catalan restaurants within a 10-minute walk. Sagrada Familia and Sant Pau metro stations are within the same distance.

Arc de Triomf Train Station is 3 km from the property, as well as Port Olimpic and the Mediterranean beaches. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

These stylish apartments and rooms are located in the chic Eixample district of central Barcelona, just 350 metres from the famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and Metro Station. They offer a plasma TV and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned Weflating City Center are spacious, bright and offer two or three bedrooms. The modern kitchen includes a washing machine, oven and a dishwasher.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes- walk of the apartments, and many of the city’s most popular monuments can be reached easily by foot.

Gaudi’s La Pedrera and La Rambla are both just 10 minutes’ walk away. The Barceloneta area with its beach can be reached by metro in around 10 minutes.

Direct buses to El Prat Airport run from outside El Corte Ingles department store on Plaza Catalunya Square, 600 metres away. Various buses, trains and metros also run from here.

Well set in Barcelona, Hotel Raval House provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. 2.5 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach, the property offers a terrace and a bar. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach.

At the hotel, every room comes with a wardrobe. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, certain units at Hotel Raval House also provide guests with a city view. All units at the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Raval House include Boqueria Market, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

Set just off Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, 3 minutes’ walk from central Plaza Catalunya, Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup  features a seasonal outdoor pool with a south-facing terrace, a poolside snack bar and a chill-out area.

Housed in a modernist building, all bright and spacious rooms come with a flat-screen satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast App, free WiFi and tea and coffee facilities. Some have a private terrace with a private pool. Room service is available.

The spa at Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup features a relaxation area. It includes a sauna, a steam bath and a hot tub. Massage and beauty treatments are also available.

The hotel’s restaurant, Pelai Restaurant, offers Catalan market cuisine. Dishes cooked on a coal stove are available at the Pelai terrace, a rooftop terrace with a chill-out area with panoramic city views. A buffet breakfast is offered every morning and, on weekends, it is available until 11:00.

In the summer months, the terrace is open until 00:00 and has a summer menu, as well as cocktails and milkshakes.

Located between the Gothic Quarter and the fashionable Born district, this stylish hotel has a fitness centre and free WiFi in all areas.

Barcelona Cathedral is just 200 metres from the Ilunion Almirante, and guests can walk to the famous Las Ramblas in less than 10 minutes. Jaume I Metro Station is 300 metres from the hotel.

Rooms feature wooden furniture and an en suite bathroom with marble finishes. They all include a large flat-screen TV with satellite channels, safe and minibar.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

The Ilunion Almirante features a stylish breakfast room where an à-la-carte breakfast is served daily. Room service is available during limited hours.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

SM Hotel Teatre Auditori is located opposite the Catalan National Theatre, close to Glòries and Monumental Metro Stations. This stylish hotel features rooms with satellite TV.

The Auditori has bright, attractive décor. Each air-conditioned room has a desk and a safety deposit box.

Breakfast is served in the hotel café.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s attractions, as well as arrange bicycle and car rental.

Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel, while Glòries Metro is just 4 stops from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas.

Located just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, Gallery Hotel offers a free sauna and gym, and a seasonal rooftop terrace with a pool and city views. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and free water on arrival.

This elegant hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms include amenities, a hairdryer and a bathrobe.

The Gallery’s restaurant has an attractive garden terrace where you can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel also has a bar and a café.

Gallery Hotel is situated next to the gardens of Palau Robert, a gallery and tourist information centre. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is a 3-minute walk away, while nearby Diagonal Metro Station provides direct access to the Sagrada Familia. Regular airport trains stop 600 metres away at Passeig de Gracia Station.

Hotel Turin Barcelona is located just 50 meters from the famous Ramblas in Barcelona. It offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception, free luggage storage and a lovely sun terrace. There is free water, coffee and tea in the lobby lounge.

It features stylish rooms with wooden floors and furnishings. They are equipped with a private bathroom, hairdryer, safe, Smart TV and minibar.

The Turin Hotel is located just 150 meters from the Gothic District, 3 minutes from the Liceu metro and a 20-minute walk from the beach. In the area there are several restaurants, shops and supermarkets open until late.

The hotel offers a fabulous breakfast buffet. Most of the food items come from La Boquería Market, located 2 minutes' walk away.

SmartRoom Barcelona is an eco-friendly economy hotel located in central Barcelona, 1 km from Sants Train Station. Decorated in a modern style, each room here will provide you with a flat-screen Smart TV with satellite channels. This hotel has been awarded the Green Key for their sustainable and environmental friendly business.

The air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi access. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Extras include a desk and bed linen.

A buffet breakfast is available daily. Other facilities offered at the property include a vending machine with drinks and snacks. At SmartRoom Barcelona you will find a 24-hour front desk.

Plaza de Sants is 450 metres from SmartRoom Barcelona and Sants Train Station is 15 minutes' walk away. The hotel is 1.5 km from Camp Nou and Magic Fountain of Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes' drive away.

Ronda House is set just off Ronda Sant Antoni Avenue, 10 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas. This hotel has a restaurant and rooms with satellite TV.

The Ronda features bright, simple décor. Its air-conditioned rooms have fully equipped private bathrooms.

A daily buffet breakfast is served in the Ronda’s café which includes a variety of coffees and pastries. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant and the bar.

The MACBA Art Gallery is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Sant Antoni Metro Station is 200 metres from the hotel and connects guests to sights such as Gaudí’s Sagrada Familía and Casa Batlló in less than 15 minutes.

Situated in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and 800 metres from the centre, Casa Lolita features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. The property is set 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach, 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 700 metres from Tivoli Theatre. The accommodation offers a lift, a shared kitchen and luggage storage for guests.

At the guest house, every unit is fitted with a wardrobe. Some units have a balcony and/or a patio with city or inner courtyard views. All units in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV with streaming services and with satellite channels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Casa Lolita.

Hotel Lloret Ramblas is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, just outside Plaza Catalunya Square. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Each functional room at the Lloret Ramblas Hotel features a work desk and a private bathroom with amenities. Some rooms also have a private balcony.

Breakfast is served in Hotel Lloret Ramblas’s beautiful lounge-dining room, which dates from the early 20th century. The reception area has a free PC with internet and a free safe.

Barcelona Cathedral and the MACBA Modern Art Museum are both around 500 metres from Hotel Lloret. Catalunya Metro Station is a 1-minute walk away, and direct airport buses stop within 100 metres.

Barcelona Travel is located in a Modernist building from the XIX century in the centre of Barcelona, a little over 5 minutes' walk from Gran Vía Avenue and Plaça Universitat Square. Free WiFi access is available.

Each modern, air-conditioned room features parquet floors and a 40-inch flat-screen TV. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Tourist information can be provided at the reception, and bikes and car rental are also available. Transportation to Barcelona El Prat Airport, located 20 minutes away by car, can be arranged.

The guest house is 850 metres from Passeig de Gracia Station, and Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes away on foot.

Occidental Barcelona 1929 features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Occidental Barcelona 1929 all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Sants Railway Station is less than 1 km from Occidental Barcelona 1929, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

The Aparthotel Senator Barcelona is situated on Via Augusta, in a pleasant residential area, a 2-minute walk from Muntaner Train Station. It includes air conditioning, heating, and free Wi-Fi in hotel rooms.

All rooms and apartments have a TV, telephone, and a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower. The apartments also include an equipped with kitchenette.

A 6-minute train ride will take you to Plaza Cataluña and Barcelona city centre. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 3.3 km away.

Hotels: RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles
Full_Descriptions:
RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles is set in the centre of Barcelona’s old town, a few metres from Las Ramblas. This stylish hotel offers free WiFi and rooms with satellite TV.

 RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles features contemporary design and modern rooms decorated elegantly. Each room has air conditioning, a minibar and a desk.

 RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles is ideally situated for visiting Barcelona’s main attractions. There are several restaurants, bars and cafés in the nearby Gothic Quarter and the famous Boquería Market is less than 100 metres away.

Barcelona Port is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the city’s cathedral is one kilometre away. Liceu Metro Station and Liceu Theatre are a 1-minute walk from the  RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles.

Located right opposite Barcelona Cathedral, this grand, neoclassic hotel is a 5-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. It offers free WiFi, and some rooms have excellent views of the cathedral façade.

The stylish air-conditioned rooms at the Colón Hotel Barcelona have satellite TV and a minibar. There is a safe and work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. Superior rooms also have a Nespresso coffee machine.

The hotel boasts an outdoor terrace café in the square, facing the cathedral. The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Catalan cuisine and international dishes, and room service is available.

Guests can also enjoy the roof-top terrace with views of the cathedral

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

Ilunion Les Corts Spa features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Ilunion Les Corts Spa every room comes with bed linen and towels.

A gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Camp Nou is less than 1 km from Ilunion Les Corts Spa, while Sants Railway Station is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Plaza España, from where the shuttles leave to the Montjuic field.

Just 3 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s famous Ramblas, Hostal Levante Barcelona offers free WiFi and a 24-hour reception. Air-conditioned and heated rooms have a private bathroom, fan and work desk.

Hostal Levante Barcelona guest house has a vending machine where drinks are available. Many cafés and restaurants can be found in the immediate surroundings.

Luggage storage is offered and there is a safe for guest use. The multilingual staff can help with things to see and do in Barcelona. Lively Plaça Reial is just 100 metres away.

Located in the heart of Barcelona, Vincci Gala hotel offers luxurious rooms in a protected 19th-century palace. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The orginal façade, floor and central staircase of this unique hotel have all been preserved, creating a balance of traditional arquitecture and modern design.

The air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries, and bath or shower. The rooms also come with a free laptop safe, extra large beds, satellite TV with pay-per-view channels, and a minibar.

A restaurant and snack bar are available on-site, and the hotel offers a breakfast buffet. Laundry and car rental services are available at a surcharge, and the property can provide tourist information.

Vincci Gala hotel is located opposite Urquinaona Metro Station, 2 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya Square.  There are many bars, restaurants and shops in the surroundings, and you can reach Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes by metro.

Less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, BcnStop Sagrada Familia is a sustainable property set in Barcelona and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. There is a private entrance at the aparthotel for the convenience of those who stay. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available close by. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the aparthotel.

La Pedrera is 2.8 km from BcnStop Sagrada Familia, while Casa Batllo is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Located in Barcelona's Plaza de España, Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza offers a seasonal rooftop pool and a terrace with panoramic city views. It also has a fitness room, beauty salon and free Wi-Fi.

The property is located next to Espanya Metro Station. In the square there are numerous bus stops that connect with other parts of the city, with the Fira Barcelona fairground and with Barcelona airport.

All spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, a safe and a private marble bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout, and Smart TVs with Chromecast apps are available. Choose one of the two clock suites and you will have incredible views of Montjuïc from the floor-to-ceiling windows. If you prefer, the hotel also has rooms and suites with private terrace.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza serves a daily buffet breakfast in the Simultáneo space, Barcelona's new meeting point that fuses cultural and leisure activities with the best gastronomic offer. Come to Simultáneo to telework with free wifi, to have an informal meeting, to enjoy a concert or to have an afterwork cocktail.

Do you already know the  Simultáneo Gastrobar? An avant-garde space that offers unique haute cuisine dishes. If you book half board, you can enjoy the Gastrobar menu during lunch or dinner.

The Filigrana restaurant specialises in modern Catalan cuisine made with local ingredients. You can also visit the Japanese restaurant Kurai or have a drink on The Clock terrace, overlooking Montjuïc.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza has a spacious business centre with 3 large conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, all equipped with the latest technology.

This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

Set in Barcelona, 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach, Hotel Omnium offers accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property.

The units at the hotel feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Omnium every room has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Tivoli Theatre, Cathedral of Barcelona and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from Hotel Omnium.

The stylish apartments at San Antoni Market are less than 5 minutes’ walk from Sant Antoni Metro station in central Barcelona. They offer smart accommodation with free Wi-Fi, just 200 metres from the market.

The spacious apartments at Sant Antoni Market combine modern décor with original features such as beamed ceilings or French doors. The living room has a sofa and a flat-screen TV, while the kitchen comes with a microwave, fridge, oven, a toaster and a coffee maker.

There is a range of shops, bakeries, bars and cafés in the streets surrounding the apartments. The famous Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya are within 20 minutes’ walk.

The MACBA Museum is less than 1 km from the apartments. Sant Antoni Metro Station is just 5 stops from the Sagrada Família. The airport bus stops on Comte d’Urgell and at Plaza Universitat, both within 15 minutes’ walk.

This iconic, Modernist building is located at the head of Barcelona’s chic Passeig de Gracia Avenue. It has a sauna and gym, and a roof terrace with a pool and excellent views.

The luxurious Casa Fuster is a monument in itself, built in 1908 by the Modernist architect, Lluis Domènech i Montaner, and has the status of Speciality Monument. His work, including the hotel, is a designated UNESCO World Heritage Site.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms at Casa Fuster G.L Monumento feature satellite TV and a minibar. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms have a hydro-massage bath.

The Casa Fuster Hotel has a stylish restaurant, which serves Mediterranean cuisine. Room service is available, and there is a jazz bar and rooftop chill-out bar.

There is a concierge service and 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

Attractively situated in the Horta-Guinardó district of Barcelona, Ilunion Bel-Art is situated 1 km from Sagrada Familia, 2.7 km from La Pedrera and 1.8 km from Park Güell. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Ilunion Bel-Art rooms include bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, vegetarian or vegan options.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the 24-hour front desk.

Casa Batllo is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Ilunion Bel-Art.

There is a gym and a rooftop chill-out terrace with a swimming pool and wonderful city views. It is located 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral, in the historic Gothic Quarter.

Each elegant room at the Barcelona Catedral Hotel features wooden flooring and air conditioning. Rooms have free WiFi, a laptop safe and flat-screen TV with international channels. Smoking is not allowed in any of the rooms, but there are common areas where smoking is allowed.

Creative Mediterranean cuisine is served in the hotel’s 4 Capellans restaurant, which offers a menu for celiacs. There is a wide range of restaurants and tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, including many in the popular El Born district.

Hotel Barcelona Catedral is 450 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square, while Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away.

Hotels: Claris Hotel & Spa GL, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
Full_Descriptions:
Located just off Barcelona’s prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, this luxury hotel offers city views from its rooftop pool. It also has a unique art collection.

Built in a converted 19th century palace, Claris Hotel & Spa GL combines the classicism of the original place with modern materials and it has over 400 original pieces of art on display, giving it the Specialit Monument status. It offers free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum, located next door.

The smart, soundproofed bedrooms feature stylish décor and hand-made furniture. Each one comes with LCD satellite TV, sofa and pieces of Roman, Egyptian and Hindu artwork.

The hotel’s Terraza del Claris Restaurant serves gourmet Mediterranean food on the roof terrace overlooking the characteristic rooftops of the Eixample quarter. The Os-kuro Sushi & Robata Restaurant offers classic recipes from Japanese gastronomy combined with Mediterranean ingredients and local produce.

All TV in rooms feature ChromeCast offering connectivity to platforms such as Netflix, Amazon Prime, Youtube, etc.

The Claris is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. The Ramblas is around 10 minutes’ walk away.

Stay in the refined elegance of the classic Hotel Continental Palacete, set in a renovated, 19th-century palace. Located right in the heart of Barcelona it is just 350 metres from Plaza Catalunya.

Guests have access to a free, 24-hour continental buffet with a variety of food and drinks.

Continental Palacete features luxurious, Baroque decor, with priceless chandeliers and elaborate frescoes.

Modern, air-conditioned rooms have free high-speed WiFi access, satellite TV, a fridge and a microwave. Their private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

The hotel lies on the elegant Rambla de Catalunya, just a 5-minute walk from the city’s main square of Plaça Catalunya. The surrounding streets are full of Barcelona’s distinctive architecture, smart restaurants and exclusive boutiques.

Featuring a rootop pool, this boutique hotel is located in Barcelona’s historic centre, close to Palau de la Música Concert Hall, the Cathedral and the Ramblas.

Ohla Barcelona features rooms with contemporary décor and large windows. They all include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The modern bathrooms come with bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms have views over the historic Gothic Quarter.

Romain Fornell is currently the head chef for all the culinary spaces at hotel Ohla Barcelona: Caelis restaurant, Vistro49, and La Plassohla. This last restaurant is specialised in catalan cuisine, offers tapas and small dishes. Guests can also have a cocktail in the famous Ohla rooftop bar.

The rooftop swimming pool offers fantastic city views with a chill out terrace. Other facilities at this hotel include a gym and a wellness area with a sauna.

The Ohla Barcelona is 300 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square while Urquinaona Metro Station is only 200 metres away. Passeig de Gracia Avenue and Gaudi’s modernist buildings are 10 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Situated in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Hotel Catalonia Port has a modern gym and a sun terrace with a small seasonal outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned room has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s contemporary El Racó del Port restaurant opens from Monday to Saturday, serving seasonal Mediterranean cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast, available until 12:00 at the weekends, is offered in the dining room, and there is also a lobby bar.

The Catalonia Port Hotel offers stylish rooms with hardwood floors. They all include a safe, a minibar and a private bathroom.

Catalonia Port is just 250 metres from the bottom of the famous Las Ramblas, and Port Vell Harbour is 400 metres away. Drassanes Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away.

Located 7 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, Hotel Constanza has a fantastic rooftop terrace (open from May to October) with views over Barcelona. It offers a 24-hour reception and rooms with smart décor and satellite TV.

Staff at the Constanza Hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. You can also hire a bicycle or car from reception.

The Constanza is 7 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana, a spectacular Modernist auditorium. Casa Batllo & la Pedrera are at 10-12 minutes walking distance form the Hotel. Urquinaona Metro Station & Plaza Catalunya Metro station are under 5 minutes’ walk away, connecting you with the rest of the city.

Featuring air conditioning, Casa Abamita offers accommodation in Barcelona. Plaça Catalunya is 600 metres from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

The accommodation offers studios and rooms. The studios are equipped with a kitchenette with a ceramic hob. Both roomms and studios have, a  flat-screen TV, microwave and fridge. All have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are featured.

Portal de l'Angel is 600 metres from Casa Abamita, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Casa Abamita.

Hotels: AC Hotel Victoria Suites by Marriott
Full_Descriptions:
Beautiful and stylish suites located in the heart of Pedralbes, one of the top residential areas of Barcelona and close to one of the city's main business districts.

AC Hotel Victoria Suites is ideal for business travellers due its location, for weekend breaks due its tranquil environment and excellent gastronomy offer as well for families due the spaciousness of the rooms.

It features a large terrace-bar, a high quality restaurant, friendly staff and many other details.

MH Apartments Sant Pau are located just 7 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s famous Sagrada Família, in Barcelona. These modern, air-conditioned apartments feature free WiFi and a flat-screen TV.

MH Apartments Sant Pau have parquet floors. There is also a washing machine and dishwasher. Bed linen and towels are provided.

There are various restaurants, bars and supermarkets located in the streets around the apartments. The charming Bohemian district of Gràcia is just 5 minutes' walk away.

The amazing Hospital de Sant Pau, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is just 8 minutes’ walk from the apartments. Located a 7-minute walk away, Joanic Metro Station connects you with Barcelona City Centre and the Gothic Quarter in under 10 minutes.

Private parking is available 300 metres from the property, for an extra cost.

Just 100 metres from La Sagrada Família, the stylish Gaudi Sagrada Familia apartments offer balconies and free Wi-Fi. They are situated within a 2-minute walk of Sagrada Familia Metro Station.

Each Gaudi Sagrada Familia apartment has a living-dining room with a sofa and a flat-screen TV. The kitchen includes a microwave, kettle and coffee maker. Some apartments have an oven.

Gaudi Avenue is lined with bars, restaurants and pavement cafés. A wide range of supermarkets and fast food outlets can also be found within a 5-minute walk.

The beautiful Sant Pau Hospital, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is 700 metres from Gaudi Sagrada Familia. Buses to the city centre and the beach stop next to the apartments.

Please note that this property offers apartments in different locations around Barcelona, near the Sagrada Familia District. Check-in takes place directly at your apartment. Please see the individual apartment descriptions for the address and more details.

Address: Rambla Catalunya, 101-103/ Carrer Aragó, 250.
Air-conditioned apartment with a double bedroom, a twin room and free Wi-Fi. It has a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom, dishwasher and washing machine. The well-equipped kitchen includes a fridge and microwave. Please note that the photos are of a selection of different apartments, all with similar characteristics. The apartments will be allocated according to availability

Set in Barcelona, 400 metres from Nova Icaria, Unite Hostel Barcelona offers accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hostel features family rooms.

At the hostel, all rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Popular points of interest near Unite Hostel Barcelona include Somorrostro, Bogatell and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from the hostel.

Offering free Wi-Fi, MH Apartments Gracia offers  bright, soundproofed apartments located in Barcelona’s Gracia District, 10 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia.

Featuring wooden floors, each soundproofed apartment has a living room with a sofa and satellite flat-screen TV. A dishwasher, oven and washing machine are included in the kitchen. Some apartments come with 2 bathrooms.

Private parking and an airport shuttle service are available at an extra cost and there is luggage storage.

A large variety of bars and restaurants can be found in the area, There is a 24-hour supermarket 500 meters from the apartments.

Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia and La Pedrera can be visited within a 20-minute walk. Fontana Metro Station, with connection to Plaça Catalunya and Barcelona’s historic centre, is 400 metres away.

The AC Hotel Irla is located 200 metres from Diagonal and Francesc Macià Square. The hotel has stylish and comfortable rooms, a fitness centre and 24-hour reception.

Rooms at this hotel are spacious and feature contemporary décor. All rooms have air conditioning, minibar and private bathroom.

Facilities at the Irla include Turkish baths, café-bar and free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

Guests can enjoy breakfast in the Irla’s restaurant. There are also bars, cafes and restaurants in the area surrounding Francesc Macià.

Attractions such as Casa Batlló, Casa Mila and Plaça de Catalunya are within 30 minutes’ walk of the AC Hotel Irla. The hotel is close to bus and tram connections and is a 20-minute walk from the Metro station, Diagonal.

Hotels: Hotel Bagués, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
Full_Descriptions:
A rooftop pool and bar with fantastic city views are offered at this 5-star boutique hotel, situated on Las Ramblas. Each stylish room displays a unique item of jewellery from the Masriera Museum.

Hotel Bagués is set in the restored El Regulador Palace, once a jewellery workshop, and it is built in a romantic, classical style, which gives it the Speciality Monument status. It still houses the Masriera Jewellery Museum.

Rooms are decorated in deep colours, with ebony furniture and details in gold leaf. An iPod dock, flat-screen satellite TV and free soft drinks minibar are included. Many rooms also have views of La Rambla.

Situated in the Gothic Quarter, Hotel Bagués is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. Just 300 metres away, Plaza Catalunya Square offers excellent bus and Metro links.

Modern fusion cuisine is served in El Regulador Bistro. This includes creative versions of typical Catalan dishes. Room service is available 24 hours a day.

Allegro Barcelona is a futuristic design hotel, situated 100 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station. Its stylish rooms include free Wi-Fi, digital radio and LCD TV with satellite channels.

Each room at Allegro Barcelona features elegant white décor with colourful touches. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with an electronic safe. Bathrooms include a hairdryer and toiletries.

A continental breakfast buffet is served until 10:30 each day at Allegro Barcelona. Numerous tapas bars and pavement cafés can be found on Rambla de Catalunya, a 5-minute walk away.

Other facilities include portable WiFi for no charge.

The famous Gaudi buildings and designer shops of Passeig de Gracia are just 500 metres from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk away. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Barcelona, recommend excursions and arrange airport transfers.

You Stylish El Born Apartments offer different locations within 15 minutes’ walk of Passeig de Sant Joan and Passeig de Gràcia. The nearest Metro Stations are Tetuán and Girona.

Each striking, modern apartment at You Stylish El Borne has minimalist, contemporary décor. There is free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and a spacious lounge with a flat-screen TV. The kitchen includes a microwave, fridge, a ceramic hob, oven, toaster and a coffee maker.

Several shops, supermarkets and cafes can be found in the surrounding streets. Passeig de Gràcia offers boutques and a range of restaurants.

Sights including La Sagrada Família, Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter can be reached easily by Metro.

Just 400 metres from Joanic Metro Station, these stylish apartments offer free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a kitchenette with a washer-dryer, oven and dishwasher. The building features a rooftop sun terrace.

Each bright, air-conditioned apartment has a spacious living-dining area with a sofa bed. All of them have a modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There is a small supermarket directly below the apartments, and L’Abaceria Central food market is just 250 metres away. You can find many shops, bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk.

Espais Blaus Apartments are situated in a quiet area of the popular Gràcia district. Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudi’s La Pedrera are just a 15-minute walk away.

Blanc Guest House is 8 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers an attractive terrace and smart rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV.

The rooms at Blanc Guest House are decorated in white, with parquet floors and white furniture. Each one comes with air conditioning, heating and a fan, and some have a private bathroom.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Car rental is also available from the front desk.

The Blanc is 8 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro Station, connecting you with the rest of the city with ease. Plaza Catalunya is just 2 stops away.

MH Apartments Suites is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, 500 metres from the prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers modern apartments with free Wi-Fi and international satellite TV.

The modern MH Suites feature smart décor and parquet floors. They all have a seating area with sofas, a flat-screen TV and DVD player.

The kitchens at MH Apartments feature an oven, hob and Nespresso coffee maker. There is also a washing machine.

Late check-out is available on request at MH Apartments Suites. There is 24-hour customer service, and check-in staff can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are under 10 minutes’ walk from the apartments. Girona and Verdaguer Metro Stations are both a 5-minute walk away, connecting you with the rest of the city.

Centrally located in Barcelona, Hostal Amra is a modern guest house only 100 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It offers free WiFi throughout.

The Amra features a Minimalist design and has a tour desk with ticket service. There is a terrace and coffee is available for guests. Bike and car rental  and luggage storage are offered.

All rooms have air conditioning and come with high-end mattresses, a TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony with views of the garden and the city.

Passeig de Grácia is 5 minutes’ walk away and plenty of places of cultural interest like Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within a short walk away. Parking is possible nearby for a surcharge.

Situated 5 minutes' walk from the Sagrada Familia, this stylish, modern hotel offers a 24-hour reception desk and free Wi-Fi access available throughout. Monumental Metro Station is 200 metres away.

Rooms at SM Hotel Sant Antoni feature parquet floors, a safe, work desk and flat-screen TV. Decorated in white, black and red tones, they have air conditioning and heating, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toiletries.

The Sant Antoni offers a continental buffet breakfast, and drinks and snacks are available from the vending machines. A wide range of cafés and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk.

SM Hotel Sant Antoni is 900 metres from L’Auditori Concert Hall and the National Theatre. Glòries Shopping Centre and Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard can both be reached within a 20-minute walk. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 10 minutes by bus or metro.

Located in Barcelona, 1.7 km from Bogatell, The Hoxton, Poblenou provides accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

Guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. The units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle.

Guests at The Hoxton, Poblenou can enjoy a à la carte breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Nova Icaria, Mar Bella and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from The Hoxton, Poblenou.

Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona features a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. A spa and wellness centre comprising a sauna, an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub, as well as a terrace can be used by all guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. The rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a patio and others also have city views. At Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or à la carte breakfast.

Park Güell is 2 km from Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona, while La Pedrera is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the hotel.

Located 150 metres from Barceloneta Beach in Barcelona, City&Beach Apartments features free WiFi and air conditioning.

The modern, two-bedroom apartments include a kitchen is equipped with a microwave and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are included.

You will find many restaurants, bars and supermarkets in the area.

Port Vell can be reached in 5 minutes' walk, and Barceloneta Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away.

Offering a year-round outdoor pool with city views, Ohla Eixample is a stylish boutique hotel located 10 minutes’ walk from two of Gaudi’s major works, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout and a Clef d’Or Concierge service.

Each well-designed room comes with a large bed and a private bathroom with bath or a rainfall shower. There is a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar with local delicatessen and a free safe for laptops. A turndown service is also available.

The on-site Michelin-starred Xerta Restaurant serves traditional recipes from the Ebro Region; and a complete breakfast is also served every morning including a huge selection of local products. The hotel also has the Lobby Bar, a meeting point for both locals and hotel guests; and the Sky Bar, a creative cocktail bar.

Guests can enjoy a selection of high-tech fitness equipment at the on-site gym; and beauty treatments and fashion services such as personal shopper are available on prior request.

Ohla Eixample is conveniently located in the Eixample District, in the modernist area locally known as Quadrat d’Or - Golden Square; within 5 minutes’ walk of the emblematic Diagonal Avenue, Rambla de Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia shopping boulevards. This urban building has an eye-catching ceramic façade, made from over 1000 carved pieces that represent Vivaldi’s Four Seasons.

Situated next to Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Station, this boutique hotel offers a stylish lounge. Rooms include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

The Sixtytwo Hotel is set in a typical 19th-century building. Each elegant room comes with a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. Some overlook Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, while others overlook the hotel´s charming Japanese-style garden.

A continental breakfast is served daily at a cafe nearby. Staff at the 24-hour reception can help arrange car hire.

This boutique hotel offers 45 spacious and stylish rooms. It is situated in Barcelona's famous Passeig de Gràcia, next to Diagonal Avenue, the city’s best shopping area, where you can also find a wide variety of restaurants and tapas bars.

Hotel Sixtytwo is across the road from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, and La Pedrera is just 3 minutes' walk away. It is just a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. Nearby Passeig de Gràcia Station offers Metro services and direct airport trains.

Hotels: Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia
Full_Descriptions:
Set in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sagrada Familia, Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia has an outdoor pool and a fitness centre. The 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi.

At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms include a city view. All rooms feature a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property.

Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia offers a terrace with views of Sagrada Familia.

Staff are ready to help around the clock. Guest can use the free bicycle service.

La Pedrera is a 14-minute walk from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia.

Set just 500 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas,  BUHO Boutique Barcelona offers charming, air-conditioned rooms, individually decorated with antique furniture. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

Rooms feature artwork and large windows, as well as a flat-screen TV, DVD player and DVDs. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have access to a pretty, shared terrace.

BUHO Boutique Barcelona also has a TV lounge. The guest house is surrounded by restaurants and bars.

Tourist information can be provided by staff, and both Barcelona Cathedral and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló are less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya and luggage storage is offered at the property.

Attractively located in Barcelona, Hotel Casa Sagnier features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms include a safety deposit box, while some rooms have a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Casa Sagnier include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Suite Place Barcelona Diputació has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 2.8 km from Nova Icaria Beach, 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach. Among the facilities at this property are luggage storage space and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A baby safety gate is also available for guests at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Suite Place Barcelona Diputació include Casa Batllo, La Pedrera and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

Aramunt Apartments offers modern, stylish studios 10 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station. It features free Wi-Fi, and a terrace with sun loungers and a small swimming pool of 5,5 metres by 1.

Aramunt offers bright, well-equipped studios for 2 to 4 people, They have air conditioning, a kitchenette with a washer dryer and a dishwasher, a dining area, and a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed. The bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

The property is just a few minutes' walk from numerous tourist attractions. On the nearby Passeig de Gràcia you will find world-famous examples of Modernist architecture, such as Casa Batlló and La Pedrera.

The cultural heart of the Catalan capital, around Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, is just a 10-minute stroll away.

As a guest of the Aramunt Apartments you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum. Pay public parking can be found next to the property and buses to Barceloneta's beaches stop outside.

Aparthotel Augusta offers good-value accommodation with free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. It is set in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi district and just 100 metres from Plaza Molina FGC Railway Station.

Rooms at the Aparthotel Augusta are simple and comfortable. They have a kitchenette with an oven, hob and a fridge. There is also a living area with a TV.

There are shops and supermarkets nearby. The Libertad Market also sells fresh, local food and is just 500 metres from the hotel.

The popular Gràcia district, which features a range of cafés, bars and restaurants, is just 10 minutes’ walk away.

Plaza de Catalunya can be reached in less than 15 minutes from Plaza Molina FGC Station, or from Fontana Metro, which is approximately 300 metres from the Augusta.

Hotel Cram Hotel is set in Barcelona’s central Eixample district, a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. It features a rooftop pool with city views and the Two Michelin Stars Angle Barcelona restaurant. All rooms have free WiFi and large flat-screen TVs.

The Cram Hotel Hotel is located in a building that dates back to 1892 and features a modernist façade, and a modern, elegant interior. Rooms boast advanced lighting and access control technology.

The air-conditioned rooms at Cram Hotel Hotel feature a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A bathrobe and slippers are available upon request. Rooms feature beds by Treca de Paris, and elegant curtains by Gastón y Daniela. Some rooms have a private balcony.

The Two Michelin Stars Restaurante Angle Barcelona offers modern dishes using fresh produce. Hotel Cram Hotel Barcelona also has a cocktail bar and poolside bar, and room service is available.

The hotel has a tour desk and 24-hour front desk. You can hire a bicycle or car.

Featuring free WiFi, Amra Barcelona Gran Via is located in Barcelona, within a 10-minute walk of Plaza Catalunya and Arc de Triomf. This guest house offers a shared terrace and garden.

Each air conditioned room at this guest house has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, free safe, and work desk, plus a minibar and coffee machine. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.

The property also offers a ticket service and  parking for an extra charge. Guests can make use of our chill-out sun terrace.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and grocery shops within a 5-minute walk from Amra Barcelona Gran Vía. Plaza Catalunya is 750 metres from the property, and Gaudi's Sagrada Familia is just 2 metro stops away.

Hostel New York is a youth hostel located in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, 5 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and free WiFi, 500 metres from Jaume and Drassanes Metro Stations.

The hostel’s simple dormitory rooms feature modest décor, bunk beds and individual lockers. They include access to a shared bathroom; and free bed linen are provided.

There is a kitchen available for guests in the evenings and a TV lounge with vending machines selling drinks and snacks. There are also 2 computers.

New York is ideally located for visiting many of Barcelona’s sights by foot. Ciutadella Park is a 10-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 15 minutes's walk away.

The ferry port bus is a 10-minute walk from the hostel and you can catch a bus to the airport from Plaza Catalunya Square, 20 minutes’ walk away.

Located on the fashionable Paseo de Gracia, within 5 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces Casa Battló and La Pedrera, Monument Hotel offers luxury services including a gourmet restaurant and a spa.

Elegantly decorated, all soundproofed rooms have a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels, Bluetooth sound system, and a safe deposit box with plug for charging laptop devices. Most of the room types have a private bathroom with a free-standing bath, velour bathrobe and luxury toiletries. Most of the rooms have a balcony with city views.

The 3 Michelin-starred restaurant, Lasarte, offers a range of options designed by the chef Martin Berasategui; while the on-site bistro-style restaurant, Oria, serves fresh cuisine following the Mediterranean gastronomy.

Monument Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas; regular trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from Paseo de Gracia Train Station, located 300 metres away. Free high-speed WiFi is provided.

The hotel is housed on Enric Batllo’s house, an architectural jewel of 19th century that constitutes one of the characteristic works of the Eixample Quadrat d'Or and which gives it the Specialty Monument status.

Barcelona Apartment Milà is centrally located, 7 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Joanic Metro Station. Each apartment is air conditioned and features free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV.

Apartments have one or two bedrooms and some have a sofa bed in the living room. All have a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The well-equipped kitchen includes a dishwasher and washing machine.

The Sagrada Familia is a 20-minute walk from the apartments. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes by Metro.

Mayerling Bisbe Urquinaona offers free WiFi and minimalist decor, set in the heart of Barcelona. Plaça Catalunya is 5 minutes' walk away.

Accessed by a flight of stairs, apartments come with air conditioning, heating and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. They all include kitchens equipped with a dishwasher, kettle, microwave and coffee machine.

You will find many restaurants, supermarkets and shops in the surrounding streets.

Barcelona La Rambla is a 5-minute walk from Mayerling Bisbe Urquinaona and the popular Passeig de Gracia with its shops is 500 metres away. Barcelona Airport is 30 minutes' bus drive away from Plaça Catalunya.

Located in Barcelona, 900 metres from Port Olympic, ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell features private parking and free WiFi access. The hotel has an outdoor pool and children's playground, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar.

A TV is available.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

You can play table tennis at the hotel. The hotel also offers bike hire. Picasso Museum is 1.5 km from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell.

Featuring a roof terrace and free Wi-Fi, Flor Parks is set on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, beside Liceu Metro Station. Located 200 metres from La Boqueria Market, it offers soundproofed rooms.

The Flor Parks' air-conditioned rooms have a balcony, satellite TV and a minibar. Their private bathrooms have hairdryers and some have hydromassage baths.

Set menu and à la carte dishes are served at the Hotel Flor’s restaurant. A continental breakfast is available. There is also a snack bar and café.

The hotel’s central location makes it perfect for exploring the city’s Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral is just 10 minutes’ walk away. The Port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are less than 1 km from the Flor Parks.

Ocean Drive Barcelona features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Eixample district of Barcelona. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a seasonal outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a selection of international cuisine in the in-house restaurant.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Ocean Drive Barcelona also offer free WiFi. All guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation.

Guests will have free access to Urquinaona Holmes Place Gym, 800 metres from the hotel. Ocean Drive Barcelona offers a terrace.

Casa Batllo is 300 metres from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Vincci Marítimo is located 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and the CCIB Convention Centre. It offers bright, stylish rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi throughout.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Marítimo feature modern décor, with parquet floors and relaxing images of the sea. They come with a pillow menu and the private bathrooms contain a hairdryer. Rooms offer views of the charming Japanese Zen garden or Diagonal Mar Park.

The hotel’s Jardí de Mar Restaurant serves Mediterranean food using fresh ingredients. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. The Ikebana Lounge Bar offers snacks, tapas and cocktails which can be enjoyed on the terrace.

The hotel’s reception is open 24 hours a day, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Laundry and car rental services are also available from the front desk.

The Vincci Marítimo is just 500 metres from Mar Bella Beach. Selva de Mar Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel, connecting you with the city centre in 15 minutes.

Located next to Plaza Catalunya Station, You Stylish City Center Apartments offers modern apartments with air conditioning and free WiFi. These luxury apartments are, and just a 1-minute walk from Las Ramblas.

Each apartment is spacious and bright, with heating and elegant contemporary décor. The modern kitchens include a ceramic hob, dishwasher and kitchenware.

Guests have access to a 24-hour concierge service.

There are numerous restaurants and shops within a 2-minute walk, including El Corte Inglés supermarket. The You Stylish tour desk provides visitor information, and there is a Tourist Office just 150 metres away. There is a swimming pool and gym nearby available for guests at an extra cost.

Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop only 50 metres from the apartments. Plaza Catalunya Station offers direct Metro links to all areas of Barcelona, as well as trains to the Pyrenees and the Costa Brava.

This modern hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned suites with a separate seating area, private balcony, free WiFi and 2 TVs. The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

There are several restaurants within a 5-minute walk from Guitard Grand Passage. Also, the hotel is only 500 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station.

There are good transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, located around 15 minutes’ walk away.

Set in the heart of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym with a sauna, and a rooftop terrace with city views. from its two terraces with jacuzzi.

The Arai is set in an 18th-century building and features stunning frescos on the façades, which are part of the architectural Heritage, historical and artistic of Barcelona, which gives it the Speciality Monument status.

Rooms feature a stylish, rustic décor with exposed stone walls and large windows. The air-conditioned rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. They have a sofa and a small kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Private bathrooms include free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Aparthotel Arai features Restaurant Palosanto, a classic tavern offering  tapas and Kokka, the first Peruvian bar in Barcelona.

Las Ramblas Avenue and Liceu Metro Station are just 5 minutes’ walk away. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 950 metres away. Barcelona’s Port Vell is 10 minutes’ walk from Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior.

These modern décor apartments are located in Barcelona city centre, next to Passeig de Gracia Avenue and within walking distance of Gaudi’s most famous Modernist buildings.

Barcelona Apartment Val features air-conditioned 1, 2 or 3 bedroom apartments. Each one offers plenty of natural light and views of the city.

Apartments also include a comfortable seating area with sofa and flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom.

Guests have free access to an outdoor pool located in Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, 300 metres away.

Set in Barcelona’s main shopping district, the apartments are well connected by public transport to all main tourist attractions in Barcelona. Apartments are situated 10 minutes’ walk from both the Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas.

Set on Las Ramblas and next to Plaza Catalunya, the Hotel Continental offers charming rooms with free high-speed Wi-Fi and a fridge. A free continental buffet is available 24 hours a day.

Decorated in pink, the Continental's air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A microwave and crockery set are provided, and guests are welcome to fill the in-room fridge with food from the buffet.

Hotel Continental Barcelona operates a 24-hour reception, allowing guests flexibility during their stay. Currency exchange and car rental can be arranged at the hotel’s tour desk.

The hotel is a 1-minute walk from Catalunya Metro Station. The Raval and the Gothic districts are a 10-minute walk from the Continental Hotel. Barcelona’s Museum of Contemporary Art is 300 metres away.

Located 150 metres from Llacuna Metro Station, Derby Republica offers modern loft-style apartments featuring exposed brick walls. Guests have access to a rooftop pool and sun terrace with views over Barcelona.

The air-conditioned apartments at Derby include a kitchen equipped with a microwave, hob, fridge and dishwasher. There is also a washing machine, and bedding and towels are provided.

The Republica has a concierge service that can help organise activities such as tours and water sports. Guests can also enjoy free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

Glories Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away from Derby Republica. The beach and Poble Nou Park are also just 15 minutes’ walk away.

These stylish, air-conditioned apartments offer a well-equipped kitchen, free Wi-Fi, a covered balcony and a spacious lounge-dining room with flat-screen satellite TV. They are a 2-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya Square and Barcelona University.

Apartamentos Ramblas – Plaça Catalunya are set in a typical 19th-century building with large windows and elegant wooden floors. Kitchens include an oven and ceramic hob, a dishwasher and a washer-dryer.

The Ramblas – Plaça Catalunya Apartments are just 350 metres from the famous Las Ramblas. The Gothic Quarter and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló are both within a 10-minute walk of the apartments.

You can find a wide range of shops, bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets. Plaça Catalunya Station is 200 metres away, while airport buses and tour buses stop 400 metres away.

Set in an elegant, neo-classical building, these simple, stylish apartments are just 500 metres from Barcelona's central Plaça Catalunya Square. They offer free Wi-Fi access.

The spacious Mayerling Schumann Barcelona are situated 50 metres from Urquinaona Metro Station. The UNESCO-listed Palau de La Musica Catalana Concert Hall is a 5-minute walk away. Las Ramblas and Barcelona Cathedral are also within 600 metres.

Full of natural light, each Mayerling Schumann Barcelona apartment comes with minimalist decor and wooden floors. All apartments include a kitchenette and basic cooking utensils. Bed linen and towels are also provided. Please note that apartments are accessed  by a flight of stairs.

The reception is located at Ronda of  Sant Pere 22 in the Hostal Mayerling Center.

Apartments Sixtyfour are situated on Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, opposite the famous Gaudi building, Casa Batlló. These design apartments have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

Apartments Sixtyfour are a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya Square and Las Ramblas. The apartments are next to Passeig de Gracia Station. This Metro and train station offers direct links to Barcelona Airport. The property offers information on other touristic options in the city.

Each apartment has wooden floors and elegant modern décor. Living areas come with a double sofa bed. The stylish kitchens include an oven, ceramic hob and dishwasher.

A continental breakfast is served in a cafeteria nearby.

Bed linen and towels are included in all apartments. Basic cleaning products and cooking items are also provided. Several supermarkets can be found within 800 metres of the apartments.

These stylish apartments are on Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia, in the heart of the Eixample. Each comes with free Wi-Fi, plasma-screen satellite TVs and a modern kitchen.

Suites Center Barcelona offers apartments with DVD and CD player, washing machine and a kettle. They feature full heating and air conditioning, soundproofing and a bathroom with shower.

Private parking is available at Suites Center Barcelona. There is also 24-hour reception.

The Suites are only 20 metres from the Modernist Casa Fuster, a short walk from the popular Gràcia neighbourhood. Diagonal Metro Station is 200 metres away and offers direct access to Plaça Catalunya and the Rambla.

Vincci Bit is located just 10 minutes walk from Mar Bella beach. Situated a 7-minute walk from El Maresme Forum Metro Station, it features a sauna, a gym and a rooftop swimming pool with city views.

The restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and à la carte meals, including gluten-free products. There is also a lounge, bar and room service available.

The air-conditioned rooms at Vincci Bit are bright and comfortable and feature a flat-screen TV, a pillow menu and a minibar. The private bathrooms include a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is also available.

There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops within a few minutes walk from the hotel. Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away.

The International Convention Centre (CCIB) is a 9-minute walk from Vincci Bit. The historic centre of Barcelona can be reached in just 15-minutes by metro or tram.

The Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is set in a historic 19th-century building by La Boqueria Market, 10 meters from Las Ramblas, and offers free high-speed WiFi and free bicycle use (subject to availability).

Each room at the Petit Palace Boqueria Garden includes a flat-screen TV and laptop safe, and a private bathroom. The hotel also offers an electric scooter hire service, subject to availability.

The hotel's bar is set by a private courtyard and garden with hundred-year-old trees, a listed site of architectural heritage in Barcelona.

Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is located in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, just a 1-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station, offering convenient transport around the city. Plaça Catalunya Square is 800 meters away, and you can walk to Barcelona Port in 8 minutes.

Offering free WiFi access, Free Hostels Barcelona is located in central Barcelona, 700 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro. Gaudi's La Pedrera Building is a 23-minute walk away.

Rooms here will provide you with memory foam mattresses, air conditioning, sockets, reading lights, lockers, and a safe. A shared bathroom with free toiletries is located inside the dormitory. Bed linen is included, and towels can be hired for a surcharge.

At Free Hostels Barcelona you will find a 24-hour front desk, a shared TV lounge and a shared kitchen. The property can provide a ticket service and a tour desk.

Camp Nou Stadium is a 30-minute walk from the property and La Rambla is a 25-minute metro ride away. Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 45 minutes on public transport.

This elegant hotel is 250 metres from Paseo de Gracia Metro Station and Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is a 5-minute walk away. It offers free Wi-Fi.

Set in an attractive building, dating from 1888, rooms at the Acta Atrium Palace are modern and chic, with air conditioning and satellite TV. The private bathrooms offer free toiletries and a bathrobe.

The hotel has 24-hour room service.

Gaudí's famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are 10 minutes' walk away. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car at the hotel tour desk. Public parking is available nearby.

The Atiram Oriente is located on Las Ramblas, between the Liceu Theatre and the Columbus Monument. Set in a 19th-century building, this hotel features a restaurant, terrace and free Wi-Fi.

All rooms have satellite TV and an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Each has simple, contemporary décor with heating and air conditioning.

The hotel’s pretty restaurant serves buffet cuisine and a daily continental breakfast. There is a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. The Atiram Oriente Barcelona also has a café on the Ramblas, close to many shops and restaurants.

The famous Boquería Market and Gothic Quarter are just a few minutes’ walk from the Hotel Atiram Oriente. Barcelona’s Port Vell is less than 500 metres away and Liceu Metro Station is 1 minute walk from the hotel.

Situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, Hostal Benidorm offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Liceu Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

Each room at the Benidorm Hostal features simple décor and tiled floors. All rooms have central heating and a private bathroom.

Drinks and snacks are available from vending machines in the Benidorm’s reception area. Staff at the front desk can provide information about the city and arrange car or bicycle rental.

Hostal Benidorm is located just outside the historic Gothic Quarter. Gaudi’s Palau Güell is 100 metres away, while the Boqueria Market is within 400 metres. Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 25 minutes’ walk or a 10-minute bus.

Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a solarium, Room Mate Anna is set in Barcelona City Centre. The hotel features cutting-edge and modern design as well as personalized service. The hotel serves a daily hot and cold buffet breakfast until midday.

Each stylish, air-conditioned room comes with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day as well as a balcony with views over Casa Batlló. Extras include a wide variety of free toiletries, a hairdryer and safe box.

Other facilities include a portable WiFi and meeting and conference rooms.

On the eigth floor of the hotel the bar Terraza de Anna by Vida Mona offers views over the city, cocktails and mediterranean tapas.
 The restaurant Vibra Speakeasy, inspired by the style of 1920, offers live music, food and cocktails from that time.

The Room Mate Anna is set in the heart of L'Eixample, just 100 metres from Casa Batlló. You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and cultural spots. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Sants offers modern, great-value accommodation. These apartments are conveniently located on a quiet street near Barcelona Sants station.

These stylish apartments have a full kitchen, a bathroom and comfortable living rooms. They all have free wired internet access.

Plaça Espanya and Montjuïc are just a short walk from the apartments. The famous Camp Nou football stadium is also nearby.

The Inside Barcelona Apartments Sants have excellent public transport links to travel around the city. The airport train stops at Sants station, just 400 metres away.

The apartments are 12 minutes' walk from Plaza Espanya and the Fira Exhibition Centre. Just beyond is Montjuïc Hill, where you can find the MNAC Modern Art Museum and Miró Foundation.

This establishment is housed in a building of great artistic interest, built at the beginning of the 19th century.

The building is tranquil and comfortable and has conserved part of its original decoration. On offer here is simple accommodation combined with a warm and cosy atmosphere.

Pension 45 is perfectly positioned in the centre of the old town, with good connections to the public transport network, enabling you to move within and around the city. The Renfe train station is only metres away from the accommodation. This is the ideal place from which to see the heart of Barcelona and benefit to the maximum from its culture, shopping and nightlife. Nearby are also the MACBA, Las Ramblas, Plaça Catalunya and the central University building.

Catalonia La Maquinista is ideally located next to the La Maquinista Shopping Centre in Barcelona’s Sant Andreu District. Plaza de Catalunya is just a 15-minute Metro journey away.

The Maquinista’s bright rooms have air conditioning and flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. All rooms have a work desk and safe. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

The hotel restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for lunch and dinner. The neighbouring Maquinista Shopping Centre has a selection of cinemas, a bowling alley, as well as cafés and bars.

Catalonia La Maquinista is 500 metres from Barcelona’s ring road, the B10 Ronda del Litoral, connecting guests to the beach in 10 minutes.

Sant Andreu Metro and Railway Station is just a 10-minute walk from Catalonia La Maquinista and has direct trains to Passeig de Gràcia and to El Prat Airport. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 8 Metro stops away.

As with reservations of more than 4 rooms, special conditions and supplements will apply to those of more than 8 nights.

Set in a Modernist building on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, You Stylish Diagonal Apartments is located just 120 metres from Francesc Macià Square. These modern apartments offer free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV.

The air-conditioned, soundproofed apartments feature stylish décor with design furniture and parquet floors. Each one has a lounge-diner with a sofa, and the kitchens include a hob, oven, microwave and coffee maker. The bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

A swimming pool and small gym are located nearby, and surcharges are applicable.

A cleaning or babysitting service, as well as breakfast and other catering, are available for an extra charge. There are many shops, bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of You Stylish Diagonal Apartments.

You can walk to the top of the prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in 13 minutes from You Stylish Diagonal Apartments. Located 10 minutes’ walk away, Hospital Clinic Metro Station connects you with Sants Station in 2 stops and Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium in 4 stops.

Acevi Villarroel offers free high-speed Wi-Fi, a spa and a rooftop pool, open in summer. Located 400 metres from Urgell Metro Station, it is a 15-minute walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya.

Rooms at the Acevi have elegant décor and hardwood floors. All have a satellite TV.
