Hotel Acevi Villarroel’s spa is available for an extra charge. It includes a steam bath, sauna, Hammam and gym. Massages are available on request. You can also relax on a lounger on the sun terrace.

Acevi Villarroel is within a 10-minute walk of Barcelona University and the lively Raval district. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to the Sagrada Familia and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

These stylish apartments are located in Barcelona’s El Born district, 3 minutes' walk from the Picasso Museum. Each apartment offers free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Esparteria are bright and air-conditioned. They all have a spacious seating area and a modern kitchenette with an oven, hob and fridge.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Esparteria has a communal terrace (open during office hours), where guests can enjoy views of nearby Santa María del Mar Church.

Staff at reception can help organise your trip to Barcelona. Bicycle rental and a ticket service are also available.

The Esparteria is within 100 metres of the popular Passeig del Born. Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk away, and Ciutadella Park is 400 metres away. There are various restaurants, bars and supermarkets within a short walk.

Residencia Campus del Mar has an excellent location in Barcelona's Barceloneta neighbourhood, 200 metres from the beach. It features a fitness centre and free internet in rooms and public areas.

Each room at Residencia Campus del Mar has a kitchen area with a microwave and tea/coffee facilities. Most also have a TV.

Guests can make use of the library area and games room with snooker and table tennis at the Residencia. Private parking, a laundrette and 24-hour reception are available on site. Bicycles are available to rent, upon prior request.

There is also a range of vending machines.

Ciutadella Park and the Paseo Marítimo are within a 2-minute walk of Residencia Campus del Mar. Barceloneta Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The residence is open to the university community, including students, professors, researchers and administrative staff all year round.

Just 350 metres from Mar Bella Beach, Eurohotel Diagonal Port offers Mediterranean Sea views from its setting in Barcelona’s Poble Nou district.

Rooms at this hotel are spacious and feature contemporary design. All come with air conditioning, satellite TV. Free wired internet access is also available.

Facilities at Eurohotel Diagonal Port include a continental breakfast.

Eurohotel Diagonal Port is located 7 minutes’ walk from Poblenou Metro Station, which is just 5 stops from central Barcelona. The hotel is just over 2 km from Ciutadella Park and the Forum venue is a 20-minute walk away.

The hotel offers easy access to the 22@ financial district, close to Barcelona International Convention Centre and shops. There is a Metro station and buses stop within 5 minutes' walk of the hotel.

Located just off Las Ramblas and La Boqueria Market, Rambla 102 offers soundproofed accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Central Plaza Catalunya, and Barcelona Cathedral are both 500 metres away.

Modern and bright apartments and lofts with air conditioning and balcony, some with views of the Ramblas. They have a living-dining area with a sofa bed and a flat-screen satellite TV; and come with an open-plan kitchen equipped with a dishwasher, ceramic hobs and kitchenware. There is a washing machine, a dryer, and bed linen and towels are provided.

There are plenty of bars and tapas restaurants within a 2-minute walk of Rambla 102.

Centrally located, you can walk to the main Barcelona tourist attractions within 15 minutes. A 20-minute metro ride will take you to Sagrada Familia.

Situated in a pedestrianised street in the neighbourhood of Borne, Aparthotel Allada 3* offers a tranquil atmosphere due to the scarcity of street noise and the sound-proofing of the building.

Aparthotel Allada 3* is situated in a picturesque, historical area that has maintained the façades and arches of the 17th century, whilst incorporating the modern architecture of the 21st century. The apartments and studios have been designed to offer the greatest comfort and functionality during your stay. All also benefit from ample natural light throughout the day.

The Borne district is full of winding streets that form a labyrinth, allowing you to find some of the most intriguing areas in the old city. Close to the apartments, you will find the church of Saint Mary, the city gardens, the Picasso museum, the chocolate museum, the Cathedral, the market of Saint Catherine as well as many other sites of interest. In addition, you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

08028 Apartments are situated next to Les Corts Metro Station and 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Camp Nou Football Stadium. The modern apartments share a rooftop pool with views of Barcelona.

Apartments and suites at the 08028 feature contemporary design and free Wi-Fi. Apartments include a balcony, lounge area and a fitted kitchen.

The Taberna Lizarran at the 08028 Apartments serves traditional Spanish cuisine, including tapas.

The 08028 Apartments are a 15-minute walk from Sants Train Station. Plaza Catalunya and the famous Las Ramblas can be reached in around 20 minutes, by Metro.

Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub on its terrace, Sunotel Club Central is set in Barcelona’s elegant Eixample neighbourhood.

Each modern air-conditioned room has free, high-speed WiFi, a TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower and hairdryer.

Sunotel Club Central features a cosy bar, serving snacks and drinks. There is also room service available. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, and free bicycles are available upon request and subject to availability.

Passeig de Gracia, with its Gaudi monuments and designer shops, is a 10-minute walk from Sunotel Club Central. The famous Las Ramblas Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya are a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away, and you can catch an airport bus in Plaza Catalunya.

Located next to the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre, these bright modern apartments offer free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Plaza Espanya Square is just 50 metres away.

Each stylish Ding Dong Fira Apartment is decorated in light colours, with smart wooden floors. Apartments have a lounge with a sofa bed, and air conditioning and heating is available in the lounge only.

There is a well-equipped open-plan kitchenette with a washing machine, microwave, toaster, Nespresso coffee machine and utensils. Towels and bed linen are provided and there is a hairdryer.

A range of bars, restaurants and shops can be found within a 5-minute walk of the Fira Apartments by gaiarooms. The famous Magic Fountain and Las Arenas Shopping Centre are both within 100 metres.

Espanya Metro Station, 250 metres away, offers direct metro services within 10 minutes to Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Sants International Train Station is within a 500 metre walk of the apartments or can be reached by direct metro line. Buses to and from the airport, as well as city tour buses, stop 3 minutes' walk from the apartments.

Offering city views, Montserrat Apartments by gaiarooms is an accommodation located in Barcelona, 1.6 km from La Pedrera and 2 km from Casa Batllo. The air-conditioned accommodation is 200 metres from Sagrada Familia. The apartment features family rooms.

Certain units in the apartment complex have private entrance and are equipped with desk and wardrobe. With a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms are equipped with a terrace.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Montserrat Apartments by gaiarooms.

Glocal Apartments Barcelona offers stylish modern apartments 280 metres from Diagonal Avenue and a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

Each bright, air-conditioned apartment at Glocal Apartments Barcelona comes with a living room with flat-screen TV, and a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher. A washing machine, bed linen and towels are also included. The bathrooms have a shower.

There are numerous restaurants and bars in the area, as well as bus stops. The nearest metro station is Hospital Clinic, a 6-minute walk away.

The lovely Rambla de Catalunya Avenue, lined with trees and shops, is an 8-minute walk from the property. A 20-minute walk down the Rambla takes you all the way to Plaza Cataluña Square in central Barcelona.

Located in central Barcelona, Hostal Balkonis guest house offers a terrace, free Wi-Fi throughout. Sant Antoni Metro Station is just 80 metres away.

This property offers functional and modern rooms with a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries each. They all feature heating, air conditioning, flat-screen TV and a radio. Some have a balcony with garden and city views.

You can hire bicycles on site, allowing you to explore more of the city.

You will find bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets and the closest supermarket is just 30 metres away.

A 12-minute walk will take you to Barcelona’s La Rambla and Barceloneta Beach is 3 km away. Plaza de España, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport is 20 minutes’ walk from Hostal Balkonis.

Hostal Balmes Centro offers 24-hour reception with tourist information service, free WiFi and free luggage storage. It is located 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and from one of Gaudi's masterpieces, la Pedrera.

All rooms at Hostal Balmes Centro have a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a fridge. Rooms come with double or twin beds, and a private or shared bathroom with bath or shower. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided.

 You can find numerous restaurants and bars with traditional tapas in the surrounding area.

Car hire, bicycle rental and tours can be organized at Hostal Balmes Centro’s tour desk. Plaza Catalunya Square and Ramblas can be reached in 10 minutes’ walk and Casa Batlló House and Museum is 500 metres away.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 minutes’ drive away. Regular airport trains leave from a train station located just 550 metres away.

Suite Place Barcelona Còrsega features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia, 1.7 km from La Pedrera and 2.1 km from Casa Batllo. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Some of the units feature a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. At the apartment complex, some units are allergy-free.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available close by.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Suite Place Barcelona Còrsega.

Hotel Del Comte is 100 metres from Barcelona's Urgell Metro Station and 15 minutes walk from the Rambla and Plaza Espanya. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The air-conditioned rooms at Del Comte feature parquet floors and smart design. Each one comes with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Staff at the Del Comte Hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

There is a bus stop just 3 minutes’ walk from the Del Comte which provides transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport. It is only 2 stops on the Metro to Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square.

Situated in the charming Gràcia district, these elegant design apartments offer a balcony and a stylish kitchen with a ceramic hob, dishwasher and washing machine. Fontana Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned Gran de Gracia apartments feature sleek contemporary décor. Each one has a lounge with a flat-screen TV and 2 sofa beds. The modern bathrooms include a shower.

A variety of supermarkets, cafés and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk of the Gran de Gracia apartments. The surrounding streets are full of quirky boutiques and lively bars.

Gaudí’s Casa Vicenç is just 150 metres from the apartments, while Parc Güell is a 20-minute walk away. You can walk to Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in around 15 minutes.

Alma Barcelona is set in an attractive building just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia. It offers a spa, a stylish restaurant with a terrace, and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Alma Barcelona rooms feature smart, modern décor and leather armchairs. They are equipped with a flat-screen Loewe TV, Punkt phone, and the private bathrooms come with a bathrobe and slippers.

The Alma’s spa features an indoor pool, a Hammam and a sauna. There is a gym, and massage is also available.

Staff at the Alma’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions. On request, the hotel offers an airport shuttle service to Barcelona El Prat Airport, a 25-minute drive away.

The hotel is just one block from Gaudí’s La Pedrera and a 5-minute walk from Casa Batlló. You can walk to Diagonal Metro Station in 5 minutes, while Plaza de Catalunya is just over 1 km away.

Located in Eixample District, close to Hospital Clínic metro station and only 15 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s historic town, these modern décor apartments offer free Wi-Fi throughout.

Barcelona Apartment Villaroel features deluxe and executive 2-bedroom apartments. Each of them has a comfortable living-dining area with sofa and flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and well-equipped kitchen.

Numerous bars and restaurants as well as supermarkets can be found nearby. Barcelona main shopping district is just 10 minutes’ walk away.

You can reach Barcelona Sants AVE Train Station in less than 15 minutes' walk away or a short metro ride from Hospital Clínic metro station.

When booking more than 2 apartments, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

Hotels: Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@, an IHG Hotel
Full_Descriptions:
Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@ is situated in the city’s 22@ District, 300 metres from Llacuna Metro Station. This hotel features rooms with satellite TV and a continental buffet breakfast included in all rates.

The Barcelona City offers simple, contemporary décor throughout. Rooms are spacious and air conditioned.Some amenities and high touch items such as kettles, pens, note pads, etc have been removed from guest rooms as per Covid-19 hygienic and security regulations. In any case, all of these items are still available upon request.

The hotel offer free WiFi access to the guests. There is also a computer and printer for their use.

The City 22@ is ideally situated for visiting many of Barcelona’s attractions and the beach is less than one kilometre away. Plaza de Catalunya and the famous Las Ramblas can be reached in less than 20 minutes, by Metro.

Centric Apartments Paseo de Gracia provides accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. With quiet street views, this accommodation offers a balcony. In good weather, guests are welcome to sit outside.

Certain units in the apartment complex have private entrance and are equipped with desk and wardrobe. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. At the apartment complex, every unit includes a private bathroom and bed linen.

There is a snack bar and bar.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Centric Apartments Paseo de Gracia.

Hostal Fernando is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, 100 metres from Las Ramblas and the historic Plaça Sant Jaume. It offers air-conditioned rooms and dormitories with free Wi-Fi.

The basic rooms at the Hostal Fernando come with a TV, safe and a private bathroom.

Fernando guest house has a simple restaurant and bar. There are many bars and restaurants within a short walk.

The guest house has a tour desk, and bicycle and car rental are offered. Barcelona Cathedral, the Picasso Museum and the famous Boquería Market are all within a 10-minute walk.

Mesón Castilla is set just 100 metres from Las Ramblas and Plaça Catalunya Square in central Barcelona. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an attractive garden terrace where guests can enjoy breakfast.

Rooms at the Mesón Castilla include ornate beds, and some have a private balcony. They come with air conditioning and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel operates a 24-hour reception, allowing guests flexibility during their stay. The tour desk can organise excursions and car rental. There are safes available at the reception for an extra charge.

Barcelona’s Modern Art Museum is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. The historic Gothic Quarter, with its cathedral and many bars, can be reached in 10 minutes’ by foot.

Featuring an impressive lobby, the stylish Hilton Barcelona offers free WiFi, access to its 24-hour gym and rooms with city views and plasma TV. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

Each stylish, soundproofed room at the Barcelona Hilton features air conditioning, iPod docking stations and tea and coffee-making facilities.

Hotel Hilton Barcelona is just 100 metres from L’Illa Shopping Centre and 300 metres from María Cristina Metro Station. Plaça Catalunya and the historic city centre are 15 minutes away by Metro. You can drive to Sants Station in 5 minutes, and El Prat Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

Hilton Barcelona’s Mosaic restaurant offers Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine prepared using seasonal, local products. The Vibe Bar & Restaurant serves tapas and cocktails. Guests can enjoy live sport on the bar’s large TV.

Located in the heart of Barcelona, 300 metres from Plaça Catalunya, Amister Apartments offers 1-bedroom apartments with free WiFi.

Each apartment at Amister has a fully-equipped kitchen, completed with an oven and a dishwasher, opening onto a living-dining room with a sofa and a flat-screen TV. There is a washing machine and cleaning products are provided.

Shops, bars and dining options are in the surrounding streets.

Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located just 250 metres away.

Apartament Paseo de Gracia offers self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi in the heart of Barcelona, just 40 metres from Plaza Catalunya. Barcelona’s La Rambla is 5 minutes’ walk away.

These modern apartments feature stylish dècor and come with 1 or 2 bedrooms and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Their living areas include flat-screen satellite TV and sofas. Their kitchenettes are equipped with a microwave, washing machine and dishwasher.  Some come with a terrace.

Centrally located, you will find many bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Direct buses to Barcelona Airport depart from Plaza Catalunya and Sagrada Familia is 2.5 km from Apartament Paseo de Gracia. A 25-minute walk will take you to Barceloneta Beach.

Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas is situated in the centre of Barcelona’s Old Town, just 200 metres from Las Ramblas. It features a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool.

The hotel offers simple, attractive décor and rooms are spacious. Each has air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, as well as tea and coffee making facilities.

The Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas serves a daily, buffet breakfast. There are several bars, cafés and restaurants within walking distance of the property.

Guests can make use of computers with internet access, available in the hotel reception area. Staff at the tour desk can provide information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions and arrange car rental.

The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral and the city’s Gothic Quarter. The Old Port is around 700 metres from the hotel, whilst Liceu Metro is a 10-minute walk away.

In the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, close to Boqueria Market, Lodging Apartments Liceu G1 features free WiFi and a washing machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, 2 living rooms, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. A TV is featured. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Lodging Apartments Liceu G1.

Situated 150 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Mar Bella Beach, Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers sauna and gym, and a free WiFi zone. Each air-conditioned room features international satellite TV.

The hotel features a terrace with sea views and a seasonal infinity pool with hydromassage beds and seats. You can rent Balinese beds and sun loungers. There is also a seasonal snack bar, which is open from June to September.

Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers bright, functional rooms, many with views of the city or sea. They include a minibar, a free safe and a private bathroom with amenities.

The hotel’s Canela restaurant serves à la carte Mediterranean meals, and a varied breakfast buffet is available each morning. There are also many bars and restaurants on the nearby seafront promenade.

Regular bus services to central Barcelona stop outside the Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only, while Poble Nou Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away. The CCIB Conference Centre and Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre are just 1 km from the hotel.

Boutique Apartments 23 Barcelona is located in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 1.4 km from Casa Batllo, 1.3 km from Sagrada Familia and 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is situated less than 1 km from La Pedrera and provides a lift. The aparthotel features quiet street views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. There is also a fridge, kitchenware and a kettle. At the aparthotel, units include bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop and lounge.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.6 km from the aparthotel, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Boutique Apartments 23 Barcelona.

Hotel Serhs Carlit is located in Barcelona, 900 metres from the iconic Sagrada Família Basilica and Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms, all with free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV.

The Serhs Carlit is a 10-minute walk from Arc de Triomf, with Ciutadella Park and the trendy Born district just beyond. You can walk to the Agbar Tower in 15 minutes.

Tetuan Metro Station is just 200 metres away, just 1 stop away from Passeig de Gràcia. Estació del Nord Bus Station is 750 metres away.

The hotel has a café-bar serving a daily buffet breakfast, as well as snacks and drinks throughout the day. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, as well as offering restaurant recommendations.

Hotels: Bcn Paseo De Gracia Rocamora Apartment
Full_Descriptions:
Bcn Paseo De Gracia Rocamora Apartment has three different addresses: In Paseo de Gracia 51 there are several apartments with two and three bedrooms; Pau Claris street 97 is a 3-bedroom penthouse with a terrace and Caspe street 30 is a 2-bedroom penthouse with a terrace.

The three buildings are very close together and offer modern apartments with free Wi-Fi and a private balcony or terrace.

Air-conditioned and heated, the apartments include a living area with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. Each has a modern kitchen, equipped with an oven, dishwasher, and washing machine.

Bcn Paseo De Gracia Rocamora Apartment also includes a private bathroom with a bath or a shower. Hairdryer, towels and bed linen are provided.

Centrally located, the apartments are within a 10-minute of Las Ramblas, and La Pedrera in around 10 minutes away on foot. Regular airport train leaves from Passeig de Gracia Train Station, located within 200 metres of the apartments.

BYPILLOW House offers air-conditioned rooms with balcony and free WiFi and private parking. The property is 300 metres from Maragall Metro Station connected to famous Sagrada Familia and o the popular sandy Barceloneta Beach in Barcelona.

Fitted with wooden floor, bright rooms have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries and bath or shower. Suites come with 2 separate areas with 2 double beds.

Buses to the city centre leave from a bus station located 200 metres away. Plaza Catalunya is 30 minutes by public transports and you can reach fashionable Passeig de Gracia in 20 minutes by metro.

Some of these stylish apartments have  Mediterranean Sea views and free WiFi.

Decorated in light colours, the bright air-conditioned You Stylish Beach apartments feature private bathrooms, fully equipped kitchens and dining areas with a balcony. A flat-screen TV and a DVD player can be found in the living room.

Some apartments have access to a shared outdoor swimming pool and terrace.

Avinguda Diagonal Avenue and Selva de Mar Metro Station are both less than 600 metres from the apartments. Barcelona’s historic Gothic Quarter is just 6 metro stops away.

Offering a balcony and free WiFi, Victoria Diagonal Mar Barcelona is a self-catering accommodation located in Barcelona. The property is 1 km from the sea and 4 km from the Rambla and Placa de Catalunya.

The apartment features air conditioning, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 toilet and a seating area. There is a full kitchen with a dishwasher, washing machine and a microwave. A tumble dryer is also featured.

Victoria Diagonal Mar Barcelona is 4.5 km from from Maremagnum shopping centre and 4 km from Port Olympic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is located 18 km away. The property offers free parking.

Hotels: Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel
Full_Descriptions:
Set in 25,000 square metres of beautiful gardens and offering fantastic views of Barcelona, Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel is a luxury hotel set on Diagonal Avenue.

With unique experiences that will make this accommodation a benchmark in the Catalan capital, with access to the Palau de Congressos de Catalunya, the gardens of Torre Melina, and signature restaurants such as Erre Errechu and a cocktail bar by Erik Lorincz.

Spacious, air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries.

The Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel is 15 minutes walk from FC Barcelona Camp Nou stadium. Zona Universitaria Metro Stop is 450 metres away, connecting you with the city centre in under 20 minutes.

Opening dates of the hotel's different spaces: Erre Urrechu 21.02, Chroma 15.04, Gala Terrace Easter - End of March, Beso Barcelona Restaurant May, Rooftop June and Spa May.

Located at different locations near Plaza Catalunya, Fewdays Barcelona Apartments offers stylish, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. They feature a fully equipped kitchen.

The bright apartments feature a modern, minimalistic décor and parquet floors. Each one has a lounge area with a TV and CD player, and a kitchen equipped with an oven, microwave and coffee machine. The bathrooms include a washer-dryer.

Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia is around 5 minutes’ walk away and offers a range of designer shops, as well as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera houses. Central Barcelona offers a wide selection of restaurants and bars.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, which is also connected via many metro and bus lines to the rest of the city. Parking is available nearby for an extra cost.

Set on the corner of Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia, Victoria City Center Barcelona is a 5-bedroom duplex apartment. This stylish air-conditioned property has a balcony.

Featuring free WiFi, it offers 1 double bedroom, 4 twin bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with a hairdryer. A dishwasher, oven, washing machine and coffee machine can be found in the well-equipped kitchen, while the living room includes a sofa and flat-screen TV. A tumble dryer is also featured.

The famous La Rambla Boulevard starts 300 metres from Victoria City Center Barcelona. You can find a wide variety of bars, restaurants and designer shops on Passieg de Gracia, as well as Gaudi’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló buildings.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is located 13 km from the property and an airport shuttle service is available for a supplement. Catalunya Train and Metro Station is 50 metres from the apartment.

Hotels: Nice apartment BCN two rooms wifi
Full_Descriptions:
Nice apartment BCN two rooms wifi has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.5 km of Casa Batllo and 1.9 km of Passeig de Gracia. The property is around 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 2.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.7 km from Park Güell. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1.1 km away.

The apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available. The property offers garden views.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Nice apartment BCN two rooms wifi.

Key Barcelona HOUSING (Carrer Girona) offers accommodation within 1.5 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The rooms are equipped with a balcony with city views.

All units come with air conditioning, a toaster, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a desk. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Key Barcelona HOUSING (Carrer Girona).

Apartments Barcelona & Home Deco Centro offers comfortable apartments in different locations within the historical centre of Barcelona. It features balconies overlooking the city, elegant decor and free Wi-Fi.

Featuring a private balcony all air-conditioned apartments come with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Some provide a fully equipped kitchen with fridge and dishwasher, as well as a large living room with dining area. The bathrooms come with a shower or a bath. Some units have outdoor furniture and a dryer.

Apartments Barcelona & Home Deco Centro is approximately 1 km from the touristic ring of the city centre and the famous Sagrada Familia. La Rambla is within 1.5 km, while Plaça Catalunya is just a 10-minute walk away. Barcelona Airport is at a distance of 15 km.

Featuring air conditioning, DreamKeys Barcelona City offers accommodation in Barcelona. Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and Gaudís La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are a 10-minute walk away.

The property offers apartments and rooms. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are featured.

The property offers grocery delivery and packed lunches. You will also find many restaurants, bars and shops in the surrounding area.

Plaça Catalunya is 2 km from DreamKeys Barcelona City. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 12 km from DreamKeys - Barcelona City.

Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Llevant, The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a shared lounge and a business centre, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has a terrace and city views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.

All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a seating area. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels.

Speaking Catalan, Czech, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Nova Mar Bella Beach is 1.6 km from The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou, while Mar Bella Beach is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Apartamentos DV is located in Barcelona, 800 metres from Camp Nou. Palau Sant Jordi is 2.8 km from the property. Free private parking is available on site.

Offering views over a patio, each apartment comes with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen including a microwave, kettle and kitchenware. Apartments come with a bathroom with a double ended bath and hairdryer is available on prior request. Apartments are cleaned every day and bed linen and towels are provided. Superior apartments have a spa bath.

Plenty of restaurants, bars and shops are within 5 minutes' walk.

Montjuïc is 2.9 km from Apartamentos DV, while Casa Batllo is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 9 km from the property.

Located just 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya, Cotton House Hotel, Autograph Collection, A Marriott Luxury & Lifestyle Hotel, offers elegantly decorated rooms, free WiFi, a seasonal outdoor pool and an on-site restaurant.

Formerly the headquarters of the Association of Cotton House Manufacturers, the building features a beautiful vestibule, a conservatory, several lounges and a library.

On the sixth floor you will find the pool, as well as a gym and a massage room.

Air-conditioned rooms come with flat-screen TVs and a sofa. Their private bathrooms include free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Cotton House Hotel, Autograph Collection, A Marriott Luxury & Lifestyle Hotel has a stylish bar, as well as its own restaurant. Guests can also enjoy some Spanish Tapas on the terrace. You will find a wide range of dining options and shops in the surrounding streets.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is just 400 metres from the Hotel and trains to the airport stop there.

Set within 1.2 km of Santa Maria del Mar and 1.1 km of Picasso Museum, Àmfores Boutique Guest House provides rooms in Barcelona. Located around 850 m from Tivoli Theatre, the guest house with free WiFi is also 750 m away from La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is situated in the Ciutat Vella district.

All guest rooms in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room comes with a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

Àmfores Boutique Guest House is set in a building of medieval origin, located next to the Palau de la Música and the city centre.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Speaking Catalan and English, staff are ready to help at the reception.

Plaça Catalunya is 800 m from Àmfores Boutique Guest House. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from the guest house.

The accommodation offers a terrace with a small swimming pool (from may till october).

These modern, air-conditioned apartments are located on the tree-lined Rambla de Catalunya, just one block from Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Casa Batlló is 300 metres away.

Set in an attractive Modernist building, apartments have tiled floors and high ceilings. Each one has a modern kitchen with an oven, washing machine and dishwasher. There is a Nespresso Coffee Machine, and free capsules are provided. All have free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen and DVD player. Bed linen and towels are provided.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 2-minute walk of the apartments.

Central Suites Barcelona is just 400 metres from Plaza Catalunya where you can find regular buses to Airport; and a 5-minute walk from Ramblas. The closest metro station is Passeig de Gracia, 2 minutes’ walk from the apartment.

Centrally located, Som Nit Triomf features rooms with free WiFi and private bathroom. It is 800 metres from Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya as well as from Barcelona North Bus Station.

Rooms are fitted with traditional Catalan Modernist tiles and they all have a wardrobe. Some rooms have a balcony with city views. A kettle and ironing facilities are available on prior request at reception.

There is a plenty of restaurants, shops and trendy bars in the surrounding area and a 24-hour supermarket can be found 200 metres away.

Som Nit Triomf is located between the Eixample and Borne District, 450 metres from Arc de Triomf and Urquinaona Metro Stations.  You can walk to fashionable Passeig de Gracia in 10 minutes and the tree-lined Passeig de Companys connected to Ciutadella Park is just 150 metres away.

Offering a 1960’s vibe and rooms with vintage décor, this hotel is set in the heart of Barcelona, only 2 minutes’ walk from the famous Ramblas.  Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

Each air-conditioned room at Sixties Ramblas features a TV and a private bathroom. Most rooms have a balcony.

Sixties Ramblas has a bar and a restaurant. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide tourist information about the area. Bike rental services are also available, and there is also a stylish white billiards table.

The nearest Metro Station is Drassanes, only 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can also walk to the harbour or Plaza Catalunya Square in less than 10 minutes.

Sixties Ramblas is close to the Born district, with numerous trendy bars and restaurants serving local and international food.

Enjoy Apartments Borrell offers air-conditioned apartments with free WiFi, located within 15 minutes’ walk of both Plaza España and Plaza Universidad. MACBA Museum and the Raval District are 1 km away.

Each apartment at Borrell has a living-dining area with a sofa, a TV and a dining area with a dining table. The kitchen is completed with a dishwasher and kitchenware; while the bathroom includes a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided.

There are plenty of bars and shops within a 5-minute walk of the apartments, and trendy restaurants can be found at the Sant Antoni neighbourhood, 500 metres away.

Enjoy Apartments Borrell is also well connected by public transport. The closest metro station is Urgell, 6 minutes’ walk away.

Four Petals Barcelona Boutique Apartments features accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is situated 2.3 km from Somorrostro Beach and provides a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Four Petals Barcelona Boutique Apartments.

This modern hotel offers free WiFi and spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. NH Barcelona Eixample is 400 metres from Hospital Clínic Metro Station, in the Eixample district.

The NH Barcelona Eixample is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya Square. Barcelona Sants Train Station is within 2 Metro stops, and Gaudí’s Sagrada Família Church is 3 stops away.

Rooms at the NH Barcelona Eixample feature simple, functional décor and wooden floors. They all include a minibar and a selection of pillows. The marble bathrooms come with a hairdryer and a range of toiletries.

The hotel’s breakfast buffet includes typical pastries, fresh fruit and Spanish cured ham.

Set at the foot of Montjuic Hill, this design aparthotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Airport Bus Stop. It offers free WiFi and a rooftop terrace with a solarium and a seasonal swimming pool.

The BCN Montjuic is a 5-minute walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and a short walk from the Olympic Stadium. Barcelona city centre can be reached in 15 minutes by bus or Metro.

All modern rooms at the Montjuic have air conditioning and heating. They include a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a kitchen with a fridge and microwave.

The apartments also include a living area with a sofa bed, a private bathroom and an equipped kitchen with a washing machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The Aparthotel Bcn Montjuic has a TV room, as well as a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk, where guests can arrange to visit local attractions. Laundry service is also available.

Catalonia Castellnou offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and bright, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. It is located 250 metres from Tres Torres Underground Station, in a quiet residential area.

There are many cafés, bars and restaurants within a 10-minute walk, in the centre of Sarrià.

Hotel Catalonia Castellnou is close to some of Barcelona’s most important medical centres, including Clínica IVI, Clínica Corachan and Fertilab.

The Castellnou offers easy access to the C32 Ring Road and Vallvidrera Tunnel. It is within a 15-minute train journey of central Barcelona, and less than 2 km from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.Diagonal Avenue, with El Corte Ingles Department Store and two shopping centres, is a 10-minute walk away. Real Club de Tenis Barcelona is 15-minute walk away.

NH Barcelona Entenza is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Station and high-speed AVE Station. La Fira Exhibition Centre is 1.5 km away. All air-conditioned rooms are spacious, soundproofed and offer free Wi-Fi.

Rooms in the NH Barcelona Entenza Hotel are bright and modern with wooden floors. They feature satellite TV, minibar and a fully equipped bathroom with hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel and breakfast in the room is available. One of Barcelona’s main streets, Diagonal Avenue, is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, with many restaurants and shops.

The NH Barcelona Entenza is in a quiet area but is well-connected to the city centre by Metro. Entença Metro Station is 200 metres away. FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium is 3 stops away by Metro.

Hotel Balmoral is within 5 minutes' walk of Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station and Passeig de Gràcia boulevard. This boutique hotel offers free access to its wellness area and free Wi-Fi.

Each modern, air-conditioned room at the Balmoral Hotel Barcelona features elegant, functional design. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a minibar.

The hotel has a small wellness area with a sauna, experience shower and fitness machines. It also includes massage cabins and a sun terrace.

Guests receive a free welcome drink between 12:00 and 18:00. You can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar, or try bars and restaurants in the popular Gràcia district, a 5-minute walk away. In the morning, a breakfast buffet is served in the hotel.

Hotel Balmoral Barcelona has a TV lounge where you can enjoy sports events on the big screen. There are also 2 computers with internet access.

Gaudí's famous La Pedrera is just a 5-minute walk from the hotel, and the iconic Sagrada Família is 2 km away. Nearby bus and metro connections offer direct access to Plaça Catalunya, the historic city centre and to FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium. Private parking is available in the hotel at an extra cost.

Offering a roof terrace with a swimming pool and bar, Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona is located just 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s fashionable Paseo de Gracia Boulevard. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

Each floor of the hotel is dedicated to a different artist and rooms feature contemporary art work. The stylish rooms come with a flat-screen TV, safe and air conditioning,

Located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona is approximately 400 metres from Entença and Hospital Clinic Metro Stations. It is also 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudís Casa Batllò, and La Pedrera.

Parking can be arranged at the hotel. Across the hotel there is a bus stop and taxi service.

Featuring free Wi-Fi, BizFlats Eixample Apartments offers 2 and 3-bedroom apartments with private bathrooms. The apartments are located in different locations within the Eixample district of Barcelona, near the famous Passeig de Gracia.

The apartments have 1 en-suite bathroom and 1 additional bathroom, and a living space with a seating area, sofa, and TV. All kitchens are equipped with a dishwasher, hob, and fridge.

Plaza Catalunya Square and Las Ramblas Boulevard are around a 10-minute walk from BizFlats Eixample. There are metro stops within 800 metres of all the apartments, and Sagrada Familia can be reached in approximately 30 minutes on foot.

Set in Barcelona’s vibrant Raval district, this design hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a gym and a roof terrace with pool and panoramic views. Some rooms include a Nespresso coffee machine.

Each bright, air-conditioned room at the Barceló Raval features a large plasma-screen TV with more than 70 channels. Rooms have a minibar and a modern bathroom.

Hotel Barceló Raval’s B-Lounge serves creative Mediterranean food, tapas and cocktails in stylish surroundings. You can also enjoy a drink on the outdoor terrace.

The Raval Barceló is only a 5-minute walk from the MACBA Modern Art Gallery. Liceu Metro Station, Las Ramblas and the famous Boqueria Market are all just 400 metres away.

Hotel Ramblas Internacional is set right on the famous Las Ramblas, 50 metres from Liceu Metro Station and close to La Boquería Market.
Each of the soundproofed rooms is individually decorated and has plenty of natural light. Most rooms offer views of central Barcelona and some look onto Las Ramblas.

Hotel Ramblas Internacional serves a daily breakfast.

Located just 150 metres from Liceu Theatre, the hotel has easy access to Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the city’s cathedral is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Located in a historic building in the heart of Rambla Catalunya, Mosaic Barcelona by Ona is situated in Barcelona, 10 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya and 5 minutes' walk from Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned, and features a flat-screen TV and modern décor. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. The rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. The hotel also offers car hire.

Due to its central location, several bars and restaurants can be found nearby.

The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Mosaic Barcelona by Ona.

Hotels: Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia 4 Sup
Full_Descriptions:
Located right on Plaça Catalunya Square in Barcelona, Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia offers a terrace with a pool and free WiFi throughout. Private parking is available on site.

Awarded as Hotel Monument by the Gremi d'Hotels of Barcelona

Rooms are spacious and come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms offer city views.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and there is a restaurant and a bar on site.

Barcelona's La Rambla is 300 metres from Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia, while Paseo de Gracia, with its trendy shops and restaurants, is just 50 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

Located in Barcelona's Sarria District, Atenea Rekord Suites is a 10-minute train ride from Plaza Catalunya. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Spacious and comfortable rooms with modern décor come with satellite TV, a safe and Nespresso coffee machine. Each one has a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The Rekord Café offers a buffet breakfast.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

The surrounding area offers a selection of restaurants, shops and lounge bars. Muntaner Train Station is just 50 metres from the hotel.

Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants offers stylish air-conditioned accommodation, just a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. Free high-speed WiFi is available.

Each bright apartment and studio has a well-equipped kitchenette and flat-screen satellite TV.

All the Pierre & Vacances apartments and studios have functional modern décor and street views. Kitchen facilities include a fridge, microwave and dishwasher. A safe is available at an extra cost.

Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants is situated in the lively Sants neighbourhood, home to a wide range of shops, bars and cafés.

Just 200 metres away, Badal Metro Station connects with Sants Train Station in under 10 minutes. Collblanc metro station with direct trains to Barcelona Airport and Europa Fira is 500 metres away.

Set 100 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Mar Bella Beach, Front Maritim offers free WiFi and a gym with sauna. The Fòrum and CCIB Convention Centre are within a 15-minute walk.

All rooms at Hotel Front Maritim are modern and functional. There is a flat-screen TV and a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a shower and free toiletries.

The Front Maritim’s restaurant serves a wide range of modern Mediterranean cuisine.

Hotel Front Maritim is 700 metres from the shops and restaurants of Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre. Selva de Mar Metro Station is within a 10-minute walk, and nearby bus stops offer regular links to Barcelona City Centre.

Negresco Princess is situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region. The hotel has an outdoor pool and sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.  For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. Negresco Princess features free WiFi throughout the property.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Plaça Catalunya is 400 metres from Negresco Princess, while Portal de l'Angel is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 13 km from Negresco Princess.

The stylish Gran Via 678 is situated 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya in central Barcelona and features an outdoor pool with a sun terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

Modern rooms at this design hotel include satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom is complete with a hairdryer.

Grupotel Gran Via 678 offers a restaurant which serves Mediterranean and international cuisine. Guests can enjoy meals on the terrace.

Urquinaona Metro Station is 400 metres away while the Arc de Triomf monument is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

Featuring free WiFi, Ola Living Hostal Diagonal is located in Barcelona. Set 800 metres from Passeig de Gracia, famous for its luxury shops, this hotel offers modern rooms with air conditioning.

Each heated room at this hotel has modern décor and includes 1 double or 2 single beds, a flat-screen TV and wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with a shower and hairdryer. Some rooms have a spa bath. All are on the ground floor.

The hotel offers a lounge area.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and grocery shops within a 5-minute walk of Ola Living Hostal Diagonal Exclusive rooms. Diagonal Metro Station is 850 metres from the property, and Plaza Catalunya is 2 stops away.

Our reception is located at 228 Aribau Street. The opening hours are from 09:00 to 20:00, Monday to Sunday.

Check in time is 3:00 PM. If you arrive earlier we can store your luggage at reception until your apartment is ready. Also after your check out (11.00 AM).  You can leave your luggage at the reception.

The apartment has opening through a smartphone. If you need a face-to-face check-in later than 9:00 PM.  There is a surcharge of €30.

Aparthotel Bertrán is located in a quiet part of Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Avinguda Tibidabo FGC Station and Vallcarca Metro. It offers spacious accommodation, a gym and an outdoor pool.

Each air-conditioned Bertrán apartment has a living room with satellite TV and a sofa. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, and there is a kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker.

Some apartments have a private balcony with table and chairs. All apartments have free Wi-Fi.

A continental breakfast is available at the Bertrán, and you can have breakfast in your apartment. There is a supermarket 2 minutes’ walk away.

There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge.

You can reach Barcelona city centre in 15 minutes by train, Metro or bus, and there is a night bus stop nearby. Parc Güell is just over 1 km away.

Featuring a rooftop swimming pool and hot tub with views of Barcelona, Sunotel Central is set in the centre of Barcelona, just 10 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya.

Modern rooms at Sunotel Central include free high-speed WiFi, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities.

Universitat Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel. The Ramblas, famous for its street performers, can be reached in 10 minutes by foot.

In the morning guests can enjoy a varied, fresh and healthy full buffet breakfast.

The hotel’s 24-hour reception offers a ticket booking service and luggage storage. There are computers in the lobby which guests can use for free. Meeting rooms are also available.

Pestana Arena Barcelona is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya and Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a gym, sauna and modern, air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet access.

Some rooms offers free use of the Maritimo Meeting Room, up to 12 people, for private meetings.

Pestana Arena Barcelona is just 3 minutes’ walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and you can walk to Sants Station in 8 minutes. You can get to the Rambla in 5 minutes from Plaza Espanya Metro.

Rooms feature parquet floors and stylish décor. Each one has work desk, a pillow menu and an LCD TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food and has a terrace. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs.

Featuring a charming garden terrace, Praktik Garden is located 400 metres from Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gracia Boulevard. Fully reburbished in 2015, its chic rooms feature colourful mosaic floors, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

Girona Metro Station is just around the corner from the hotel. From there guests can reach the city’s Barceloneta Beach in 15 minutes. Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

All rooms at the Praktik Garden are equipped with air conditioning and some rooms have balconies. The modern bathroom includes a shower.

Guests can relax in the hotel lounge or on the furnished garden terrace. The hotel provides vending machines for drinks 24-hours a day.

Located in Barcelona, 3.7 km from Sagrada Familia, Laramond Barcelona Rooms provides air-conditioned rooms. Located around 4.2 km from Park Güell, the guest house with free WiFi is also 5 km away from La Pedrera. The guest house features family rooms.

At the guest house, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. At Laramond Barcelona Rooms every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Passeig de Gracia is 5 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 20 km from Laramond Barcelona Rooms.

Housed in an attractive 19th-century building, Grupotel Gravina is located just off Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square, 5 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and modern rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV.

The Hotel Gravina is just 5 minutes’ walk from the MACBA Modern Art Gallery and 15 minutes from Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. Catalunya Metro Station, located 100 metres from the hotel, connects you with the rest of the city.

The air-conditioned rooms at Grupotel Gravina feature modern furniture and some have parquet floors. They are equipped with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel has a smart bar where you can get a snack or a drink. There are numerous restaurants in the surrounding streets.

Plaza Goya Rooms is located in the centre of Barcelona and a few minutes’ walk from the Las Ramblas. It features free WiFi and free luggage storage.

Rooms at Plaza Goya Rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and a grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of Plaza Goya Rooms. Universitat Metro Station is 50 metres away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 4 metro stops away. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 700 metres from the property.

Attractively set in the centre of Barcelona, Occidental Diagonal 414 features air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Boasting room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, rooms come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms come with a safety deposit box, while certain rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also boast city views. The rooms will provide guests with a minibar.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near Occidental Diagonal 414 include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

Hostal Dragonflybcn is a guest house located in the centre of Barcelona, 250 metres from Palau de la Música auditorium and 10 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya Square. Free WiFi access is available.

Some rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom, while some have access to shared bathrooms or shared toilets.

This guest house is located on the 2nd floor of a 150-year-old restored building. It features a mahogany entrance door and functional décor. Luggage storage and tourist information can be provided at the front desk.

Guests can find a wide range of bars, restaurants and shops in the area. Arc de Triomf railway and metro station is 500 metres away. Urquinaona metro station is 5 minutes' walk away.

H10 Marina Hotel Barcelona is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Olympic Port. It offers a gym, spa and free Wi-Fi. The rooftop pool and sun terrace offer fantastic city and sea views.

The bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel H10 Marina Barcelona feature parquet floors and satellite TV. They have a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel’s Dionissos restaurant serves à la carte and tapas meals, and room service is available. Bar La Llum offers an extensive wine list.

Access to the H10 Marina’s spa is available for an extra cost. It features a sauna, steam baths and an indoor pool. Massage and beauty services are also available.

Bogatell Beach, where you can find many beach bars and restaurants, is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. It is 200 metres to Bogatell Metro, which connects you with central Barcelona in 10 minutes.

There is a tour desk and you can hire a car or bicycle. Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing services are offered.

Within walking distance from Las Ramblas, Plaza de Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia, Cien is set in a 19th-century building. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Cien's 8 rooms feature warm, minimalist décor, heating, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower.

There is a terrace where guests can have breakfast. Coffee and snacks are provided in the lounge area throughout the day.

The property is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Universitat, Catalunya or Passeig de Gràcia Metro stations. Centrally located, Cien is close to Barcelona’s main shopping area. Numerous bars and restaurants serving national and international food can be found nearby.

You can catch buses to Barcelona Airport from Plaza Catalunya, while trains to the airport and coastal town of Sitges leave from Passeig de Gracia Train Station, 250 metres away.

Boasting 1950s décor, this modern hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen satellite TV. Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya is 8 minutes’ walk away.

The rooms at the Chic & Basic Velvet have parquet floors and smart décor. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in the dining room; and guests can enjoy a drink at the honesty bar which has direct access to terrace.

There is a variety of restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk.

Chic & Basic Velvet is just 10 minutes’ walk from the Fira Convention Centre and the airport bus stop. Montjüic, with the Joan Miró Museum and Magic Fountain, is also a 10-minute walk away

Located in Barcelona’s trendy Born district, Park Hotel offers stylish accommodation just 10 minutes' walk from Barceloneta Beach, opposite to Estació de França Station. Reception is open 24 hours a day. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Park feature modern décor in warm tones. They are equipped with flat-screen satellite TV, and soundproofing.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the hotel’s bright café; and a wide variety of tapas are served at the on-site Ten's Tapas Restaurant, from the awarded-winning chef Jordi Cruz.

Park Hotel is just 200 metres from Mercat del Born public market and from Ciudadela Park, where you can find Barcelona Zoo.

Barceloneta Metro Station, located 300 metres from the hotel, connects you with the city centre in just 5 minutes.

Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Sants Railway Station, Hotel Brick Barcelona features views of the city. Among the facilities at this property are a business centre and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Brick Barcelona the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Languages spoken at the reception include Catalan, English, Spanish and French, and guests are invited to request information on the area when needed.

Palau Sant Jordi is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Hotel Brick Barcelona.

This hotel offers a free gym and a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor pool and panoramic views of Barcelona. The rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

Novotel Barcelona City is situated next to Glòries Shopping Centre and the Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel. The Sagrada Familia Basilica and Bogatell Beach are both a 20-minute walk away.

The air-conditioned rooms at Novotel Barcelona City have simple, modern décor. Up to 2 children under 16 stay for free when sharing with parents.

The hotel’s restaurant offers typical Mediterranean food.

On the rooftop there is an outdoor swimming pool and a gourmet bar where guests can enjoy tapas, wines and cocktails enjoying panoramic city views.

Staff at reception are happy to provide information about Barcelona. Tram and bus services to the city centre stop outside the hotel. Glòries Metro Station is just 300 metres away.

Hotel Millenni is a boutique hotel set 50 metres from Paral.lel Metro Station. It features a small roof terrace with a hot tub and impressive city views. All rooms are stylish and offer free Wi-Fi.

Accommodation at the Millenni is brightly decorated. The climate-controlled rooms feature satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and there are several traditional bars and restaurants in the surrounding Raval district.

Guests can have access to the gym, the hot tub and the sauna. There are 2 computers which have internet access, as well as a small library with daily newspapers. There is also a lounge area where guests can watch the TV.

The famous Las Ramblas are just 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. The funicular train to Montjuïc Castle leaves from the nearby Metro station.

Located in the heart of Barcelona, just 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya, Praktik Vinoteca hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi in public areas. Universitat Metro Station is 7 minutes’ walk away.

The bright and soundproofed rooms at Praktik Vinoteca feature wooden floors, a flat-screen satellite TV, telephone and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The property has a terrace where you can enjoy a glass of wine served by the on-site wine expert, who can tell you about local wines and their history.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets. Paseo de Gracia, with its shops and impressive architecture, is just 600 metres away.

Barcelona Airport is a 45-minute bus ride away from Plaza Catalunya and Barceloneta Beach is 3 km from Praktik Vinoteca.

Onix Liceo is next to Gaudi’s Palau Guell, 300 metres from Liceo Metro Station on Barcelona’s Ramblas. This stylish hotel offers a sun terrace and free Wi-Fi access.

The Onix is a design hotel with modern art in its public spaces. There is also a lounge and a business centre.

Free water, coffe and tea are available 24 hours a day.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Onix are spacious and elegant. They have a minibar and LCD satellite TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.

You can hire a car or bicycle from the hotel tour desk. There is a 24-hour reception and a laundry service.

Please, be aware that swimming pool is not heated and will be opened from April to October.

Featuring a quality bakery within the hotel, Praktik Bakery hotel is located in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Diagonal Metro. Free Wi-Fi is available.

This modern hotel offers air-conditioned double/twin rooms including a flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided free.

Guests can enjoy breakfast in the hotel and try the breads and pastries from the hotel's traditional bakery. Other services include provision of beach towels, ticket service for tourist bus, laundry, and airport transfers.

Praktik Bakery hotel is within a short walk of many bars, restaurants and shops. Paseo De Gracia Avenue and Gaudi's La Pedrera are just 250 metres away, and La Sagrada Familia is a 15-minute walk away. Plaza Catalunya Sqaure and Las Ramblas Boulevard is 1.3 km from the hotel.

Hostal El Ninot is located in Barcelona’s chic Eixample district. It offers bright, air-conditioned rooms, 3 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Avenue.

Rooms at the guest house are cosy and feature functional decor and wooden floors. All include a TV and central heating and in most cases, a private bathroom. Some rooms also have a terrace or offer city views. All rooms are air conditioned.

There are several bars, shops and restaurants close to El Ninot. Passeig de Gràcia, with its exclusive shops and Gaudí monuments, is 10 minutes’ walk away, as is the bohemian Gràcia district with its pretty squares.

Tourist information and free Wi-Fi are available at the guest house. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, while Provença FGC Train Station, 1 stop from Plaza Catalunya, is 500 metres away.

This stylish design hotel is located 150 metres from Rocafort Metro Station in Barcelona. It offers a trendy rooftop bar and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and plasma satellite TV.

The soundproofed rooms at Hotel Villa Emilia feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one has a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Hotel Villa Emilia Barcelona’s restaurant serves creative Catalan food, and there is a weekly barbecue. The Villa Emilia Bistrot offers live music.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. There are also car and bicycle rental services at the front desk.

Hotel Villa Emilia is just 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Espanya, where you can find the Fira Convention Centre. Sants Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Overlooking Camp Nou Stadium and Diagonal Avenue, the modern NH Barcelona Stadium offers free WiFi, a gym and seasonal rooftop pool. The air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and a pillow menu.

NH Barcelona Stadium Hotel’s seasonal sun terrace offers wonderful views across Barcelona to Montjuic. It also has sun loungers.

The hotel’s restaurant, Acanto, offers a varied buffet breakfast, as well as an á la carte lunch menu. The lobby café is open until midnight every day. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

Les Corts Metro Station is just 5 minutes’ walk away and offers a direct link to Barcelona’s historic centre. Diagonal Avenue can be reached in 10 minutes on foot, and Sants Station is 1.5 km away.

Barcelona's Fira Congress Centre is a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport can also be reached in 10 minutes by car.

Situated 100 metres from Fontana Metro Station in Barcelona's popular Gracia district, Aparthotel Silver offers a 24-hour reception, a bar and a garden terrace. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and a kitchenette.

Each air-conditioned room at Aparthotel Silver has simple, elegant décor. All rooms offer satellite TV, a laptop safe and a private bathroom with amenities. Kitchenettes include an electric oven, kettle and fridge.

You can enjoy a drink in the Silver’s bar, and room service is available on request. Staff at reception can also arrange car or bicycle rental and provide information about the city.

Silver Aparthotel is 200 metres from Casa Vicenç, a Gaudi building. Barcelona city centre is within a 10-minute Metro journey, while Parc Guell is just one Metro stop away.

This stylish hotel has an excellent central location, 50 metres from Barcelona’s Las Ramblas and just 100 metres from Plaza Catalunya. It offers a rooftop pool, sauna and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at the Silken Ramblas are stylish, and are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. There is central heating and air conditioning according to the season. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

The Silken has a restaurant and bar. Room service is available. There is a also a pleasant terrace.

The Silken has a tour desk and the sightseeing bus stops nearby in Plaza Catalunya.

Set 600 metres from Barcelona’s central Passeig de Gracia, Hotel Europark offers a rooftop terrace with outdoor pool. The stylish rooms include a 32-inch LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access.

Each air-conditioned room at the Europark has elegant black and white décor. There is a laptop safe and minibar, as well as a modern bathroom with hairdryer.

Hotel Europark has a café-bar and a breakfast room, where a varied buffet breakfast is served. A free early-morning coffee service is also available.

The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Girona Metro Station is just 200 metres away and provides direct access to Barceloneta Beach and the Gothic Quarter.

Hotels: Hotel Indigo Barcelona Granvia Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel
Full_Descriptions:
Hotel Indigo Barcelona Granvia Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel is a modern design hotel with a bright central courtyard. It offers free Wi-Fi and a convenient location, next to Barcelona’s Plaça Espanya.

The modern rooms at the Hotel Indigo Barcelona Granvia Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel feature a private bathroom, and free mineral water for the first night. They are all soundproofed, with flat-screen TVs and air conditioning.

Hotel Indigo Barcelona Granvia Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel is set next to the Fira Exhibition Centre, at the bottom of Montjuic. This hill is home to a castle, the National Art Museum and the Magic Fountain.

Espanya Metro Station is 150 metres from the hotel. The historic centre of Barcelona and the famous Ramblas are just a few stops away. A direct bus service to the airport stops in Plaça Espanya, near the hotel.

Breakfast is available at an additional cost.

Featuring free Wi-Fi and air conditioning, Som Nit Born is located in the Born district of Barcelona. Just 10 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Beach, the guest house is also 500 metres away from the Picasso Museum.

The soundproofed rooms at Som Nit Born come with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom including a shower. There is a free luggage storage service and a safety deposit box is also available.

A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found in a 1-minute walk through the Born district.

This 19th-century Neoclassical building was chosen to feature in the first ever photograph taken in Spain. Picasso also lived here.

La Rambla Street, Port Vell Harbor and Barrio Gotico District can be reached within 10 minutes’ walk as Som Nit is located in the heart of Barcelona. You can catch the Sightseeing Bus 200 metres from the guest house and Barceloneta Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk away.

Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, One bedroom Apartment in Eixample! is set in Barcelona. It is located less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station and provides a lift. Casa Batllo is 2.9 km away and Camp Nou is 3.1 km from the apartment.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from One bedroom Apartment in Eixample!.

Super Balmes Guest House is located in Barcelona city center, 2 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya Square. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

The Guest House offers private rooms in shared apartments located in different building of the same central area.

They all come with a flat-screen TV and have a shared or private bathroom. Bed linen and towels are included. All apartments have a fully equipped kitchen for guests’ use and a shared lounge with sofas.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within walking distances. Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located within 10-minute walk.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different rooms and apartments located in the Barcelona City Center area. Please select a date and click on the room type to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Lugaris Beach Apartments is situated less than 200 metres from Bogatell Beach in the quiet neighbourhood of Poble Nou.

The Lugaris Beach Apartments apartments feature contemporary design, floor-to-ceiling windows and free high-speed internet access. The private kitchen is equipped with an oven, Nespresso machine, and fridge. Each apartment also has a living room, flat-screen TV with international channels and washer-dryer. A welcome pack with basics such as coffee, tea, milk, sugar, salt and oil is included.

Facilities at the Lugaris Beach Apartments include a tour desk, babysitting and shuttle service, which is available upon request and for an additional cost. Bed linen and towels are provided and guests can make use of car and bike rental.

Parking is available at an extra charge and beach towels can also be rented.

The apartments are a 5-minute walk from Poblenou Metro Station and 2 minutes’ walk from Poblenou Park. The area offers plenty of bars, restaurants, and a shopping centre. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in central Barcelona can be reached in around 20 minutes by metro.

Avinyo 1 in Barcelona offers accommodation with free WiFi, 1.8 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 1.9 km from Barceloneta Beach and 200 metres from Plaça Reial. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya, and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 1.8 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

Towels and bed linen are offered in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Cathedral of Barcelona, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Avinyo 1.

This stylish hotel offers a gym and free Wi-Fi. It is set on a quiet street just 6 minutes’ walk from Bogatell Beach and 300 metres from Llacuna Metro Station.

The bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel 4 Barcelona hotel are modern and elegant, with wooden floors. All have flat-screen satellite TV, and some have views of the sea or city.

The Hotel 4 Barcelona’s restaurant offers Mediterranean dishes, and there is also a stylish bar. The surrounding area has several popular restaurants and bars.

The hotel offers a sauna and steam baths, available for an extra cost. The gym is available for an extra cost, and massage can be arranged. It also has a 24-hour reception with bicycle rental

Hotel 4 is set in the 22@ Technological District, 1 km from Ciutadella Park and 600 metres from the Olympic Port.

Casa Balmes is a bed and breakfast located in the very centre of Barcelona, 400 metres from the well-known Passeig de Gràcia Avenue and monuments like Casa Batlló. Free WiFi access is available.

Each air-conditioned room at Casa Balmes is soundproof and has elegant décor, as well as a full HD flat-screen TV and a minibar. There is also a free safe and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are included. Some rooms have street views.

At Casa Balmes you will find a terrace and a shared lounge with vending machines. A daily breakfast consisting of fruit juices, coffee, tea, toast, jams, cereals and a selection of pastries is included.

Other services offered at the property include tourist information, luggage storage and laundry. Guests can find a sports centre with gym and spa just 80 metres away from the b&b.

Casa Balmes is 8 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is less than 20 minutes by car.

Hostal Lleida is located in the centre of Barcelona’s Eixample district, just 300 metres from Hospital Clínic Metro Station. The rooms have individual air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, a TV and a private bathroom.

The Clínic Hospital is just opposite the property. Passeig de Gracia and Rambla de Catalunya are approximately 10 minutes’ walk away, while Sants Train Station is 15 minutes away. Camp Nou Stadium is only 4 Metro stops from the property.
