All of the rooms in the Lleida guest house include a small bottle of water and a map of Barcelona on arrival. The bathrooms include towels, soap and a hairdryer.

Reception is open 24 hours a day. There is a small lounge for guests, with a fridge, microwave and an internet terminal. A good range of bars and restaurants can be found in the surrounding area.

Offering air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Nouvel is located on a pedestrianised street just 100 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas.

The hotel features ornate ceilings, cast bronze and crystal lamps, and marble floors, in the style of its 19th-century building.

All rooms come with a flat-screen TV, double-glazed windows and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. A safe is available to rent.

The hotel’s La Lluna Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Vending machines with snacks, ice, and drinks, are also available.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can help you arrange car hire, a laundry service and tickets for shows. You will also find luggage storage and a reading room with two computers.

Portal de Angel shopping street is just 2 minutes’ walk away, while Barcelona Cathedral and the Gothic Quarter are a 10-minute walk from Hotel Nouvel.

Located 400 metres from Sants Station in Barcelona, NH Sants Barcelona offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, flat-screen TV and private bathroom.

The hotel has a restaurant, serving fresh Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a relaxing café-bar. It also offers a healthy breakfast. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

The NH Sants Barcelona is set in a quiet area of Barcelona's Les Corts Financial District, but Barcelona city centre is within 15 minutes by Metro. Guests can reach FC Barcelona Football Stadium from Plaça del Centre Metro Station, which is 300 metres away.

This central Barcelona hotel is surrounded by the boutiques and cafes of the elegant Rambla de Catalunya. It offers free internet access and an outdoor pool, not heated and is open from April to October.

Onix Rambla has a fitness centre and a business centre with free internet access. There is also a nice terrace.

All air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen satellite TV. Rooms are also heated and come with a minibar and free safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and amenities.

The hotel is housed in a building with typical Modernist architecture. The surrounding area of the Eixample neighbourhood is famous for its beautiful buildings.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car at the hotel tour desk.

Please, be aware that swimming pool is not heated and will be opened from April to October.

Set in a restored building from 1893, AG Apartments is located in the Poble Sec area of Barcelona. Free Wi-Fi access is available. Plaza Espanya Square is 1.2 km away.

The reception area at the AG Apartments features a photography gallery. All apartments are decorated with photographs from the artist Enrique Rottenberg and feature a blend of rustic and industrial styles, preserving the original brick walls, arches and exposed beams, as well as the wooden doors and ceramic floors.

Each apartment has air conditioning and heating. There is a living room with a 42-inch Smart TV, a fully equipped open-plan kitchen and a modern bathroom. Some apartments have a balcony. Bed linen and towels are included. The building has a lift.

The nearest metro station is Poble Sec, 400 metres away. From there, you can reach Plaza Catalunya in 4 metro stops.  El Prat Airport is 20 minutes' drive away and buses leave from Plaza Espanya.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the Poble Sec area. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Located on Gran Via, in central Barcelona, the stylish Hotel Soho features a rooftop seasonal pool and sun terrace with panoramic views. It is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Boulevard.

The chic, air-conditioned rooms at the Soho are soundproof and offer flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. They also have an ambient lighting system and include modern bathrooms with hairdryers.

Guests can enjoy a rich breakfast on the spacious terrace, weather permitting. The front desk is available 24-hours a day and offers a ticket service.

The Soho is a 5-minute walk from the airport bus stop in Plaza Universitat, and Urgell Metro Station is just 130 metres away.

Hostal River is set on a pedestrian street, just 150 metres from Barcelona’s famous La Rambla and Liceu Metro Station. It offers 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

All rooms are heated and some come with a desk and street views. Some have a private bathroom and some have shared bathroom facilities. Free toiletries are provided in all. A hairdryer can be requested at reception.

The guest house boasts a living shared room with a balcony offering views of Carrer Sant Pau Street.

Luggage storage is offered and the Hostal River has a tour desk. La Boqueria Market is 4 minutes’ walk away and there are many shops, bars and restaurants in the immediated area.

This elegant hotel is situated in the exclusive Sarrià area and has a garden terrace with an outdoor pool and hot tub. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV, a mini fridge with complimentary water and free Wi-Fi.

The Catalonia Mikado's restaurant serves breakfast and evening meals, specializing in international dishes. There is also a bar. Only 500 metres away, the charming centre of Sarrià is famous for its cake shops.

The Catalonia Mikado is within a 10-minute walk of Ramon Llull University and the International University of Catalonia. It is also well located for some of Barcelona's most important medical centres, including the Teknon Centre and IMO and the Institut Catalá de la Retina.

Sarrià Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away. From here you can get to central Barcelona in 5 minutes.

Situated in the L'Eixample neighbourhood of Barcelona, Hostal Aslyp 114 offers free WiFi and features a shared lounge with flat-screen TV and satellite channels. Plaza Catalunya is 2.8 km away.

Fitted with tile flooring, the guest house has air-conditioning and heating. The rooms feature simple décor, wardrobe and city view. The private bathroom has a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The property offers a continental breakfast and vending machines are available.

Restaurants, shops and bars are within 250 metres away. Gaudí's famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 3.5 km from Hostal Aslyp 114. Sants Metro and Train Station is a 15-minute walk away.

Barcelona Airport is 20 minute-drive away. Hostal Aslyp 114 offers shuttle service for a surcharge.

Hotel Atlantis can be found less than 100 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Universitat Metro Station in Barcelona. It offers attractive rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The hotel features lounge areas with sofas where guests can relax. Car rental can be arranged at the 24-hour reception.

A hot and cold breakfast buffet is served in the hotel dining room.

The air-conditioned rooms at Atlantis include a spacious marble bathroom complete with a hairdryer. There is also a laptop safe.

The Gothic Quarter is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Atlantis Hotel. The Picasso Museum and El Born district are also within a short walk.

Room Mate Pau is set 50 metres from the emblematic Plaza Catalunya. It offers a stylish décor and a terrace and bright, contemporary rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Room Mate Pau feature chic decor and air conditioning. All include a plasma TV with USB port for laptop connection, a minibar, safe and a modern private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily, which you can enjoy at the property's shared terrace. Events can be catered for and various bars, restaurants and shops are within 2 minutes’ walk.

Other facilities include meeting and conference rooms.

Room Mate Pau is 2 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas and Passeig de Gracia, with its exclusive shops and Gaudí monuments. Urquinaona Metro station is 150 metres away, 2 stops from Barceloneta and its beach.

The hotel can help book tickets and activities and is 250 metres from Catalunya Metro and FGC Train Station.

Featuring free WiFi, a restaurant and a seasonal outdoor pool, 1881 Barcelona Gran Rosellon Hotel offers accommodation in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Diagonal Metro Station.

The hotel has a sun terrace and a fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. There is also a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Some have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Every room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries.

La Pedrera is 600 metres from Bcn Urban Gran Rosellon, while the trendy Passeig de Gràcia Street is 8 minutes' walk away. Plaça Catalunya is 1.7 km from the property and Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away. Private parking is available on site.

Situated 400 metres from Las Ramblas, Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona offers a rooftop terrace with city and sea views. The rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The hotel has a courtyard, where you can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Each open-plan room has air conditioning.

Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona have a 24-hour reception, where staff can arrange restaurant bookings, tickets for shows or guided tours of Barcelona. Free city maps are also available.

The hotel is located at the bottom of the lively Raval district, just 700 metres from Barcelona Port. Drassanes and Paral•lel Metro Stations are both within 300 metres.

Offering a central location, Barcelona Century Hotel is located in the Eixample district, just a short walk from the Ramblas and Passeig de Gracia. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

All air-conditioned rooms at this hotel are soundproofed and come with satellite TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer.

The hotel offers buffet breakfast as well as a bar. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tourist information about the area.

Barcelona’s main shopping district can be reach within walking distance of the hotel. You can visit Barcelona’s Cathedral or the Gothic Quarter.

Urgell, Hospital Clínic or Universitat Metro Stations are less than 7 minutes’ walk of Barcelona Century Hotel.

Situated above Barcelona Sants Train Station, Barceló Sants offers a subtle outer space theme throughout. Minimalist rooms feature free Wi-Fi, rain showers, and large windows with city views.

Air-conditioned rooms feature modern décor and designer furniture. Each has an iPod dock, flat-screen TV, and tea and coffee making facilities. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

This design hotel includes a fitness centre.

The hotel has the Oxygen restaurant, where you can enjoy a delicious, complete and healthy breakfast buffet. It also has the Orbital Bar, the ideal space to disconnect from daily life; a fun and perfect place to have a delicious cocktail with your partner or to hang out and have a drink with colleagues after a long working day.

Sants Train and Metro Station offers direct access to Barcelona Airport, and the historic city centre, 3.5 km away. There are also high-speed AVE services to Madrid and international trains.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge and the hotel has a Wi-Fi zone.

Generator Barcelona is located 500 metres from the fashionable Passeig de Gracia Avenue. The hostel offers a 24-hour reception, free private lockers in shared dormitories and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Diagonal and Verdaguer metro stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from Generator Barcelona. The Gràcia district, which has plenty of boutique shops and bars, is only 200 metres away.

Both private rooms and dormitories have air conditioning and heating, as well as individual power sockets and reading lamps for each bed. Female-only dormitories include hairdryers and other amenities.

They also feature an en suite bathroom, a sink and a mirror. Bed linen is included, while towels can be rented at the reception. Dormitories are available for guests over 18 years old.

Guests can have a daily breakfast for an extra cost. Generator Barcelona also has a communal lounge and a luggage storage service.

H TOP BCN City is located next to the impressive Hospital Sant Pau and 10 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a TV.

The rooms at H TOP BCN City feature simple décor and a work desk. Each one has a private bathroom, and many offer views of the Hospital de Sant Pau.

The H TOP BCN City has a 24-hour reception, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. There is also an internet corner with computers that you can use for free.

The hotel has vending machines for snacks and drinks. There is a variety of restaurants and bars within 10 minutes’ walk.

Sant Pau-Dos de Maig Metro Station is just 200 metres away from the H TOP BCN City, connecting you with the rest of the city with ease.

Room Mate Carla is set 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, and 5-minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s La Pedrera in Barcelona’s Eixample District. It features free WiFi and colourful, stylish rooms.

Decorated with lively prints, the air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom.

Room Mate Carla features a modern bar offering a range of cocktails. You will also find a terrace and meeting rooms on site.

The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Sagrada Familia Cathedral. Verdaguer and Diagonal Metro Stations are 500 metres away and offer easy access to Las Ramblas and Sants Train Station.

Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and hot tub, as well as panoramic views of Barcelona, Sunotel Aston is a 3-minute walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station.

Air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free, high-speed WiFi is available.

An extensive buffet breakfast is served at the hotel. The hotel’s Pa'l Caldero Restaurant offers a wide selection of dishes from around the world. There are also many eating options in the area.

Sunotel Aston has a 24-hour reception and offers services such as luggage storage, free pool towels and free bikes.

Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas can be reached in around 15 minutes by public transport; while Barcelona’s famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral is around 10 minutes away.

Set on Paral-lel Avenue, this modern design hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the famous Las Ramblas and Barcelona Port. Its stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi and a satellite TV.

Hotel Serhs del Port´s modern rooms offer a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Montjuïc Hill is within a 10-minute walk of Hotel Serhs del Port. A funicular train connects Montjuïc with Paral-lel Metro Station, located 500 metres from the hotel.

Direct Metro services also connect Paral-lel to Plaça Catalunya Square, Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudí’s famous Parc Guëll. Hotel Serhs del Port´s tour desk can provide information about the city.

Aparthotel Atenea Calabria is situated 200 metres from Rocafort Metro Station, a 10-minute walk from Plaza España Square. This aparthotel features spacious studios with free Wi-Fi, a well-equipped kitchenette and a flat-screen TV.

The Atenea’s studios are spacious and brightly decorated. Each has a seating area with satellite TV and sofa bed. The kitchenette comes with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker.

The Calabria offers a daily buffet breakfast. There are also a range of supermarkets, cafés and restaurants within walking distance of the aparthotel.

The Atenea Calabria is around a 20-minute walk from Sants Train and Bus Station. Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas are 3 Metro stops away from nearby Rocafort Metro Station.

Set 350 metres from Park Güell in Barcelona's quiet Gracia district, BcnStop Parc Güell apartments have air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Vallcarca Metro Station is just 220 metres away.

The BcnStop Parc Güell apartments are heated and have a fully equipped kitchen, TV and either one or two bathrooms. Apartments with a private balcony or terrace available for a small surcharge.

Towels, bed linen and soap are included at BcnStop Parc Güell.
At reception you can request a laundry service and tourist information.

You can reach Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas, the heart of Barcelona, in just 10 minutes by metro. There is a bus stop opposite the apartments, and there is private parking just 40 metres away that can also be reserved in advance for a small surcharge.

Set in the lively neighbourhood of the Raval, this trendy guesthouse is the perfect place to stay to explore the city centre and make the most of the nightlife in this area.

Chic & Basic Tallers Hostal boast a sleek and modern design throughout the property, and has plenty of natural light. The guesthouse has a Chill&Basic area, where you can enjoy complimentary coffee, or prepare a sandwich, while listening to the guesthouse's relaxing selection of music.

From this guesthouse you can easily walk to the majority of the principal monuments in the city, including the stunning Guadí buildings of Casa Batllò and La Pedrera, on Passeig de Gracia.

Situated just outside Barcelona’s central Plaza Catalunya Square, BYPILLLOW  Mothern  offers bright, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. Buses to Barcelona Airport stop 100 metres away.

BYPILLLOW Mothern is situated next to Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, 600 metres from Gaudi’s famous Casa Batlló and a 5-minute walk from the Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter. Metro and regional train services stop at Catalunya Station, just 50 metres away.

 Set in a restored 19th century building, BYPILLLOW Mothern features simple and modern décor throughout. It has a 24-hour reception with a tour desk and ticket service.

You can work from the comfortable coworking space or terrace, or having a buffet breakfast in the dining room. You can also find a wide range of cafés, tapas bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets.

Situated just 10 minutes walk from the stunning centre of Barcelona, this smart and practical hotel is set in the charming neighbourhood of Poble Sec, at the foot of Montjüic, where you can visit the Olympic site.

Start your day with breakfast in Paral.lel, before heading out for a stroll up Montjüic, where you can spend the day relaxing in a natural setting, and also visit museums such as Fundació Joan Mirò and the national gallery, MNAC.

Each of the bedrooms in Paral.lel comes with air conditioning, so you can enjoy tranquillity and rest in the warm summer months. Browse the internet using the free Wi-Fi connection available in this hotel.

Paral.lel is located just a short stroll from the port and beach area of the city, and you can get to top sights such as Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter with its stunning cathedral.

Room Mate Gerard in Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre.

It boasts a sun terrace and location, set in the Eixample district, near attractions such as Tivoli Theatre and within 700 metres of Portal de l'Angel.

At the hotel all rooms offer a simple yet elegant décor. They come with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Air-conditioning is featured, and certain rooms include a balcony. All units include a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Other facilities include portable WiFi.

Plaça Catalunya is a 9-minute walk from the accommodation. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Set in Barcelona, 800 metres from Plaça Catalunya, Feelathome Casa Bertrand offers concierge services and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is close to Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The property is 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia, and within 700 metres of the city centre.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, the units at Feelathome Casa Bertrand have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the accommodation every room includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Feelathome Casa Bertrand include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Casa Batllo and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Set between the 2 main squares at the centre of Barcelona – Catalunya and Universitat – this small, modern hotel is ideally located for exploring the city’s cultural heart.

Chic & Basic Lemon is just off the top of the vibrant La Rambla and a short walk from the Gothic Quarter. It is only 100 metres from Plaça Catalunya and the start of the elegant boulevard of Passeig de Gràcia – site of Modernist marvels such as Casa Batlló.

Here you can take advantage of the great family service offered in this small property.

After seeing the sights, spend a restful night’s sleep in your own spacious bedroom. In it you will find amenities such as a digital TV, free safe and en suite bathroom with full bathtub. In addition, climate control allows you to stay in comfort all year round.

Located 300 metres from Sagrada Familia, Sercotel Hotel Rosellon offers 4-star accommodation in Barcelona and features a bar. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Sercotel Hotel Rosellon each room comes with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

La Pedrera is 1.6 km from Sercotel Hotel Rosellon, while Casa Batllo is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

Lugaris Rambla Apartments is 300 metres from Bogatell Beach, in Barcelona’s Rambla del Poble Nou. Located in a quiet neighbourhood, each modern apartment offers an LCD TV, free Wi-Fi and a Nespresso coffee machine.

Lugaris is next to Poble Nou Park, and a short walk from Llacuna and Poble Nou Metro Stations. It is also a 2-minute walk from a bus stop. Barcelona Cathedral and Town Hall are just 5 Metro stops away. Many public bus services to the historic city centre also pass nearby.

Each air-conditioned apartment has a balcony with city views. The well-equipped kitchens have a ceramic hob, an oven and a washer-dryer. Bed linen and towels are provided, and weekly cleaning is included.

Other facilities include a tour desk, babysitting and shuttle service. Guests can make use of our car or bike rental.

The Lugaris building has a private security service and a 24-hour customer emergency service line. The nearby reception offers a tour desk and car rental. Airport transfers are available on prior request and for an extra charge.

Exe Mitre enjoys a peaceful location in the San Gervasi district of Barcelona, 200 metres from Putxet Park. It offers spacious rooms with and free WiFi.

An extensive buffet breakfast is served, with hot and cold options. The friendly staff are happy to recommend restaurants and bars nearby.

The elegant rooms at Exe Mitre feature classic décor and come with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms also have a terrace with views over Mount Tibidabo.

Exe Mitre is just 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s famous Park Guell. Putxet Metro Station is 200 metres away and connects with Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in just 6 minutes. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are an 8-minute metro ride away.

Just off the famous Las Ramblas, Aspasios Plaza Real Apartments offers air-conditioned studios with balconies overlooking the street. La Boqueria Market and Liceu Opera House are a 2-minute walk away.

Each studio has smart wooden floors and functional décor. Studios are divided into a sleeping area and a living-dining area with a TV and DVD player. Free WiFi and International channels are available in all apartments.

You can prepare meals in the well-equipped kitchenette, which features an oven, hob, kettle and microwave. There is also a dishwasher and a washer.

Aspasios Plaza Real Apartments is ideally located in the Gothic Quarter, next to lively Plaça Reial Square. Barcelona Cathedral and the town hall are a 5-minute walk away. Liceu Metro Station is 150 metres away.

AC Hotel Sants is located just 50 metres from Barcelona Sants Train Station. It offers 24-hour reception and modern, air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and free safe.

Each room features special reading lamps, 4 pillows and elegant furnishings. They come equipped with a desk and a minibar. Some rooms offer city views.

Free WiFi is available in the lobby and bar. The restaurant inside the property serves a breakfast buffet every morning.

AC Hotel Sants is around 500 metres from Plaça Espanya and Montjuic. Sants Station offers direct metro access to Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, as well as direct access to El Prat Airport.

Situated in a residential area of Barcelona, Artlifebcn Apartment offers stylish, air-conditioned apartment with furnished private terrace. Free WiFi is available.

The heated apartment include a spacious living area with a flat-screen TV. Complete with a dishwasher, the open-plan kitchen includes an oven and washing machine.

Bedrooms feature modern décor, and the apartment has 2 bathrooms with a bath or shower and a hairdryer.

Mercat de Sants, with fresh local products, can be found within 10 minutes' walk of the property. Barcelona Fira Conference Centre is a 20-minute walk away.

Mercat Nou Metro Station is a 5-minute walk from the apartment, and Sants Train Station can be reached in 10 minutes on foot. Plaza España is a 15-minute walk, and a 15-minute metro ride takes you to Plaza Cataluña Square in central Barcelona.

Royal Ramblas is located on Barcelona's famous Ramblas, 100 meters from Plaza de Catalunya. It offers elegant and modern rooms with air conditioning, plasma TV, free Wi-Fi, and private parking. Some  rooms provide magnificent views of the Ramblas.

The Hotel has a meeting room with magnificent views of the Ramblas.

It offers a buffet breakfast with various regional products and homemade pastries in the La Poma restaurant with impressive views of Las Ramblas where you can also taste Mediterranean food.

The Royal Ramblas Hotel is ideally located with access to all public transport and a 5-minute walk from the elegant Passeig de Gràcia, where you will find numerous restaurants and exclusive shops. The old town is within walking distance, as well as the Mercat de la Boqueria and the MACBA. The beach is 20 minutes away.

The Royal Ramblas Barcelona's tour desk offers useful information about the city and car rental services. It also manages the airport transfer service.

Set just 100 metres from La Rambla in central Barcelona, BYPILLOW Wander offers modern rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. Drassanes Metro Station is just 50 metres away.

Located on the 4th floor, all rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and shower. They are heated, air-conditioned and include a flat-screen TV.

You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants and bars in the area. Barcelona’s Port Vell is just 350 metres from BYPILLOW Wander and the Maritime Museum is 150 metres away.

Barcelona Beach can be reached in a 15-minute bus ride. Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk from the property and buses to the airport leave from there.

Offering panoramic views from its rooftop terrace, which has a seasonal hot tub and swimming pool, Sunotel Junior is set 300 metres from Francesc Macià Square. It offers free, high-speed WiFi.

All rooms at Sunotel Junior have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows and a fully equipped bathroom.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast each morning. The hotel’s restaurant, Pa'l Caldero, offers a selection of dishes from around the world. There is also a range of cafés and restaurants nearby.

You will find a 24-hour reception that offers a luggage storage service and free pool towels. There are also several meeting rooms available.

The Sunotel is a 5-minute walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station, and Sants Railway Station is just 2 metro stops away.

FC Barcelona’s famous Camp Nou Stadium can be reached in 15 minutes by public transport, and Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are also around 15 minutes away.

Within 50 metres of La Pedrera and Diagonal Metro Station, Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia features a terrace bar with panoramic views of Barcelona. This 4-star hotel also has an interior garden.

Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia is set in a restored building with contemporary architecture. The smart bedrooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and a bathroom with a rain-effect shower.

Casa Batlló is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 2 stops from Diagonal Station.

The Gràcia district is within a 5-minute walk, and charming street cafés can be found along the tree-lined Rambla de Catalunya, 200 metres away.

Hostal Bejar is a family-run guest house in Barcelona, 400 metres from Espanya Metro and Train station. It offers simple and functional rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom.

The Magic Fountain, at the base of Montjuic Hill, is just 10 minutes’ walk from Bejar Hostal. Here you can watch spectacular light and water shows combined with music.

Twin and triple rooms are available at Bejar. They come with heating and air conditioning.

The Raval district is within a 15-minute walk of the guest house. It offers many unique bars and restaurants. Tarragona Metro Station is 200 metres away.

Centrally located on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas Boulevard, this aparthotel offers 24-hour reception and is surrounded by many restaurants, bars and shops. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All air-conditioned studios and apartments at Citadines Ramblas Barcelona feature a kitchen with a microwave, fridge and dishwasher. Bathrooms are equipped with hairdryers and all rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All Classic Rooms are equipped with fridge and kettle.


Linen and towels are provided. The apartment is cleaned and linen and towels are changed for free once a week. An additional housecleaning service is available upon request and is charged according to your needs.

Bicycle and car rental can be arranged for guests at Citadines. Luggage storage is also available and the aparthotel operates a ticket service for attractions in Barcelona.

Plaza Catalunya Metro Station is just 100 metres away, and airport buses leave from the square. The impressive Boqueria Market is 2 minutes’ walk from Citadines Ramblas.

Hotel Catalunya offers free Wi-Fi and is centrally located in Barcelona’s Gothic centre, just off La Rambla, 50 metres from Plaça Catalunya. It offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV.

All rooms at the Catalunya come with a fridge and a safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. Breakfast is served in a café 25 metres from the hotel.

Barcelona Cathedral is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Hotel. The famous Gaudi buildings of Passeig de Gracia are only 500 metres away.

The hotel is near Plaça Catalunya Train and Metro Station. The airport and sightseeing buses also stop in this central square.

Hotel Catalunya’s tour desk can provide recommendations and book tickets. Car hire is available, and the 24-hour reception offers express check-out and luggage storage.

Situated in Barcelona’s Pedralbes neighbourhood, Upper Diagonal offers modern accommodation with free WiFi and a gym just 1 km from the Camp Nou football stadium.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. All rooms have ironing facilities.

The hotel has an on-site restaurant serving seasonal food, and you can find more restaurants and shops on Diagonal Avenue, just 600 metres away, and in the L’Illa Diagonal shopping centre.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and the hotel also offers car hire.

La Pedrera is 3.3 km from Upper Diagonal, while Tibidabo is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Upper Diagonal.

Feelathome Plaza Apartments offers apartments with free Wi-Fi and heating. The apartments are 100 metres from Hostafrancs Metro Station and 650 metres from Plaza Espanya and Barcelona Fira Congress Centre.

Featuring stylish décor, all the apartments include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a DVD player. Most of the apartments have a balcony or terrace. Every apartment has access to a communal rooftop terrace with views of the area.

Each apartment has a dining area and a kitchen equipped with a washing machine, oven and coffee machine. The bathrooms come with a shower and bed linen and towels are provided.

Guests will find restaurants and shops within 3 minutes' walk from the property. The apartments are 3 km from Plaza Catalunya Square and Barcelona city centre. Sants Train Station is a 10-minute walk from the property.

Located in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Casa Batllo, The Corner Hotel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a bar and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

All units at the hotel include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels,and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, bathrobes and slippers. At The Corner Hotel every room comes with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Popular points of interest near The Corner Hotel include Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

Ideally located in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Som Nit Port Vell is set 1.3 km from Barceloneta Beach, 2.9 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 3 km from Mar Bella Beach. Among the facilities at this property are full-day security and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 1.2 km from the city centre and 1.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At the guest house, all units are soundproof. At the guest house, units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property. A bicycle rental service is available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near Som Nit Port Vell include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Located in Barcelona's attractive Eixample district, U232 Hotel offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is just 150 metres from the hotel.

All of the rooms in Hotel U232 have modern marble bathrooms with powerful showers. Some also have city views and private terraces.

Guests can enjoy drinks, jazz music and city views on the hotel's top-floor terrace. There is also a modern gym on the same floor.

The U232 has a free business centre with an internet terminal. There is an Art Deco-inspired lounge and cocktail bar, decorated with art photography and leather armchairs.

The hotel offers an extensive breakfast buffet. Room service includes daily specials and a pizza delivery service.

The shops and department stores of Diagonal Avenue are just 7 minutes’ walk away. Passeig de Gràcia and Sants Railway Station are both about 20 minutes’ walk away.

Situated on the famous Ramblas, Hotel Serhs Rivoli Rambla has a beautiful interior courtyard and a terrace from where you can enjoy views over the Gothic Quarter while you sip an espresso.

 Return here for lunch and enjoy views over the urban gardens which date back to the Romantic era.

The Hotel Serhs Rivoli Rambla is a celebration of the Art Deco style which has become a signature of this Catalan city. Enjoy theatrical interiors which combine classic style with avant garde features such as clever lighting and contemporary furniture. Sit in the interior patio of the Rivoli Ramblas where you can enjoy the cool surroundings and murals painted on the walls.

The 128 Rambla Restaurant serves a wide selection of Mediterranean and international cuisine. The varied and appealing buffet breakfast is a great way to help prepare you for the day ahead.

Hotel Expo Barcelona is located next to Barcelona Sants Station. Its rooftop pool and terrace offer fantastic city views and the modern rooms feature a private balcony and satellite TV.

The hotel’s stylish Stop’n’Bite restaurant serves international à la carte food. There is also a terrace bar in the rooftop chillout area, which provides views over Barcelona.

The Expo Hotel has 24-hour reception, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Bicycle hire is available to enjoy the city.

Montjuïc Hill, where you can find the Joan Miró Museum and Barcelona’s Fira Congress Centre, is 10 minutes’ walk away. Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium is just one metro stop away.

Hotel Oasis is located just 250 metres from França Railway Station and 100 metres from Barcelona’s Born district. The modern, air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and private bathrooms with hairdryer.

The hotel features a seasonal terrace with a seasonal outdoor pool. The hotel's Oasis café-bar offers a range of hot drinks and cocktails throughout the day.

The beach and bars of Barceloneta are just 200 metres away, while Santa Maria del Mar Church is 4 minutes’ walk away. Oasis is 50 metres from Barceloneta Metro Station, and 300 metres from Ciutadella Park.

Please be aware that the type of bed is always subject to availability.

BYPILLOW Ramblas is a modern guest house conveniently located in the famous Ramblas in Barcelona, 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and the port.

The Wax Museum and the airport bus stop are next to this guest house. The nearest metro station is Drassanes, located only 100 metres away. There is a wide range of monuments, bars and shops within walking distance.

The air-conditioned rooms at BYPILLOW Ramblas come with a TV and private bathroom with shower.

The multilingual staff will be happy to provide tourist information and free local maps. Free WiFi and luggage storage are also offered.

Onix Fira offers a small rooftop pool which is opened from April to October and is not heated, private parking and soundproofed rooms in Barcelona’s centre, overlooking Joan Miró Park. Lively Plaza Espanya is 200 metres away and offers a direct connection to Ramblas.

All of the spacious rooms in the Onix Fira come with free Wi-Fi, a modern décor and a private bathroom. They include a safe, minibar and telephone.

A number of restaurants and bars can be found within a 15-minute walk from the Onix Fira Hotel.

Montjuïc and the Magic Fountains are less than a 10 minutes’ walk away from Fira. The airport bus and Fira Exhibition Centre are 200 metres away.

Please, be aware that swimming pool is not heated and will be opened from April to October.

The Hotel Ronda Lesseps is a quiet and familiar establishment, with two beautiful interior terraces full of plants that allow our guests to relax during their stay in our city.

The Hotel is located in the metropolitan heart of Barcelona, with very good communication by public transport, very close to the historic district of Gràcia and just at a ten minutes’ walk from Antoni Gaudí's Park Güell.

License number: HB-004338

Located 300 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Icaria Beach, Hotel SB Icaria offers a gym, sauna and outdoor pool with sun terrace and hot tub. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Hotel SB Icaria’s stylish modern rooms feature wooden floors and adjustable lighting. Each room has a minibar, safe and private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Mediterranean market cuisine. There is also a bar and a garden terrace.

Hotel SB Icaria is located in the Olympic Port area, a 10-minute walk from Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Zoo. Ciutadella Metro Station is 800 metres away, and is just 2 stops from Barcelona Cathedral and the historic Gothic Quarter.

Hotels: Jardinets De Gràcia by The 5ve Soul
Full_Descriptions:
Featuring quiet street views, Jardinets De Gràcia by The 5ve Soul is located in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Casa Batllo and 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is situated less than 1 km from La Pedrera and features a lift. Rooms are equipped with a terrace with city views and free WiFi.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, slippers and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Jardinets De Gràcia by The 5ve Soul.

Just a 15-minute walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Família Basilica, the stylish, air-conditioned AinB Sagrada Familia apartments offer free Wi-Fi and well-equipped kitchens. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The bright apartments offer city views and elegant minimalist décor. Each apartment has a spacious living-dining room with flat-screen satellite TV. Kitchenettes include a hob, oven and coffee maker.

The charming Born district and Ciutadella Park are within a 10-minute walk of AinB Sagrada Familia. Las Ramblas and Barceloneta Beach can be reached within a 20-minute walk.

Estació del Nord Bus Station is just 200 metres from the apartments and offers national and international bus services, including direct buses to Girona Airport.

Conveniently set in the centre of Barcelona, Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only provides air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a shared lounge. 2 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2 km from Barceloneta Beach, the property offers a terrace and a bar. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain rooms at Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only also offer a city view. At the accommodation each room includes bed linen and towels.

A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only include Picasso Museum, Santa Maria del Mar and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

Situated in the charming Enric Granados Boulevard, 500 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia, this stylish hotel offers a gym, sauna and rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views.

America Barcelona’s rooms are bright and airy, decorated with soft colours and wooden flooring. Each one has a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso Coffee Machine, and some courtesy capsules are provided on arrival. The private bathroom comes with a rain shower, bathrobes and slippers.

Hotel America Barcelona serves a daily buffet breakfast including fresh pastries and fruit and offers a relaxed café-bar in the lobby. A range of drinks and cocktails can be enjoyed on the seasonal terrace, overlooking the city.

Guests are welcome to enjoy free 24-hour access to the modern gym equipped with sauna as well as a free welcome drink including cava, sparkling water or natural juice.

Plaça Catalunya and the Gothic Quarter are just a 15-minute walk from the America Barcelona. Diagonal Metro station is only 400 metres away.

Conveniently set in the centre of Barcelona, Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only provides air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a shared lounge. 2 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2 km from Barceloneta Beach, the property offers a terrace and a bar. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain rooms at Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only also offer a city view. At the accommodation each room includes bed linen and towels.

A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only include Picasso Museum, Santa Maria del Mar and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

These apartments with free Wi-Fi are located in Vall d’Hebron, in the hills above Barcelona. Penitents and Vall d'Hebron Metro Stations are both less than 10 minutes' walk away. By direct metro you can reach La Rambla in 15 minutes.

The Tibidabo Apartments are set within an old villa with a spacious garden and terrace.

The location is convenient for access by car, with the Ronda de Dalt (B20 Ring Road) 200 metres away. Barcelona Airport is 15 minutes' drive away and there is free street parking around the apartments. The CosmoCaixa Science Museum and the Vall d’Hebron Hospital are a short drive away.

The Tibidabo Apartments are at the bottom of Mount Tibidabo, in the Sierra de Collserola. Tibidabo is famous for the beautiful Sagrat Cor Church, amusement park and spectacular views over Barcelona.

This design hotel offers free WiFi and is just 400 metres from Sagrada Família Church. Decorated in elegant neutral tones, rooms include a plasma screen TV with satellite channels.

Rooms at the Eurostars Monumental have wooden floors and modern lighting. Toiletries and a hairdryer are included in the stylish marble bathrooms.

A breakfast buffet is served in the hotel’s restaurant. You can also find various restaurants and cafés within a 5-minute walk, in the area around the Sagrada Familia.

Eurostars Monumental is 100 metres from Monumental Metro Station, which provides direct trains to Passeig de Gracia Station. Estació del Nord Bus Station is just 850 metres away. The property offers a parking space for luggage drop off in front of the hotel.

Hotels: Casa Consell Gran Via, Guest House
Full_Descriptions:
Casa Consell Gran Via, Guest House offers value-for-money and free Wi-Fi on Gran Vía, in Barcelona’s famous Eixample district. It is set 700 metres from Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia.

The guesthouse is only 500 metres from Nord Bus Station. There is easy access to Tetuán and Girona Metro Stations.

The guesthouse is set in a historic building it has elegant décor and original features. Guests can enjoy a full equipped shared kitchen and complimentary coffee and tea during the stay.

Casa Consell Gran Via, Guest House is near many famous Modernista buildings. These include Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and the Sagrada Família. The Gothic Quarter and the Cathedral are also nearby.

Some rooms have a balcony or terrace with street views. They have an en suite bathroom, with typical ceramic tiles.

Pensión San Ramón is located in Barcelona’s Raval district, just 350 metres from the Rambla. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV.

The guest house has vending machines for drinks, and there is a common area with a microwave for guests’ use. There are many restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets.

Staff at reception can provide information about what Barcelona has to offer. Pensión San Ramón is 5 minutes’ walk from the Sala Apolo Nightclub and Paral·lel Metro Station, which connects you with the rest of the city.

Hotel Vilamarí is set 250 metres from Plaza de Espanya Metro Station and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. This hotel features a terrace and a small gym with Turkish Bath.

The Vilamarí’s rooms have simple, elegant décor and dark wood furniture. Each room includes flat-screen satellite TV. The stylish bathrooms come with amenities and a hairdryer. The hotel features centrally controlled air conditioned or heating depending on the season.

Barcelona’s MNAC Art Museum and the Magic Fountains are within a 10-minute walk of the hotel. Las Arenas Shopping Centre is just 200 metres away. Barcelona Port is a 15-minute metro ride away and Barcelona Beach can be reached in 35 minutes.

Located 400 metres from Barcelona’s Plaça Catalunya, Hotel Àmbit Barcelona offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Urquinaona Metro Station is a 3-minute walk away.

Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV, minibar and private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a terrace or balcony.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property, where staff can help with bike hire, car hire and tourist information. Free coffee is available 24 hours on the first floor.

The shopping street, Portal de l'Angel, is 500 metres from Hotel Àmbit Barcelona, while Barcelona Cathedral is 800 metres away. There are many restaurants in the area.

Ciutat de Barcelona is in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, just 100 metres from the Picasso Museum. It has an outdoor rooftop pool, and offers air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs.

Rooms at the Ciutat Barcelona Hotel are also heated and come with a work desk. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and Pure eco toiletries.

The hotel is centrally located. Jaume I Metro Station is just 300 metres away, and it is a 10-minute walk to Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas.

The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and offers luggage storage.

Hotels: Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar Affiliated by Meliá
Full_Descriptions:
The contemporary Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar, managed by Meliá is set in a circular building, 10 minutes’ walk from Mar Bella Beach. It offers a 24-hour gym, and the rooftop pool offers impressive views of Barcelona.

The bright soundproofed rooms at the Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar are spacious and feature air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Each stylish room has a private bathroom and minibar. There are 2 phone lines.

The Barcelona Condal Mar lobby bar offers a range of cocktails. The bright snack lounge features modern armchairs. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the poolside bar. A buffet breakfast is served in the restaurant.

A special late check-out service, locker and transfer is available during the summer months for an extra cost.

The Barcelona Condal Mar is an 8-minute walk from Maresme Forum Metro Station and  a 2-minute walk from the nearest bus stop. The centre of Barcelona can be reached in around 15 minutes by Metro, Bus or Tram.

Within 2 minutes’ walk of Gaudí’s Sagrada Família, these bright modern apartments feature a shared rooftop sun terrace and a small outdoor swimming pool with views of the city’s famous Basilica.

Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments feature a balcony and a living room with parquet floors and floor-to-ceiling windows. The modern kitchen is equipped with a hob, oven, coffee maker and dishwasher.

All Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments have free Wi-Fi. There is also a gym and sauna in the same building which can be used free of charge.

There are several cafés, bars and restaurants on the tree-lined Avinguda Gaudí Avenue, just 250 metres away. There are plenty of shops and supermarkets within walking distance, including Mercat Sagrada Família food market, 5 minutes’ walk away.

Sagrada Família metro station, with lines 2 and 5, is just 1 minute walk from the apartments. Line 2 will take visitors to the city centre in 15 minutes. The number 92 bus goes to Gaudí’s Parc Güell, and Barcelona's El Prat Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

The Sofitel Barcelona Skipper offers 5-star luxury next to Barcelona’s Olympic Port. It is just 100 metres from the beach, with free Wi-Fi and 2 outdoor pools.

This modern hotel has spacious bedrooms, with 55' Smart TVs and DVD players. They have an elegant bathroom with rain shower.

The Sofitel Barcelona Skipper has a rooftop pool, with impressive views of the city and sea; and a large seasonal terrace with sun loungers.

The hotel has 2 seasonal cocktail bars; while the Tendiez Bar, a modern bar with an outdoor terrace, is open all year round.

The hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from Ciutadella Vila Olimpica Metro Station, just 2 stops from the historic city centre. Barcelona Zoo and the pretty Ciutadella Park are also nearby.

These modern apartments are in the Poblenou area of Barcelona, 500 metres from the beach. Free Wi-Fi is available in rooms and in public areas. The CCIB Convention Centre is within walking distance.

Poblenou Metro is 200 metres away and a 20-minute ride takes you to the city centre. There is easy access to the Gaudí buildings on Passeig de Gracia.

The apartments located in 2 separate buildings, 210 metres apart. All of them have a private kitchen complete with a washing machine, dishwasher, and oven. There is also a living room with a flat-screen TV.  Some apartments have a private terrace or balcony, and a communal terrace is available on the top floor.

Private parking is available at an extra cost. Non-smoking and family apartments are available.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the Poble Nou area in Barcelona. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Hotel Margot House Barcelona is located in Barcelona. This hotel is set in front of Casa Batlló, at number 46 in a residential building in the heart of Passeig de Gracia. Passeig de Gracia metro station is in front of the hotel and Sagrada Family is 3 metro stops away.

Each room at this hotel features modern décor and hardwood floors. They include a flat-screen TV, safe, air conditioning, and heating. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower, hairdryer, slippers, and free toiletries.

The property has a 24-hour front desk and library. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available, and a shuttle to the airport can be arranged for an extra charge.

Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas Boulevard are less than 10 minutes away on foot.

The stylish Hotel Jazz is located 2 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona. It features a rooftop pool and terrace with views over the city.

The contemporary rooms include free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The modern bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

A breakfast buffet is served in the modern bar-café area of Hotel Jazz. This includes fresh fruit, pastries, and baked goods.

Universitat Metro Station is less than 100 metres from the hotel. The MACBA and CCCB galleries are within a 5-minute walk while the Gothic Quarter is 10 minutes away.

Fuster Apartments are just 150 metres from Diagonal Avenue and 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya. These stylish apartments are set in a Modernist building dating from 1905.

Fuster Apartments boast high ceilings and mosaic floors. Lounges include a plasma TV, DVD and CD player and sofa, while kitchens have a washing machine, dishwasher, oven and microwave. Some apartments also have balconies. Free Wi-Fi and air conditioning are included, and towels, bed linen and a hairdryer are provided.

There are several bars and restaurants within 5 minutes’ walk. Passeig de Gràcia, with its Gaudí buildings and exclusive shops, is 650 metres away.

The Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ walk from the Fuster Apartments. You can reach Ciutadella Park and Las Ramblas by foot in 20 minutes.

The properties are set 5 minutes’ walk from both Girona and Verdaguer Metro Stations. Nord Bus Station is 1.4 km away

The Hotel Ronda Lesseps is a quiet and familiar establishment, with two beautiful interior terraces full of plants that allow our guests to relax during their stay in our city.

The Hotel is located in the metropolitan heart of Barcelona, with very good communication by public transport, very close to the historic district of Gràcia and just at a ten minutes’ walk from Antoni Gaudí's Park Güell.

License number: HB-004338

Feelathome Center Apartments offers a selection of quality apartments located in different areas of central Barcelona. Please check the room information to see the exact address of each apartment as well as pictures and descriptions

All  partments are located within 20 minutes’ walk of Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square. Most are in the stylish Eixample district.

Each apartment has a TV in the living room, and many also have a sofa bed. They have modern kitchens and bathrooms and most have parquet floors.

Every apartment is located close to a Metro Station which gives you access to the main tourist sights in under 15 minutes.

Hostal Girona is located in the historic heart of Barcelona, a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Plaça Catalunya. It offers free Wi-Fi.

Hostal Girona is a small and modern guest house with a lift. All rooms are air conditioned and have a TV. Some rooms are en suite and others have a shared bathroom.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within walking distance. Private parking is possible nearby, at a daily cost.

The guest house occupies a historic, 19th-century building. The building was part of the Quadrat d’Or. This block was designed by the father of the Eixample neighbourhood, Ildefons Cerdà.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium offers stylish, modern accommodation in a quiet area of central Barcelona. It has free WiFi, a sauna, gym and roof terrace with swimming pool and city views.

Bedrooms at the hotel are spacious and air conditioned. They all have a choice of pillows, a minibar and satellite TV. Each room comes with a Barcelona city guidebook.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium combines a 19th-Century façade with modern interior design. It is surrounded by other Modernist buildings in Barcelona’s Eixample district.

The hotel is set 800 metres from Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas, near the city’s Gothic Quarter. Ciutadella Park and the Olympic Port are also within walking distance.

The NH Collection Podium Hotel has good access to all parts of the city by public transport. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and there is also a lounge bar. A healthy breakfast is available in the mornings. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

This boutique hotel is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia. It offers a free bicycle use, free WiFi

Each room at the ICON Bcn by Petit Palace features modern décor, a flat-screen TV and a shower.

Guests will find a bar and a restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine and reception is open 24 hours a day. The hotel also offers a scooter hire service, subject to availability.

ICON Bcn by Petit Palace is just 7 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana. Urquinaona and Paseo de Gracia Metro are less than 5 minutes’ walk away. Gaudi's La Pedrera is 750 metres away, and you can walk to Ciutadella Park in 15 minutes.

Situated in Barcelona, 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, Hotel Cortes Rambla features views of the city. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a terrace. At Hotel Cortes Rambla rooms include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Plaça Catalunya, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Hotel Cortes Rambla.

Wilson Boutique Hotel is situated on Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal, 12 minutes’ walk from La Pedrera in Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers free Wi-Fi, stylish décor and a rooftop terrace with impressive city views.

The Wilson Boutique Hotel has soundproofed rooms with chic, contemporary design. All rooms are bright with large windows. Each has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.

The hotel is within walking distance of Plaza de Catalunya which features a range of shops and restaurants.

The Wilson Boutique has excellent transport links. Many buses, including the sightseeing bus, stop opposite the hotel.

The hotel offers free use of the PC and printer in the lobby. There is also a tour desk, where guests can receive information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions, including Gaudí’s Casa Batlló which is around 20 minutes’ walk from the Wilson. Diagonal Metro Station is 750 metres away.

Vivo Barcelona Apartments Jordi offers modern and good value for money accommodation. The apartments are located in a quiet street, close to Plaza España.

It offers well-appointed apartments with full kitchens and air conditioning. There is free WiFi, Smart TV, washing machine and dishwasher. The building has been completely renovated in September 2021.

The accommodations are spacious and have a kitchen, bathroom and living-dining area. Here you can relax after a long day of sightseeing and prepare your own meals.

The apartments are located in a well-connected area of the city, Plaza España and the Fira fairgrounds are between 2 and 10 minutes' walk away. A little further afield, you can find the Montjuïc mountain, which houses the National Art Museum of Catalonia and the Miró Foundation.

Our clients say that this part of Barcelona is their favourite, based on independent reviews.

Vivo Barcelona Apartments Jordi has been receiving Booking.com clients since 14 Oct 2008.

Hotel El Palace Barcelona is located in Eixample District, close to the Ramblas, the main shopping area and Barcelona’s main tourist attractions. It offers a Mayan-style luxury spa. A limousine service with a chauffeur is available on request.

Opened in 1919, this hotel features a neo-classical façade and stylish air-conditioned rooms with classic decor. Each room is spacious and comes with satellite TV, desk, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers.

There are 2 restaurants: L'Éclair, located at the hall, and the Winter Garden Restaurant, set at the Roof Terrace; guests can also enjoy a cocktail at the Bluesman Cocktail Bar.

Hotel El Palace Barcelona has a Mayan-style spa with a Temazcal Sauna. Other facilities at this hotel include both fitness and business center and an outdoor pool.

Third person sharing in room is available for Superior room, Junior Suite and Superior Suite.

Staff at Hotel El Palace Barcelona can provide information about the area. Passeig de Gràcia Metro and Railway Station as well as Urquinaona Metro station are less than 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are approximately 15 minutes’ walk away.

The Arc La Rambla has an ideal location on Las Ramblas, 100 metres from Drassanes Metro Station. It offers rooms with free WiFi.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from the city’s port. Plaça Catalunya and the Gothic Quarter are 10 minutes' walk of the hotel.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Arc la Rambla feature simple décor. Each has satellite TV and a private bathroom.

The Arc La Rambla also has a ticket service and bicycle and car rental are possible on site. Lockers are available to rent.

A daily continental breakfast is served in the Ramblas’ dining room. The hotel is within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in Barcelona’s old town.

El Avenida Palace Hotel is set on Barcelona’s Gran Via, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla and Paseo de Gracia. Its grand interior features an impressive staircase and marble columns.

Many famous guests have stayed at the Hotel Avenida Palace, including the Beatles in 1965.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and carpeted or parquet floors. Rooms are soundproofed and have a minibar, work desk and a safe.

The hotel's panoramic rooftop terrace offers views over the city, a sun deck and a swimming pool. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour front desk and both free WiFi and room service are available.

Located in Barcelona’s Eixample District, beside Rocafort Metro Station and 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya,  Chi Hotel offers rooms with air-conditioning and heating (depending on the season) and free WiFi.

The modern rooms include a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Staff can help with tourist information and car hire.

You will find many shops, restaurants and bars in the surrounding area.

Fisa Rentals Ramblas Apartments is located in central Barcelona, just 250 metres from Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas. It offers stylish, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Fisa Rentals apartments feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one comes with a DVD player, and the kitchen includes a hob, microwave, washing machine and dishwasher.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are about 15 minutes’ walk from the apartments. La Boquería Market and the spectacular Palau de la Música Catalana are within a 10-minute walk. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya.

Set just off Plaça d’Espanya and at the foot of Montjuïc, Hotel Acta Azul Barcelona offers stylish accommodation in central Barcelona. It features a roof terrace, 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

Las Ramblas and the city’s Gothic Quarter can be reached in less than 10 minutes, by Metro and here you will find where a selection of bars and restaurants.

Each of the Azul’s spacious rooms has bright décor and wooden flooring. All rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV and a desk.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Fira Conference Centre and Plaça d’Espanya’s Magic Fountains. Montjuïc Park and the MNAC Gallery are within 1 km of the hotel. The bullring-turned-shopping centre of Las Arenas is next door.

Hostel Friends Barcelona is located on the well-known Gran Vía Avenue in Barcelona, 500 metres from Plaza Espanya Square. Free WiFi access is available and 24-hour reception is featured.

This guest house offers free services like luggage storage and safe box.

Rooms at Friends Barcelona have heating, a fan and a small fridge, as well as a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private bathroom, a balcony and a flat-screen TV, while others have a shared bathroom and a TV. Bed linen and towels are included.

The area has very good public transport links. Rocafort metro station is only a minute on foot. Sagrada Familia Temple is 20 minutes by metro.

Hotels: La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms
Full_Descriptions:
Featuring free WiFi, La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms is located in Barcelona. This guest house is set a 7-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and 94 metres from Universitat Metro Station.

This guest house has a Modernist décor and offers air-conditioned rooms in the centre of Barcelona. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tiled floors, and the private bathroom includes a bath or shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.

There is a tour desk available to all guests, and the property can arrange a shuttle to the airport for an extra charge.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and a grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms. Plaza Espanya and the famous Montjuic Fountain are 2 metro stops from the property, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 2.7 km away.

Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia is located in central Barcelona, 50 metres from the well-know Passeig de Gràcia Avenue. Casa Batlló and La Pedrera Modernist buildings are 5 minutes’ walk away.

The stylish and bright apartments at Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia can have 1 to 3 bedrooms, and duplex apartments with terrace are also available.

Featuring modern décor, all air-conditioned apartments are equipped with an open-plan kitchen with ceramic hob, microwave, dishwasher and kitchenware. There is also a living room with a 32-inch flat-screen TV and sofa bed.

Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia is well communicated to the city’s main tourist places, having the metro station 300 metres away.  Passeig de Gràcia is known for being the most important shopping street in Barcelona. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located just 10 minutes' walk away.

Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Rent Top Apartments Rambla Catalunya 8 is located in Barcelona, 200 metres from Plaça Catalunya. Portal de l'Angel is 500 metres from the property.

The accommodation has a seating area. Some units feature a dining area and/or terrace. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher. An oven, a toaster and refrigerator are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Casa Batllo is 500 metres from Rambla Catalunya 8. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

Located 300 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Icaria Beach, Hotel SB Icaria offers a gym, sauna and outdoor pool with sun terrace and hot tub. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Hotel SB Icaria’s stylish modern rooms feature wooden floors and adjustable lighting. Each room has a minibar, safe and private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Mediterranean market cuisine. There is also a bar and a garden terrace.

Hotel SB Icaria is located in the Olympic Port area, a 10-minute walk from Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Zoo. Ciutadella Metro Station is 800 metres away, and is just 2 stops from Barcelona Cathedral and the historic Gothic Quarter.

Set 50 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station, Hotel Condal offers rooms with free WiFi and private bathrooms. Opened in 1850, this hotel in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter offers air conditioned or heated accommodation, depending on the season.

The Condal’s rooms have simple décor with tiled floors. Each room has a flat-screen TV.

A continental breakfast is served in Hotel Condal’s café-bar. There is a varied selection of restaurants in the streets surrounding the hotel.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions, including the MACBA Museum and Barcelona Cathedral, which can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. The Condal is less than 1 km from Port Vell Marina.

Hotels: Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
Full_Descriptions:
Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and restaurant in Barcelona. This 4-star hotel features free WiFi and a bar. Certain units at the property feature a balcony with a city view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel every room includes bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Nova Mar Bella Beach is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while Llevant is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel.

Located just 300 metres from Parallel Avenue and metro station, Barcelona Fifteen central Aparthotel offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen cable TV.

The stylish rooms include a private bathroom, coffee making facilities, and a breakfast bar. The property also has studios with a kitchenette.

The property has a rooftop terrace where you can relax. There is also a communal washing machine, drier and microwave, which guests can use for free.

There is a wide range of restaurants and bars in the surrounding area and Parallel’s many theatres are also near to the guest house.

Las Ramblas Avenue is a 5-minute walk away and Barcelona’s Port Vell just 12 minutes’ walk. Airport buses leave from Plaza Espanya and Plaza Catalunya, which are both 20 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Fifteen Luxury.

The Exe Cristal Palace is very well located next to the prestigious Passeig de Gràcia, the main shopping area and most important places of interest in Barcelona. All rooms at the Exe Cristal Palace have air conditioning, a safe, satellite TV, a minibar, a desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries.

Exe Cristal Palace rooms have a safe and a minibar and feature wooden floors. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

Exe Cristal Palace has a 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and on-site parking is available for an additional charge. The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast, including a healthy corner option.

The buffet breakfast includes a wide variety of dishes and an area with juices and coffees.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Casa Batlló.

Feelathome Mozart Apartments offers air-conditioned apartments located 5 minutes' walk from Barcelona's Diagonal Metro Station. Free WiFi is available and some apartments have a private terrace.

Each apartment features a seating area with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. There is a well-equipped kitchen, which includes a dishwasher and washing machine, and the private bathroom comes with a shower and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla are a pleasant 20-minute stroll down the famous Passeig de Gracia Avenue, with its iconic buildings like La Pedrera and Casa Batlló.

In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Boqueria Market and Santa Maria del Mar, RG House Barcelona offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a dishwasher and coffee machine. It is set 2.7 km from Sant Miquel Beach and provides full-day security. The property is soundproof and is situated 2.7 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some chocolates or cookies. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Picasso Museum, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from RG House Barcelona.

Located beside Barcelona’s Montjuic Hill, Nuevo Triunfo is a 3-minute walk from Parallel Metro Station and 10 minutes from the Rambla. It offers a free Wi-Fi zone and 24-hour reception.

Featuring tiled floors and flat-screen satellite TV, air-conditioned rooms come with a seating area and work desk. The private bathroom is equipped with amenities.

A continental breakfast is available in the Hotel Nuevo Triunfo. There are vending machines for drinks.

Luggage storage is offered and you can hire a car from the tour desk.

Maremagnum Shopping Centre and the Marina are 15 minutes’ walk away. Barceloneta Beach is 10 minutes away by bus.

Hotel Market is located next to Barcelona’s San Antonio Market, 10 minutes' walk from MACBA Gallery. Its chic rooms have rain showers and free Wi-Fi, and there is a popular restaurant.

The Market Hotel’s modern rooms have dark wood beams, white walls and large windows. Each one has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from both Plaza Espanya and Plaza Catalunya. Sant Antoni Metro Station is about 200 metres away, and an airport shuttle bus stop can be found 2 minutes’ away.

The Market Hotel’s elegant restaurant offers a range of modern Catalan dishes, and specializes in rice.

Set on Plaza de Sants, Hostal Sans is a 5-minute walk from Sants Railway Station and just over 1 km from Plaza de Espanya. It offers rooms with TVs, and a 24-hour reception.

Each simply decorated room at Hostal Sans has air conditioning and heating.

Free WiFi is available in public areas, where there are vending machines. Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found in the surrounding Sants district.

Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter can be reached in just 10 minutes by Metro. The nearest beaches are a 30-minute bus journey away.

Exe Laietana Palace is set in a refurbished neo-classical building on Barcelona’s Vía Laietana, beside the city’s old Roman wall. Rooms have flat-screen satellite TV and hydro-massage showers.

The elegant rooms have free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. Some feature views of the Roman wall, while others have a sloping glass roof. All have a safe and minibar, and the bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served from 7:30 until 10:30 and room service is available.

Barcelona Cathedral is 400 metres from the hotel, and the trendy Born district is a 5-minute walk away.

Seventy Barcelona has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as an outdoor swimming pool.

At the hotel the rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Seventy Barcelona the rooms include bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a hammam.

Popular points of interest near Seventy Barcelona include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

A 5-minute walk from Las Ramblas and Drassanes Metro Station, Pensión Solárium is set in Barcelona’s Ciutat Vella district. It has a lounge and a small terrace, where free Wi-Fi is available.

Pensión Solárium has simple, modern décor. Its rooms have either private or shared bathroom facilities.

The Pensión is within 10 minutes’ walk of a range of cafes and bars. The Raval and nearby Gothic Quarter offer a selection of popular restaurants.
