Barcelona’s old Port is 500 metres away, while the beaches around Barceloneta are a 20-minute bus journey from the Solárium. Airport buses leave from Plaza de Catalunya, 2 Metro stops from Drassanes Station.

The Caledonian has an ideal setting on Barcelona's Gran Vía, just 5 minutes' walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Its rooms include free Wi-Fi internet access.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Caledonian feature simple, attractive décor with wooden floors. Each has a minibar and some rooms offer views of Gran Vía.

The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in its dining room. There is a good selection of restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk of the Caledonian.

Universitat Metro Station is just 100 metres from the hotel and connects guests to sights such as Gaudí’s La Perdrera and the Sagrada Familia within 15 minutes.

Guests can make use of services such as the 24-hour front desk and express check-in and check-out. The hotel also has luggage storage.

Situated in the charming residential district of Sarrià, this elegant design hotel offers an outdoor pool and garden area, overlooking Tibidabo Mountain. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The Ikonik Anglí’s spacious rooms have a minimalist design and large windows, which provide plenty of natural light. Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV and a modern bathroom with a range of amenities.

Guests can enjoy a daily breakfast in the Angli’s stylish breakfast room. The Sarrià district is known for its wonderful cake shops, and there are also many popular bars within a 5-minute walk. The hotel also offers meeting rooms for events.

Sarrià FGC Train Station is 600 metres from the Ikonik Anglí, and offers direct services to Barcelona city centre. Plaza Catalunya Square is just a 10-minute train ride away. The nearest airport is Barcelona Airport, 15 minutes drive away from the hotel.

These chic apartments are set on Barcelona’s stylish Rambla de Catalunya, 150 metres from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Apartments at Aspasios Rambla Catalunya Suites feature contemporary decor, a sofa bed, and plasma TV while kitchens have a dishwasher, washing machine, tumble drier and Nespresso coffee maker.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk and Plaza Catalunya is 400 metres away.

Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter are 10 minutes’ walk away and Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batllo are within 5 minutes’ walk.

The Aspasios Rambla Catalunya apartments are 3 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro and Train Station, with direct trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the Eixample area. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, H10 Cubik offers accommodation in Barcelona. The hotel has a seasonal outdoor pool and terrace, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Some units include a seating area for your convenience. Every room comes with a private bathroom.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Sitges is 35 km from H10 Cubik, while Calella is 47 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

Weflating Suites Sant Antoni Market is located in Barcelona, right next to Sant Antoni Market and 12 minutes' walk from the Ramblas. It offers modern, air-conditioned apartments with free WiFi.

The apartment will provide you with a balcony and a seating area. There is a full a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city view from the apartments.

There are many great bars and restaurants in the streets around the apartments, such as Carrer Parlament or Carrer Blai. Apolo Nightclub is also 8 minutes' walk away.

Evenia Rossello is conveniently situated 5 minutes’ walk from the stylish Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and includes a gym. The modern rooms feature wooden floors and free internet connection.

The contemporary L'Illa del Rosselló restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Guests can also enjoy tapas on the terrace, set in small gardens called Placeta Joan Brossa.

Evenia Rossello’s tour desk can provide useful information on the city and arrange car rental. A luggage storage service is also available.

Diagonal Metro Station is 400 metres away and offers direct access to Barcelona city centre. Barcelona Airport is 12 km away.

INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo is located at the foot of Montjuïc, 7 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Ramblas. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with WiFi.

Refurbished in 2017, the rooms at INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo feature smart décor and wooden floors. Each one has a flat-screen TV, minibar, work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast every morning. There is also a snack bar serving light meals in the evenings.

Parallel Metro Station is next to the hotel, connecting you with the Fira Convention Centre in 2 stops.

Hotels: Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments - Gran Vía Suites
Full_Descriptions:
Eric Vökel Gran Via Suites are boutique apartments set in central Barcelona, 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Espanya Square. These chic apartments offer free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned apartment at Eric Vökel has attractive, contemporary décor. All accommodation has a well-equipped kitchenette and a spacious living area with a flat-screen TV.

There are several bars and cafés within 100 metres of the Suites. Set on Gran Via Avenue, the apartments have easy access to a range of supermarkets and shops.

The Vökel is just 20 minutes’ walk from Montjuïc Mountain and Catalunya’s National Art Museum. The famous Las Ramblas and the surrounding Gothic Quarter can be reached in 10 minutes, by Metro.

Located next to Fabra i Puig Station, Ibis Barcelona Meridiana is a 10-minute Metro journey from Plaza Catalunya. It offers a 24-hour bar and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV.

Barcelona Meridiana’s bar serves a wide range of snacks and drinks.

Hotel Ibis Barcelona Meridiana is set next to the Heron City Shopping Centre, where you can find restaurants, cinemas and a gym. Indoor public parking is available at an extra cost.

This hotel is next to Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and just 400 metres from Nova Mar Bella Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, a fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with a LED TV.

Hilton Diagonal Mar Barcelona's terrace, Purobeach Barcelona, has an outdoor pool and paddling pool available from April to October. All services on the Purobeach terrace, including Balinese beds, sunbeds and massages are available for an extra charge.

Purobeach Restaurant offers a diverse menu, as well as a variety of classic cocktails and international spirits. Aürt Restaurant serves Catalan food cooked in front of you. Guests can also enjoy tapas, snacks or drinks at Ma'i.

The hotel has 22 meeting rooms. Barcelona’s CCIB Convention Centre is located next door to the hotel. El Maresme-Forum Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk away, and from here you can get to central Barcelona in around 15 minutes. Barcelona's El Prat Airport is 25 minutes' drive away.

Ideally located, 6 minutes’ walk from both Paseo de Gracia and central Plaza Catalunya, Midtown Apartments offers stylish, modern décor apartments with a seasonal pool and solarium in the building’s rooftop.

Set in the same building, all the soundproofed apartments have a smart TV in each bedroom and a living-dining room with a bluetooth speaker and a free safe. The kitchen is equipped with ceramic hobs, oven and dishwasher; there is a washing machine, a dryer and cleaning products are provided.

Numerous bars and restaurants serving local and international cuisine are within walking distance, and supermarkets open till late can be found nearby.

The apartments are also well connected by bus and metro to all main tourist attractions in Barcelona. A private parking is available on site.

Featuring a rooftop terrace with jacuzzi, a fully equipped kitchen and computers with internet access, Urbany Hostel BCN GO! is set in the heart of Barcelona, just 200 metres from Plaza Universitat Square.

Both shared dorms and private rooms are available, all with air conditioning, free Wi-Fi and bed linen. Each bed has a locker, a reading light, bedside table, a USB charger and 2 plugs. Laundry facilities and towels are available for an extra cost.

Urbany Bar serves drinks and food and there are also vending machines for snacks. A wide range of dining options and bars can be found in the surrounding area.

Staff can help with tourist information and also organize activities in the hostel and around Barcelona city. Luggage storage is available at the hostel.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, which is a 10-minute walk from Urbany Hostel.

Ideally located, 10 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces La Pedrera and La Sagrada Familia, Yeah Barcelona Hostel offers free WiFi and 24-hour reception.

All rooms at Yeah Barcelona Hostel come with a private bathroom with shower and bed linen.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and a dinner including a set menu, is prepared at night at the on-site kitchen. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

Many supermarkets are in the surrounding streets; and trendy bars, restaurants and shops can be found on the many public squares in the Gracia District, 15 minutes’ walk away. The closest metro station is Verdaguer, 500 metres away.

This design hotel is just 150 metres from Plaça Espanya and opposite Las Arenas Shopping Centre. It has an 8th-floor swimming pool and sun terrace with spectacular views of Montjuic.

The air-conditioned rooms at B Hotel are spacious and soundproofed. All rooms have free WiFi, and are decorated with contemporary art. Each room comes with an electric kettle and a pillow-menu.

The room service menu is also available at the bar and by the swimming pool.

Plaza Espanya Metro Station is within 200 metres of the hotel, while Barcelona Fira Exhibition Centre is just 250 metres away. The Magic Fountains of Montjuic are about 5 minutes’ walk away.

Hotels: Happy People Gaudi Sant Pau Apartments
Full_Descriptions:
Happy People Sagrada Familia Apartments offers air-conditioned apartments and studios with free WiFi. Accommodation is 5 minutes’ walk from Camp de l’Arpa Metro Station.

Both studios and apartments feature a living-dining room with air conditioning, a sofa, and a flat-screen TV, and a kitchenette including a microwave, dishwasher and fridge. Some rooms have ceiling fans. The modern bathroom has a hairdryer, and towels and bed linen are provided.

Several bars, restaurants and supermarkets can be found within 5 minutes’ walk. The property offers tours around the city, and airport shuttle service, available on request and for a surcharge.

Located in a residential area of the Eixample District, the property is 15 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia. You can reach Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas in 30 minutes by public transport. Sant Pau Hospital, a spectacular example of modernist architecture, can be reached in 5 minutes on foot.

These modern, fully-equipped apartments with free Wi-Fi are located in a quiet neighbourhood near Montjuïc Hill and the lively Poble Sec neighbourhood. Barcelona’s ferry terminal is just 5 minutes’ drive away.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments. Mercat Sant Antoni Food Market is about 10 minute’s walk away.

The apartments are about 15 minutes’ walk from the city’s famous Ramblas. Parallel Metro Station is about 5 minutes’ walk away and services line 3, which will take visitors to Plaza Catalunya and Plaza Espanya.

Aparthotel Mariano Cubi can be found just 200 metres from Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal and 15 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gracia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and some have a kitchenette.

All spacious rooms have wooden floors, satellite TV, and a desk.

The Aparthotel Mariano Cubi's tour desk can help guests plan their stay in Barcelona. There is also a free business centre with internet access.

The area has a wide range of shops. Fontana Metro station is about 500 metres away and Gràcia FGC Station is only 150 metres away. From there you can get to Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas. Gaudí's La Pedrera is about 20 minutes’ walk away.

Offering a rooftop pool and terrace,  NH Collection Barcelona Constanza has modern rooms with satellite TV. It is located next to L’Illa Shopping Centre on Diagonal Avenue, 15 minutes' walk from Sants Train Station.

The elegant, modern rooms at the Constanza feature a Nespresso machine, flat-screen TV, and pillow menu, while the bathroom includes a rain shower and a professional hairdryer. Free WiFi is included.

Guests can use the spa for an extra cost. The gym is available free of charge. Room service is available 24 hours.

The hotel's Antiox healthy buffet breakfast features antioxidant dishes made with ecological produce.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. María Cristina Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, connecting you with the Fira Exhibition Centre in under 10 minutes.

Offering free private parking and free WiFi, La França Travellers is located next to Montjiuic, 10-minute walk from Plaza de España and Fira de Barcelona. 24-hour reception is available.

This adults-only guesthouse boasts modern décor and air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV. All have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All suites have a spa bath and some have a round bed.

Bars, restaurants and several dining options can be found in the surrounding streets.

Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located just 500 metres away.

Yurbban Trafalgar Hotel features a rooftop terrace with a pool providing 360 degree panoramic views of Barcelona. The hotel is located just 300 metres from Urquinaona Metro Station.

All rooms are soundproof and air-conditioned, equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A safety deposit box is also available. Bathrooms has a shower and a hairdryer.

Yurbban Trafalgar Hotel also offers a gym, a bar and a restaurant. A tour desk and laundry facilities are available.

Shops, bars and restaurants can be found within metres from the hotel. Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk away and Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Descriptions: 5 beds (2 singles, 2 bunk beds, 1 sofa bed)
Full_Descriptions:
Set in Barcelona, Hotel Sagrada Familia Apartments offers self-catering apartments set 50 metres from Gaudi's Sagrada Familia. Sagrada Familia Metro Station is 3 minutes' walk away.

The apartments are soundproofed, air-conditioned and have free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. All apartments feature a kitchenette fitted with a dishwasher and microwave, as well as a living-dining area.

Bed linen and towels are provided, but only basic, initial cleaning supplies and toiletries are available.

Gaudi's Casa Batllo and La Pedrera are 20 minutes' walk from Hotel Sagrada Familia Apartments. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Located in Barcelona’s beachfront area of Barceloneta, this design hotel has a stylish terrace overlooking the port. It offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with a smart TV.

The rooms at the Hotel 54 Barceloneta feature modern décor and innovative lighting. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

There is a variety of good seafood restaurants within 5 minutes’ walk of Hotel 54.

The 54 Barceloneta is just 3 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Beach. You can walk to the attractive Born district in 10 minutes, and Barceloneta Metro Station is a 7-minute walk away.

Well set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Sagrada Familia Rooms is located 700 metres from Sagrada Familia, 1.3 km from Casa Batllo and 1.1 km from La Pedrera. The property is situated 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre, 2.4 km from Portal de l'Angel and 2.6 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. Plaça Catalunya is 2 km from the bed and breakfast.

Certain units in the bed and breakfast have private entrance and are fitted with wardrobe and dressing room. With a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also provide guests with free WiFi, while some rooms here will provide you with a balcony. The units at the bed and breakfast include air conditioning and a desk.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Sagrada Familia Rooms.

Hotels: AC Hotel Diagonal L'Illa by Marriott
Full_Descriptions:
AC Hotel Diagonal L´Illa offers accommodation in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Camp Nou. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurants,  paid parking located at commercial center.

Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

Every room at this hotel has plush bedding, a flat-screen TV and a spacious work desk. Every room includes a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Surrounded by lush gardens, the property is near many upscale boutiques and restaurants.

The Suite Bar is a modern, welcoming space on the hotel’s second floor. Its contemporary décor and lighting make it an ideal spot to enjoy a drink.

The Picasso Museum is 3.8 km from AC Hotel Diagonal L´Illa, while La Pedrera is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 11 km away.

Villa Sagrada offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning and a balcony with street views, just 550 metres from Sagrada Familia. Encants Metro Station is 3 minutes’ walk away.

This modern studio has a 2 single beds, a sofa bed, a flat-screen TV and dining table. The kitchenette is equipped with a fridge, hob, microwave and coffee machine. There is also a bathroom with a shower.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Plaza Catalunya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport is a 15-minute metro ride away and Barceloneta Beach is 3.5 km away.

Offering quiet street views, Weflating Sant Antoni Market is an accommodation situated in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment has family rooms.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Boqueria Market and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 12 km from Weflating Sant Antoni Market, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Set in the heart of Barcelona, just 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square, TOC Hostel Barcelona offers an outdoor pool and a terrace.

The property offers private and shared rooms with air conditioning and heating. Some rooms have a flat-screen TV and some have a private bathroom. There is a shared TV area, kitchen and games room for guests to make use of.

TOC Hostel Barcelona also offers tourist information of the area and a ticket service. You will also find many bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Metro Universtitat is a 2-minute walk from the property and a 25-minute metro ride will take you to Barceloneta Beach. Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ metro ride away.

Hotel Call Barcelona is located right in the centre of Barcelona’s historic Barri Gótic, 10 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas. It is close to Plaça Sant Jaume and not far from the Cathedral.

The rooms in the Hotel Call are spacious and practical. It offers air conditioned or heated accommodation, depending on the season. There is free Wi-Fi and a safe. The bathrooms have a shower.

The nearest Metro stops are Jaume I and Liceu, both about 10 minutes’ away. The famous Ramblas are also about 10 minutes’ walk away.

Hotel Call is also close to central Barcelona’s main shopping areas such as Portaferrisa and Portal de L'Àngel. The trendy Born area is also close by – here you will find plenty of restaurants and bars.

This hotel is housed in a vintage, 19th-century building on central Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia. It lies at the heart of the city’s Modernist Route architecture trail.

The Hotel Paseo de Gracia is surrounded by chic boutiques and stunning architecture on one of the city’s main boulevards. On the same street, just a short walk away, you will find 2 of Gaudí’s most important Modernist works, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. Several metro lines run nearby, giving you excellent access to any of Barcelona’s many sights.

The hotel’s simple, functional guestrooms all come with a TV. Some boast balconies overlooking Passeig de Gracia.

There are vending machines for drinks and snacks.

Hotel Transit is just 3 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants, the city’s main AVE Train Station. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

Rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, central heating and central air conditioning. Some rooms overlook an interior patio. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, shower, and hairdryer.

There are vending machines on-site for coffee, drinks and snacks. Several bars and restaurants can be found a short walk from the Transit Hotel.

You can reach Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla in 10 minutes by bus or Metro, and Sants Estació Metro Station is 250 metres away. Plaza Espanya and the Magic Fountain are 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

Apart-Suites Hostemplo offers stylish apartments and suites set in 2 beautiful Modernist buildings, 250 metres from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia. This soundproofed accommodation features free Wi-Fi and a DVD player.

The property offers contemporary décor with wooden floors. The apartments come with air conditioning and heating, as well as a private balcony. Most have views of Sagrada Família. Most of the apartments have a washing machine.

A buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local produce and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily at Hotel Hostemplo, located 150 meters from the property.

The junior suite features a fridge, microwave and kettle, and it has a TV. Located on the 5th floor, it offers views of Sagrada Família.

In 5 minutes you can walk to Sagrada Família Market, as well as Gaudí Avenue, where there are many restaurants, bars and shops. Barcelona's open-top bus tour route also stops just 3 minutes' walk from the property.

Apart-Suites Hostemplo is situated just metres from Avinguda Diagonal and just 3 minutes' walk from Sagrada Família Metro Station. Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are a 10-minute walk away on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, in the city centre.

Casa Gràcia is a modern hostel at the top of Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia, 300 metres from Gaudí’s La Pedrera. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi in all areas.

Shared and private rooms are available, as well as apartments. Facilities at Casa Gràcia include a communal terrace, lounge, kitchen, dining area and a 24-hour front desk.

The hostel arranges daily walking tours of the city.

Casa Gràcia is situated just metres from Avinguda Diagonal and within 300 metres of Diagonal Metro Station, which offers access to the Sagrada Familia.

Passeig de Gràcia is full of exclusive shops, restaurants and bars. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló is within a 10-minute walk,  as well as the popular Gràcia neighbourhood. There are a number of beautiful Modernist buildings in the area.

Fisa Rentals Gran Via Apartments are stylish apartments set 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. They have free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV.

Each spacious Fisa Rentals apartment offers contemporary décor and chic wooden floors. All apartments are air conditioned, but there is one bedroom that doesn't have air conditioning. All the apartments have a spacious seating area with satellite TV. The well-equipped kitchens also have a washing machine.

The apartments have easy access to the centre of Barcelona and are within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of shops, bars and restaurants.

Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard is 300 metres away and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera can be reached in 15 minutes, by foot. Passeig de Gràcia and Urquinaona Metro Stations are around 200 metres away.

This hotel, located in the Gothic heart of Barcelona near the Cathedral, enjoys an ideal location for visiting the sights of this exciting city.

Hotel Suizo has modern facilities and comfortable rooms with satellite television and air conditioning. Watch the world go by from the bedroom with a balcony overlooking the streets of Barcelona’s Gothic quarter, or relax in the Suizo’s lounge.

Wander in the labyrinth of narrow streets surrounding the impressive Barcelona Cathedral, just 200 metres from the hotel. A short walk takes you to the famous Ramblas, with its colourful street performers and pavement cafés.

Walk down to the old port or the beach, or take the metro to visit other areas of the city. A metro station next to the Hotel Suizo makes public transport connections easy.

Situated 100 metres from Universitat Metro Station, this boutique hotel offers stylish rooms with free tea and coffee making facilities. Plaza Catalunya is just 400 metres away.

Each air-conditioned room at chic&basic Reding has flat-screen satellite TV and a safe. Rooms come with a minibar, a trouser press and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer, a magnifying mirror and toiletries.

chic&basic Reding has a business centre with a computer and printer. The hotel has free internet connection points. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide visitor information and help to arrange restaurant reservations or car rental.

chic&basic Reding is a 5-minute walk from the famous Las Ramblas. Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop just 450 metres away, in Plaza Catalunya.

Situated just off famous La Rambla Boulevard in central Barcelona, Hotel Rialto occupies a historic building where the artist Joan Miró was born. It offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV.

Each room at the Rialto Hotel Barcelona has wooden floors and a simple, functional design. The modern bathrooms include basic toiletries. Safes are available to rent.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast and delicious Mediterranean meals at the Rialto’s Miró restaurant. There are also many restaurants and lively bars in the surrounding streets. 

Hotel Rialto’s 24-hour reception offers information about the city. The Boquería Market and Barcelona Cathedral are both within 400 metres. Liceu Metro Station is only 300 metres away, and Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

These apartments are located in the residential neighbourhood of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi, only 10 minutes from Plaça Catalunya.

The aparthotel boasts attractive and spacious studios that make your stay a more comfortable and pleasant one. It also has excellent public transport connections with the centre of Barcelona.

Bonanova Suite offers 24-hour reception, a tour desk and shuttle service at an extra cost.

El Putxet Train Station is 4 minutes' walk away and Gaudi's Park Güell is a 30-minute walk away.

Ako Suites Hotel offers stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi and modern kitchenettes. It is located a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya Square.

The Ako Suites have a sleek minimalist design and are decorated in light colours. A flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed can be found in each air-conditioned apartment.

Kitchenettes include a ceramic hob and a microwave. The elegant bathrooms have a bath or shower. Towels and amenities are also provided.

Ako Suites Hotel is located just 300 metres from Universitat Metro Station and a 5-minute walk from an airport bus stop. Staff at the 24-hour reception is happy to provide information about the city.

Hotel Brummell is a 20-room boutique hotel located a few steps from the Miró Foundation and The Grec theatre. Guests will benefit from free and unlimited yoga classes. A running club, for both guests and locals, is organized regularly.

The hotel features an outdoor pool, a garden and a sauna. T-training and boxing session are hosted at the well-being center The Loft.

All rooms boast modern furniture and artwork by young European designers. Each one is equipped with a safe, coffee and tea facilities and a yoga mat. The private bathroom has a rain shower, a high-powered hairdryer and free toiletries by MMLL. Suites have a private, furnished terrace with an outdoor bath.

Brummell Kitchen offers a seated buffet breakfast with homemade granola, local products and fresh orange juice. Guest will also have 24h/7 access to the our self service Honesty Bar, with a selection of drinks, tasty snacks and other delights.

You will also enjoy our on site restaurant Palo Cortao restaurant. A revisited taverna with twisted classic flavor and dishesm and a great wine menu.

Hotel Brummell is just a 15-minute walk from La Rambla and the closest metro station is Parallel Metro Station, 250 m away.

For guests who wish to explore the sights of Barcelona, Montjuïc is known for its parks and gardens and is within 10 minutes' walk. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Please note that the swimming pool will be closed for maintenance from the 1 till the 23 of December.

Pol & Grace Hotel is located just 100 metres from Barcelona’s Plaça Molina and Sant Gervasi Train Stations. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access.

This modern hotel features a library and an area displaying works by local artists, as well as a free work area. A free coffee and tea service is offered from mid-morning onwards.

Each soundproofed room at Pol & Grace Hotel has functional, modern décor and includes a small fridge, a free safe and a welcome gift. The fully equipped bathrooms come with toiletries.

A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning. Room service is also available. The hotel has a 24-hour reception with car rental service and a tour desk. Private parking is available on site.

Fontana Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to Plaza Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Parc Güell. The popular Gràcia district is within a 2-minute walk of the property and has a range of shops, restaurants and lively bars.

Descriptions: 4 beds (2 bunk beds, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Located 300 metres from famous Sagrada Familia, BBarcelona Gaudí Flats offers bright apartments with free Wi-Fi. Apartments have a balcony with city views.

All apartments have a spacious living-dining room with a sofa and a flat-screen TV; and a fully equipped kitchen including a dishwasher, a microwave, and kitchenware. There is a washing machine, and ironing facilities are also provided.

Numerous bars, restaurants, as well as supermarkets and shops open till late are in the surroundings.

BBarcelona Gaudí Flats is well connected to the city centre. You can reach both Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 15 minutes by public transports. The closest metro station is Sagrada Familia, just a 2-minute walk from apartments.

This hotel is set in the heart of the cosmopolitan city of Barcelona, just a short distance from Las Ramblas and within walking distance of attractions such as the Liceu opera house and Plaça Catalunya.

The Hotel Alba is located in Barcelona’s old town, and its beautiful façade is listed for its artistic interest. Inside, relax in a spacious en suite bedroom with balcony and air conditioning.

Stroll down the colourful Ramblas to the seafront, or enjoy cava and tapas in the famous Boqueria food market. Just a short walk away, the narrow streets of the Gothic Quarter are full of shops, bars and restaurants.

The Alba boasts convenient public transport links, with Liceu metro station only 300 metres away. From here you can travel quickly and conveniently to attractions including the Fira de Barcelona and Gaudi’s incredible Parc Güell.

BBarcelona Central Boutique Apartments has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Casa Batllo, 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is situated 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and features a lift. Guests can access the apartment via private entrance.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while selected rooms also boast a terrace. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Magic Fountain of Montjuic and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from BBarcelona Central Boutique Apartments.

Hostal Sol y K is set in Barcelona, 200 metres from Plaza Reial and 400 metres from La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona. Hostal Sol y K features free WiFi .

Rooms come with a private or shared bathroom.

You will find a tour desk at the property.

Picasso Museum is 500 metres from Hostal Sol y K, while Portal de l'Angel is 700 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Located in Barcelona, BBarcelona Clot Apartments is a recently renovated accommodation, 3 km from Mar Bella Beach and 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.8 km from La Pedrera. The apartment features family rooms.

With a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony.

Casa Batllo is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 16 km from BBarcelona Clot Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Situated in Barcelona, in the Gracia district, 1 km from Park Güell, Sonder l Le Palacete features an interior garden and courtyard.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Some units feature a seating area and a private terrace. You will find a coffee machine in the room. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Sonder l Le Palacete features free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers contact-free check-in and 24/7 virtual support which limits in-person interaction.

Sagrada Familia is 1.3 km from Sonder l Le Palacete, while La Pedrera is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Sonder l Le Palacete.

Hotels: Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG Hotel
Full_Descriptions:
The Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG Hotel is located in the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, a short walk from the Plaça Catalunya metro station and in the Portal del Angel shopping district and 10 minutes from the Paseo de Gracia shopping area. This elegantly designed property features a Mediterranean restaurant, a cafeteria, a terrace with a bar and a rooftop pool.

All rooms feature contemporary décor. All have a yoga mat, tea and coffee making facilities, smart TV, minibar and exclusive bathrobe.In addition, the hotel offers the Forgot it? We got it! Which makes available to its guests a whole series of amenities and accessories that will further improve their stay.

The gastronomic space of the Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG chain hotel, has a rooftop terrace with magnificent views of the city, pool, sun loungers, cocktails and snacks, Terraza de Vivi. The Fauna restaurant located on the first floor offers Mediterranean cuisine with Catalan roots in a room reminiscent of a typical Eixample apartment. Got Coffee & Cocktails overlooks the street and serves locally sourced coffee, wine and signature cocktails. This gastronomic space is a place where guests feel at home. Every day from 6pm the free Social Wine Hour is offered to all guests with an open bar of local wines.

This pet-friendly hotel is close to attractions such as Barcelona Cathedral, Plaza de Catalunya and the Palau de la Música Catalana. Barcelona-El Prat Airport, located 15 km away, is the closest.

Our clients say that this part of Barcelona is their favorite, according to independent comments.

Situated in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sants Railway Station, Nobu Hotel Barcelona features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel rooms have air conditioning and a safety deposit box.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.4 km from Nobu Hotel Barcelona, while Casa Batllo is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

Sensation Authentic Gracia is a self-catering accommodation located in Barcelona. Free WiFi access is available in all apartments. The property is a 10-minute walk from Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia.

Accommodation will provide you with a TV and air conditioning. There is a full kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a bath, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All properties include a private balcony with chairs and tables. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Joanic Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away, and you can reach Plaça Catalunya and the centre in 15 minutes by metro. You can reach Gaudi's La Pedrera in 20 minutes by metro, and Barcelona-El Prat Airport is located 16 km away.

Valencia 3 in Barcelona offers accommodation with free WiFi, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel, and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from Casa Batllo.

Towels and bed linen are offered in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include La Pedrera, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Valencia 3.

Situated on Barcelona’s famous La Rambla, this restored 19th-century building features a rooftop pool with a sun terrace. The elegant rooms include free Wi-Fi and a marble bathroom.

The colonial-style Hotel 1898 has unique architectural and historical heritage which gives it the Speciality Monument status.

It features a stylish restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. It also offers a bar-restaurant with a terrace where guests can enjoy traditional tapas.

Plaza Catalunya is just 200 metres from 1898 Hotel. Guests can also walk to the Gothic Quarter with its cathedral in 10 minutes.

Sonder l Vasanta is set in a 20th century neo-classical building, 200 metres from Urquinaona Metro Station. It offers chic, soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and in some cases, a balcony or terrace.

Air-conditioned rooms feature modern design and include a flat-screen TV  and a private bathroom.

The Vasanta is a 4 minute walk from Passeig de Gracia and 400 metres away from Plaza Catalunya.

You can walk to Barcelona Cathedral, Las Ramblas and the Gothic and Born districts within 8 minutes. Hotel Vasanta is 20 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia.

In a prime location in the centre of Barcelona, Exe Plaza Catalunya provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace and free WiFi. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. All units include a safety deposit box.

A buffet, continental or gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the property.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception.

Popular points of interest near Exe Plaza Catalunya include Plaça Catalunya, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

Situated 200 metres from Barcelona’s Magic Fountain, the elegant InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel offers spacious rooms with a flat-screen TV and hydromassage shower.

Offering fantastic views over Barcelona, the hotel’s 173 Rooftop Terrace features an outdoor pool, sun loungers, and a dining area where guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine and a selection of drinks and cocktails.

Arrel Restaurant pays homage to the land and the produce it provides throughout all seasons of the year. The restaurant features an open kitchen serving small portions to share, buffet breakfasts and lunch and dinner service.

Quirat Restaurant is an exclusive space that will offer an interpretation of the land and its products through a menu of dishes that responds to the different seasons, designed exclusively for the restaurant by a Chef with 1 Michelin Star. Enjoy an unforgettable dinner in the most exclusive of our restaurants.

Gebre Cocktails and More and, in addition to the cocktail classics, it will offer a menu of artisan signature cocktails that will try to convey a very specific sensory experience connected to the world of the land that surrounds us.

There is free WiFi available in public areas and in rooms and the lobby area at InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel features a free internet point.

The spa has a water circuit, a dry sauna, a hammam, hot tub, gym, and 6 treatment cabins.

From the hotel, Barcelona’s historic centre can be easily reached by bus or metro. Poble Sec and Espanya Metro Stations are both 500 metres away. Poble Espanyol and the Joan Miró Foundation are 200 metres away.

This ultra-modern hotel is located right on central Barcelona’s Ramblas, just 300 metres from the seafront promenade. It offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The rooms at the Ikonik Ramblas feature parquet floors and chic décor. Each one comes with a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what Barcelona has to offer. They can also help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events.

Many famous sites are within easy walking distance. The Liceu Theatre is 400 metres away, while Plaza Real is a 3-minute walk away. Barcelona Cathedral is less 800 metres away.

You can walk to Barcelona’s famous Boquería Market in 7 minutes from the hotel. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 15 minutes’ walk away.

Hotels: Grand Hotel Central, Small Luxury Hotels
Full_Descriptions:
Grand Central Hotel Barcelona is a design hotel offering fantastic views of the Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral from its rooftop infinity pool. It has stylish rooms and free high-speed WiFi.

The elegantly refurbished hotel is housed in an early 20th-century building and it is a clear example of the Catalan Noucentisme.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Grand Hotel Barcelona have a modern design. They are equipped with a 4K high-definition TV´s with Chromecast . Each one has a bathroom with a large, rain-effect shower and luxury toiletries.

The restaurant offers an authentic Spanish-style dining experience with small "platillos" to be shared, as well as a selection of over 150 local and national wines. An excellent culinary proposal that will make you feel like a local. La Terraza del Central, in the rooftop, is the perfect place to enjoy a dinner, a cocktail or both overlooking the city lights of Barcelona.

The hotel has a fitness centre and massage services are also offered. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, and you can also hire a car or a bicycle.

The Born district, full of stylish shops and restaurants, is just 3 minutes’ walk from the Grand Central Hotel.

Situated in the charming Grácia neighborhood in Barcelona, Lodging Apartments Gracia offer free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and heating. Gaudi’s famous Sagrada Familia is about 1.5 km away.

These modern departments with simple décor feature plenty of natural light and a spacious living-dining room. Each apartment has a kitchenette, microwave and coffee machine.

Fitted with parquet flooring, the bedrooms include a wardrobe. The private bathroom has a shower or bath tub. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Within walking distance from the apartments visitors will find a variety of restaurants, cinemas and shops. Joanic Metro Station is about 10 minutes’ walk away. Plaza Catalunya and the city centre are 4.4 km from the apartments.

Set just 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia in Barcelona, Aspasios Garden Apartments offers a getaway with a garden, outdoor pool, free WiFi, and a lift. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is 800 metres from Casa Batllo, and within 1.3 km of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Aspasios Garden Apartments.

Acacia Suite is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, just 50 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station. It offers air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and a shared roof terrace.

The modern apartments feature a lounge with carpeted floors, sofas and a TV. The kitchenette includes an electric hob and a microwave. Bed linen and towels are changed daily.

The Acacia serves a daily continental breakfast directly at the apartments. The aparthotel also has a free business centre. Board games are also available for guests’ use.

The Acacia offers discounts on Barcelona’s popular tourist bus. The city’s financial district is 800 metres away, and you can reach Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in 3 minutes by metro.

Set in the centre of Barcelona, Casa Consell Bailen, Guest House is a recently renovated accommodation, which offers soundproof rooms. It is situated 2.8 km from Barceloneta Beach and features a shared kitchen. The guest house has family rooms.

All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Units come with a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms also feature a terrace and some have city views. At the guest house, the units include bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from Casa Consell Bailen, Guest House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Aspasios Las Ramblas Apartments is located in central Barcelona, next to Palau Güell and 100 metres from the Rambla. It offers stylish, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi, and some have a private terrace.

The modern apartments feature a spacious, open-plan lounge-diner with a sofa and TV. The kitchenette includes a hob, microwave and Nespresso machine, as well as a dishwasher and washing machine. There is free Wi-Fi, and bed linen and towels are provided.

The apartments are 7 minutes’ walk from the seafront and the Boqueria Market. Located 250 metres away, Drassanes Metro Station connects you with the rest of the city with ease. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 10 minutes’ walk away.

Suites Independencia offers stylish apartments set just 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia and 150 metres from Encants Metro Station. It features apartments with cable TV.

The Indepencia’s bright, air-conditioned accommodation has simple, modern décor. Each apartment has a spacious seating area and a well-equipped kitchenette with an oven. Some apartments have a balcony.

The area surrounding the apartments has a varied selection of shops, cafés and restaurants. Sagrada Familia Market is a 10-minute walk away.

Barcelona’s old town and Las Ramblas are just 4 Metro stops from Encants. The beaches at Poblenou are less than 2 km from the Suites Independencia.

Hotels: Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
Full_Descriptions:
Located between the stylish Paseo de Gràcia and Rambla de Catalunya, Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton offers a private terrace with an outdoor pool. Plaza Catalunya is 7 minutes' walk away.

Rooms combine modern and vintage furniture and some feature traditional details like mosaic-tiled floors. They have flat-screen TVs, a minibar, hairdryer and free safe. The TVs have over 50, some international channels and free WiFi.

Solomillo Restaurant is a brasserie, offering guests the option of having meat by weight. The modern Charcuteria serves cheese plates, cold cuts and market products, as well as a variety of cocktails. You can also visit the Patio, Terrace & Pool.

There is a fitness room and guests can make use of the chromatic sauna for free. Massages are available on request for an extra cost.

Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s impressive Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Passeig de Gràcia Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, with a direct route to the Barcelona Airport.

Meliá Barcelona Sarriá features a spa, a 24-hour gym and a restaurant. Gaudi’s major works, such as La Pedrera and Casa Battló are 2 km away. There is free WiFi available throughout.

The Melia Barcelona Sarriá’s rooms feature chic, contemporary décor with 42-inch TVs and bathrooms with marble finishing and baths or showers.

All Level Lounge Rooms offer superior services including exclusive private areas, a private reception area with personalized attention and 1 free access per stay to the on-site  Serena spa.

A welcoming international buffet breakfast, including gluten-free products and options and special dietary options, is served every morning. The Nonna Maria restaurant serves mediterranean and international cuisine.

The city’s upmarket Avenida Diagonal shopping avenue is just 1 block away; while Barcelona Camp Nou is within 10 minutes by car. Francesc Macià square is just 200 metres from the hotel and you can walk to the elegant Passeig de Gracia Boulevard in about 20 minutes.

Hotels: Sir Victor Hotel, part of Sircle Collection
Full_Descriptions:
Sir Victor Hotel, part of Sircle Collection in Barcelona offers stylish accommodation on Passeig de Gràcia, 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s La Pedrera. It features a rooftop swimming pool and a terrace offering excellent views of Barcelona.

Each of the Sir Victor Hotel, part of Sircle Collection rooms has chic, contemporary décor. Rooms overlook Passeig de Gràcia, or the hotel’s interior garden. Each has satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and a large bathroom.

The Spa features steam baths, a sauna, and a state-of the art gym.

The lobby restaurant & bar, MR PORTER, offers an innovative selection of dishes to share.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 15 minutes, by foot. Diagonal Metro Station is just 70 metres from the hotel.

This design guest house has an excellent location just 200 metres from Gaudí’s world-famous Sagrada Familia. There is free Wi-Fi throughout.

Rooms and apartments at Hostemplo Sagrada Familia are bright and have modern design. They have a flat-screen TV with DVD player and air conditioning. All rooms have a private bathroom.

Hostemplo Sagrada Familia rooms occupy all three floors of a historic modernist building, that preserves its original front. The interior is fully renovated. The suites are located in a new outbuilding.

A buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local produce and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily at Hotel Hostemplo, located 150 metres from the property.

The Tourist Bus passes the guest house and stops only 100 metres away. Tickets are conveniently available at reception. There is a metro station just 150 metres from the property.

There is 24-hour access to the building, as well as 24-hour reception.

Exe Ramblas Boquería is situated right on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, next to La Boquería Market. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms offer free WiFi, flat-screen satellite TV and a private balcony.

Exe Ramblas Boquería features elegant modern décor, with hardwood floors and designer furniture. The soundproofed rooms have views of Las Ramblas or the colourful Boqueria Market.

A varied buffet breakfast is served in the Exe Ramblas Boquería’s bright dining room. The Boquería is an ideal place to sample typical tapas and fresh fruit, while numerous restaurants and bars can be found nearby.

Barcelona Cathedral and Plaça Catalunya are both within 400 metres of the hotel. Liceu Metro Station is just 100 metres away.

Set in a same building in the Eixample District, Lodging Apartments Eixample offers air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is a 4-minute walking away.

Each apartment features a living room with a flat-screen cable TV; and a fully equipped kitchen or kitchenette. There is a washing machine, and cleaning products are also provided.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the apartments; and you can find fresh produces at a market located 600 metres away.

Lodging Apartments Eixample is well connected by public transport; the closest metro stations are Tetuan and Verdaguer, both 500 metres from apartments. Barcelona North Bus Station is within 10 minutes’ walk of Lodging Apartments Eixample.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in a same building. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Hotel Condes Barcelona occupies a 19th-century building on Passeig de Gracia with a seasonal rooftop pool and terrace. It features a gym and a sauna.

The soundproofed rooms at Condes de Barcelona Hotel are air conditioned, LCD satellite TV and laptop safe. They have views of Passeig de Gracia or a pretty Eixample courtyard, and some rooms include a small balcony.

The hotel has an elegant rooftop bar, Alaire Terrace Bar with wonderful views.

The Condes is just 100 metres from Gaudi’s La Pedrera, and a 10-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya and La Rambla. Passeig de Gracia Train Station, 200 metres away, offers direct links to Barcelona Airport.

Hotels: Bright apartment close to congress center & port
Full_Descriptions:
Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Bright apartment close to congress center & port has a balcony. It is set 2.3 km from Llevant and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Forum Beach is 2.3 km away.

The apartment includes 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and kitchenware, as well as a coffee machine. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Platja del Litoral is 2.4 km from Bright apartment close to congress center & port, while Sagrada Familia is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 18 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, these elegant apartments are just 200 metres from Girona Metro Station. They offer TVs and modern furniture, and all have washing machines.

Gaudi’s La Pedrera is just 10 minutes’ walk away, while Passeig de Gracia Boulevard is 600 metres away. Restaurants and bars can be found within a 5-minute walk of the Sant Jordi Girona 97 apartments.

Apartaments Sant Jordi Girona 97 have large lounge areas with a sofa, and a dining area. The kitchens all have a fridge and a hob. Wi-Fi is available for a small charge.

Apartments Barcelona Sagrada has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Bogatell Beach, 600 metres from Sagrada Familia and 2.1 km from La Pedrera. It is situated 2.3 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apartments Barcelona Sagrada.

Situated on Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona, the Hotel Olivia Plaza offers free Wi-Fi and a terrace bar with views of Santa Ana Church. Stylish rooms include a flat-screen TV.

This design hotel serves a buffet breakfast and guests can also order breakfast to the room. The modern Nineteen restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine.

The chic rooms at the Olivia Hotel Barcelona include a free safe and views over the square. They are also equipped with a sofa or armchair and a breakfast table.

Guests at Olivia Plaza Hotel have free access to Holmes Place Urquinaona gym, located 500 metres from the hotel. Guests can make free use of the pool area and fitness room there.

The Olivia Plaza Barcelona is just 100 metres from the famous Ramblas with its many restaurants and street performers. Catalunya Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel and the Gothic Quarter is less than 10 minutes away.

Offering an outdoor swimming pool, Olivia Balmes Hotel is set 400 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, in the elegant Eixample neighbourhood. The modern hotel features stylish air-conditioned rooms and a restaurant.

Each bright spacious room includes free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen satellite TV and a laptop safe. The contemporary bathrooms have an open-plan design.

The hotel’s restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Olivia Balmes offers a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool and sun loungers. There is also a bar, serving cocktails and snacks, as well as several meeting rooms.

Olivia Balmes Hotel has private parking and Barcelona Airport is around 20 minutes’ drive away. Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and you can reach Gaudi’s famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera within a 5-minute walk.

Located just 50 metres from Barcelona Sants Train Station, Cosmo Apartments Sants offers air-conditioned apartments with flat-screen TVs, free Wi-Fi and city views. The building has a 24-hour reception with tour desk.

Each stylish Cosmo Apartments Sants apartment has large windows, and some have a balcony. All apartments have a modern kitchenette with a microwave-grill, ceramic hob and dishwasher. Cooking utensils, bed linen and towels are provided.

There are numerous bars and restaurants in the streets around the Cosmo Apartments Sants building.

The Fira Conference Centre is within a 15-minute walk, while FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium is a 20-minute walk away. Plaça de Sants Metro Station is 200 metres away and offers direct access to the historic city centre.

Centrally located in Barcelona’s Raval District, just 300 metres from Universitat Metro Station, Ola Living MACBA offers modern accommodation with free WiFi and a balcony. Plaza Catalunya is 8 minutes’ walk away.

These apartments feature exposed brick walls and some come with vaulted ceilings or exposed wooden beams. They come with a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, oven and coffee machine. Their living areas include a flat-screen TV with cable channels, DVD player and sofa.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Sant Antoni is a 5-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 2.5 km from the property. Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ metro ride from Ola Living MACBA and Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

Habitat Apartments Blanca offers bright, modern apartments situated a 10-minute walk from Parc de la Torrassa in Barcelona. The property features free WiFi and views of the city.

Each apartment here is air-conditioned and includes a full kitchen with an oven, kettle, microwave and dishwasher. They also boast a spacious seating area with a sofa and flat-screen TV.

Restaurants and bars are available within a 5-minute walk of the property. The popular Sants Estacio stadium is just 2 km away.

Bareclona’s “Ciutat Vella” historic centre can be reached in 15 minutes by car, while El Prat-Barcelona Airport is 10 km from Habitat Apartments Blanca.

The chic H10 Casanova Hotel is centrally located on Barcelona’s Gran Via, a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and the Rambla. There is a garden spa with whirlpool and steam room.

Featuring contemporary boutique-style décor, the H10 Casanova offers air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. There is a minibar and safe, and the modern private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. Room service is also available.

The on-site Despacio Spa Centre has a Vichy shower, a  steam bath and hot tub; massages as well as facial and body treatments are available on prior request according to the price list.

The hotel has an à la carte restaurant and a trendy café-bar. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk.

Urgell and Universitat Metro Stations are 300 metres away. You can walk to Paseo de Gracia’s designer shops in 10 minutes.

Hotels: Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton
Full_Descriptions:
Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is allergy-free and is located 500 metres from Sants Railway Station.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton every room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.5 km from Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton, while La Pedrera is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

This small hotel occupies the first floor of a modernist building, just 50 metres from central Barcelona’s famous shopping street, Passeig de Gràcia. It offers elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Air-conditioned rooms at Circa 1905 include a blend of classic and modern features. There is a balcony and private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a breakfast of local produce. Free tea and coffee are offered 24 hours a day.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is just 100 metres away, while you can walk to Casa Batlló in under 5 minutes.

Set 500 metres from Plaza España, No 439 - The Streets Apartments Barcelona features accommodation with modern design and free WiFi. All apartments are located within a 10-minute walk of Fira of Barcelona.

Each air-conditioned apartment is fitted with wooden flooring and provides a pleasant seating area with sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. It features a well-equipped kitchen including a dishwasher, microwave and coffee machine. The bathroom comes with shower and hairdryer.

The property is surrounded by a wide range of bars, shops and restaurant with traditional Spanish dishes.  Las Arenas Shopping Centre is also a 5-minute walk from the complex.

Rocafort Metro Station is just outside the door. There is also a bus stop just in front of the property which let you reach Plaza Cataluña and Las Ramblas within 5 minutes.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Hotels: DO Plaça Reial powered by Sonder
Full_Descriptions:
Set on Plaza Reial and just off Las Ramblas, DO Plaça Reial powered by Sonder features a spa, a rooftop pool and stylish rooms. Bars and cafés can be found in the square and in the surrounding Gothic Quarter.

Each spacious, air-conditioned room offers a free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a free minibar.

In the mornings, the DO Plaça Reial offers a paid breakfast. Creative Mediterranean cuisine and tapas dishes are also served in the restaurant.

The hotel spa features a sauna.

The famous Boquería Market is just 5-minute walk away. Barcelona Cathedral, Liceu Metro and Plaza Catalunya are within 1 km of the hotel.

Offering free Wi-Fi, these air-conditioned apartments are located in Sant Andreu District, only 2 minutes’ walk from Navas metro station and 10 minutes by public transport from Barcelona's historic town.

Apartamentos Navas features 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. Each has a balcony and offers modern-style furniture, a comfortable lounge with sofa bed and flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom with hairdryer.

Navas and Sant Andreu District are well connected to Barcelona city centre by both metro and bus. Numerous shops, supermarkets as well as bars and restaurants can also be found nearby.

Clot-Aragó Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk from the apartments.

Hotel del Mar is set in a listed building just 800 metres from the seafront and Barceloneta Metro Station. It is a 5-minute walk from the trendy Born neighbourhood and Ciutadella Park.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel del Mar have flat-screen satellite TV. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities, and some rooms have a private balcony. A safe is also available with a surcharge.

Hotel del Mar has a 24-hour front desk. Barcelona’s França Train Station is a 5-minute walk away, and you can walk to Barcelona Cathedral and Maremagnum Shopping Centre in 10 minutes. Parking is available 5 minutes' walk from the property.

Urbany Hostel Barcelona is on Barcelona’s Meridiana Avenue, 300 metres from Clot Metro Station. This large, funky hostel has spacious common areas where you can relax and meet people from abroad. There are free Wi-Fi throughout and rooftop terrace with city views and bar service.

Each modern dormitory or room features lockers, an en-suite bathroom and air conditioning.

The Urbany Barcelona serves a daily continental buffet breakfast. It has a kitchen with cookers, fridges and microwaves. There is a café-bar and vending machines, and you can request a packed lunch.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Free city maps and tour information are available.

Urbany Hostel is 5 minutes’ walk from Glories Shopping Centre, and Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia is a 15-minute walk away. You can reach the city centre in 15 minutes by Metro or bus, and the beach is 2 km away.

Barnapartments Raval features accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Cathedral of Barcelona, Plaça Reial, and Passeig de Gracia. The apartment has family rooms.

Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A fridge and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. All units have a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Barnapartments Raval.

Hotel Moderno has a central location, on a side street just 20 metres from Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi access throughout.

All rooms at the Moderno are heated, air conditioned and soundproofed. There is also cable TV, a fridge and a private bathroom with toiletries.

The hotel is just a short walk from the Boquería Market on La Rambla. Plaza de Catalunya and the city’s cathedral are just a few minutes’ walk away.

The hotel’s City Tour offer is ideal for exploring the city. There is also a ticket service. The 3 computers in the lobby can be used for free.

The Moderno has a 24-hour front desk and offers express check-in and check-out.

Aspasios Urquinaona Design is in a quiet area of Barcelona’s Eixample district, only 5 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya and Arc de Triomf. Each bright apartment has free Wi-Fi.

The Urquinaona Design Apartments have elegant, modern design. They are air-conditioned and bright, with an open-plan living area with flat-screen TV and kitchen.

The kitchen includes an oven, a Nespresso coffee maker and a juicer. There is also a dishwasher, a washing machine and a tumble dryer.

All apartments have access to the furnished roof terrace.

The apartments are just a short walk from the historic city centre. Ciutadella Park, the Cathedral and the Picasso Museum are all nearby. Urquinaona Metro Station is only 300 metres away.

Descriptions: 4 beds (2 singles, 1 bunk bed, 1 sofa bed)
Full_Descriptions:
Located less than 5 minutes´ walk from Bogatell Metro Station, these air-conditioned apartments feature modern decor. Free WiFi is available and you can enjoy city views.

The living rooms come with an L-shaped sofa and a flat-screen TV. Complete with an oven, the full kitchens include a microwave, kettle and dining table.

The Lonely Chimney Apartments have 2 bedrooms with plenty of natural light, as well as a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer.

Ciutadella Park is a 5 minute-walk, and you will find a selection of bars and nightlife within 10 minutes´ walk. You can get to Olympic Port and La Barceloneta Beach in 15 minutes on foot. Barcelona-El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Featuring free WiFi, Blue Barcelona is located in the Gracia district of Barcelona. Set next to Gracia FGC Station, this bed and breakfast offers a shared lounge and tour desk.

Each air-conditioned room at the property has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, desk, and hardwood floors. Some rooms have a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries, and others have access to shared bathroom facilities.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and shops within a 5-minute walk of Blue Barcelona. There are vending machines available.

Fontana Metro Station is 300 metres from the property, Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas Boulevard are 2 metro stops away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 2.3 km from the property.

Frequently hosting world-famous celebrities, this prestigious hotel is located on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. Le Méridien’s stylish rooms feature flat-screen TVs, a music system and iPod dock.

The iconic building housing Le Méridien Barcelona features a Neoclassical style façade and chic, boutique design throughout with bright colours. Some rooms have carpets featuring a Barcelona street map design, while others have Gaudí-inspired finishings.

The Méridien serves a varied, international breakfast. The CentOnze restaurant provides creative Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails, prepared with fresh ingredients from the nearby Boquería Market, as well as music and impressive views of Las Ramblas.

The on-site spa offers a wide selection of aromatherapy, massage and holistic treatments.

All guests can enjoy free entry to the nearby Palau Güell.

Situated 350 metres from Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, The Mirror Barcelona - Adults Only is an eco-friendly hotel with a small outdoor pool, sauna and terrace. Provença Train Station is 200 metres away.

The Mirror Hotel Barcelona’s air-conditioned rooms feature elegant white décor and various mirrors. They offer free WiFi, and LCD TVs in the bedroom and bathroom. Bathrooms also include a bathrobes and slippers.

The Mirror Hotel Barcelona offers a spacious reception area with a lobby bar.

You will find shopping areas nearby.

Diagonal Metro Station is within 400 metres of The Mirror Barcelona - Adults Only. Gaudi’s Casa Milà and the popular Gràcia district can be reached in an 8-minute walk.

Situated in the Ciutat Vella district in Barcelona, Casa Lirio offers 2-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is set 1 km from Picasso Museum, less than 1 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and a 4-minute walk from Plaça Reial. The property is 1.8 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 1 km of the city centre.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at Casa Lirio have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms have a terrace. At the accommodation rooms include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Casa Lirio include Sant Sebastian Beach, Barceloneta Beach and Santa Maria del Mar. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 12 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

ZooRooms Guesthouse offers an ideal location in the centre of Barcelona and 10 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló. It includes free WiFi, shared furnished terrace, and a communal kitchen.

Each room at ZooRooms Guesthouse features unique décor designed by international artists, high ceilings, and air conditioning. Some rooms come with a French balcony. All rooms have a private bathroom; towels and bed linen are included.

Guests can relax in the ZooRoom’s lounge, which features a mural by international artist Sara Maia, local artwork, stylish furniture,and a small library.

The guest house is within 5 minutes’ walk of a range of shops, bars and cafés. Restaurants can be found along Passeig de Gràcia and in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, a 15-minute walk away.

ZooRooms is less than 800 metres from Gaudí’s La Pedrera and a 15-minute walk from the charming Gràcia district. Plaza de Catalunya Railway Station and Las Ramblas are approximately 800 metres away.

Hotels: The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky
Full_Descriptions:
The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky is located in Barcelona’s Poblenou district. This stylish hotel offers a range of luxury services, including 1 on-site restaurant and free spa access.

The Serena SPA Wellness includes a sauna, Turkish baths, bithermal shower and a heated pool with whirlpool. Guests also have access to a discount on massages.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms at The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky feature free WiFi, a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a coffee maker and a minibar. Each one has a private bathroom with a rain-effect shower, bathrobe and slippers.

There is a restaurant serving Mediterranean dishes, and guests have the option of a buffet breakfast with views over Barcelona. The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky has a poolside bar.

On the 24th floor of the hotel The Level at Meliá Barcelona Sky you can enjoy a cocktail or premium drinks at the Skyline 24 which offers views over the city.

The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky offers a personalised reception with flexible check-out times, as well as helping to arrange tickets for trips, shows and car hire.

Poblenou Metro Station is 450 metres from the hotel, and you can walk to the seafront in around 15 minutes. Torre Agbar Tower is 1 km away.

Blend in, right in the
heart of Barcelona
Direct access to Barcelona’s life and culture.

Known for its eclectic and authentic vibe, the Raval neighborhood is an exciting mix of history, culture, and diversity.

The Boquería market, the Gothic quarter, MACBA, and the famous Ramblas are just steps away from your room. Have fun exploring the city's cultural and gastronomic scene with the area's historic and contemporary restaurants, the best museums, and unusual routes through the streets of the neighborhood.
TOC Hotel Las Ramblas. Your center of operations.

We are a Mediterranean hotel where you can enjoy an authentic stay in Barcelona. All our spaces are designed to accommodate you, with organic materials like wood, terracotta, and natural fibers. The decor reflects the city’s rich culture, with local books, art, and craft pieces.

You can work or read in the reception library, have a coffee in our breakfast space, or go up to the rooftop (coming soon) to enjoy the city sky.

Offering free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Boutique Hostemplo is located on a pedestrian street just 100 metres from Barcelona's Sagrada Familia. The hotel has a friendly and very peaceful atmosphere.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a kettle in the room. Every room comes with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find a hairdryer and toiletries.

The surroundings are full of bars, restaurants and shops, like the F.C. Barcelona Museum. Las Glorias Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away. Gaudí’s Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 10 minutes' walk away. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located 2 minutes' walk away, connects you with the city centre in 7 minutes, offering easy access to Plaza Catalunya, the Ramblas and the beach.

You can buy discounted tickets for the tourist bus, which stops 100 metres from the hotel.

The buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local products and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily in our café from 08:00 to 10:30.

Situated in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 600 metres from Diagonal Metro Station, Tendency Apartments 7 offers accommodation with air conditioning, heating, and free WiFi.

The apartments include a living area with a flat-screen TV and sofa. Each has a kitchen, complete with an oven, dishwasher, and washing machine.

Some apartments feature a private balcony or a furnished terrace. Each apartment has a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, and towels and bed linen are provided.

Given its central location, the property is within walking distance of a number of shops and restaurants, as well as many of Barcelona’s sights. You can reach both Sagrada Familia and Plaza Cataluña Square within 20 minutes on foot. Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, with Gaudi’s building and designer boutiques, is 500 metres away.

A 10-minute walk from La Pedrera, Sonder l La Casa del Sol is situated in Barcelona and features rooms with free WiFi. Well set in the Gràcia district, this hotel offers rooms with balcony.

The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with free-to-air channels. All rooms have a private bathroom.

Sonder l La Casa del Sol offers a beautiful sun terrace.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Catalan.

Casa Batllo is 1.3 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Sonder l La Casa del Sol.

Situated in the centre of Barcelona, Hostal Oliva features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. This sustainable guest house is located 200 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 100 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The guest house has family rooms.
