At the guest house, every unit is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units at the guest house have air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Sightseeing tours are available around the property.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Casa Batllo, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Hostal Oliva.

Set in a renovated modernist building, Close to Passeig de Gracia B&B is located in Barcelona. This bed and breakfast is located 150 metres from Girona Metro Station and offers free WiFi.

Fitted with tiled flooring and featuring high ceilings and large windows, this accommodation offers air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a dining table.

Each room has 1 double bed and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer, and shower.

Passeig de Gracia, famous for its luxury shops, is just 500 metres from Close to Passeig de Gracia B&B, and there are several shops and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the property.

Gaudi's famous La Pedrera is 1 km from the property. Plaza Catalunya is 10 minutes away on foot.

Conveniently located in the centre of Barcelona, ME Barcelona offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation features nightclub and a tour desk.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. ME Barcelona provides some units with city views, and each room comes with a coffee machine. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near ME Barcelona include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Set in Barcelona’s stylish Eixample district, Barcelo Hostel offers air-conditioned dormitory rooms with free Wi-Fi. Located 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia, the hostel features a terrace, 24-hour reception and shared kitchens.

Each bright dormitory has bunk beds and lockers. There is access to shared bathrooms with showers and hairdryers. Bicycles are not allowed

Barcelo Hostel offers 2 shared kitchens, including a microwave, fridge and kitchenware. There are also 2 air-conditioned lounge areas with sofas and a TV. You can find a variety of shops, restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk of the hostel.

Diagonal Metro Station is 500 metres from Barcelo Hostel and Plaza Catalunya is 2 stops away, on Line 3. Staff at the hostel can give you tourist information about the area.

Located in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, Aspasios Poble Nou Apartments provides accommodation with a rooftop pool, free WiFi, a lift and a tour desk. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.4 km from Bogatell Beach. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Nova Icaria Beach is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Mar Bella Beach is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Aspasios Poble Nou Apartments.

BBarcelona Còrsega Flats offers 3 elegant, minimalist apartments within 10 minutes´ walking distance to the central Boulevards, Rambla de Cataluña and Paseo de Gracia. Free WiFi and air conditioning are available.

All apartments come with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and coffee machine. 2 of the apartments offer a small balcony with city views, and another features a furnished terrace.

Many restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surrounding streets. The nearest supermarket is less than 100 metres from the apartment.

You can reach Sagrada Familia in a 15-minute metro ride. Sants Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away and trains to Barcelona Airport leave from there.

Happy People Ramblas Harbour Apartments is just 5 minutes’ walk from Parallel Metro Station. It offers stylish air-conditioned apartments in the Poble Sec neighbourhood, close to cafés, bars and restaurants.

Each bright, spacious, open-plan apartment at Happy People Ramblas Harbour has high ceilings with exposed wooden beams, tiled floors and stylish décor. The living area has a sofa and a kitchen area with microwave and fridge. Free Wi-Fi is included.

On the last floor of the buiding there is a rooftop with the views to the city and where you can also enjoy  the swimming pool.

You can walk to Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter in just 15 minutes.

Barcelona’s port and cruise terminal are within 15 minutes’ walk of the apartments. Buses to Barceloneta’s beaches stop nearby.

Featuring free Wi-Fi, Apart Easy Gracia is located in Barcelona’s Gracia District, within 400 metres of Passeig de Gracia and Gaudí’s La Pedrera building. The property offers modern apartments with air conditioning.

Each apartment features wooden floors and has a living room with a sofa and TV. An oven, microwave and washing machine are included in the kitchenette. The bathroom comes with a shower.

Some apartments offer a private terrace with city views. A large variety of supermarkets, bars and restaurants can be found within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments.

Plaça Catalunya and the famous Sagrada Familia can be reached in 20 minutes on foot. Diagonal Metro Station, with connection to the historic centre, is 400 metres away.

Hotels: ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento
Full_Descriptions:
Located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Park Güell, ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a garden.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento every room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a hammam.

La Pedrera is 3.3 km from ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento, while Casa Batllo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

These studio apartments are located next to the Picasso Museum, Santa Caterina Market and in the heart of the bohemian Born and Gothic Quarter. They offer free Wi-Fi.

Apartments in Barcelona Corders are housed in a refurbished building, with a private lift to each apartment. Each stylish studio is decorated in light colours, using traditional materials such as stone and wood. Each studio has a small kitchen corner with a fridge and a hob or microwave.

The local district of the Born has a wealth of bars, restaurants and nightlife from which to choose. From the Corders apartments you can also walk to Las Ramblas, Barcelona Port and Barcelona Beach.

These brand new apartments are located in the classy Eixample district of central Barcelona, surrounded by shops, restaurants and bars.

Ideal for families and groups of friends visiting this cultural mecca, the Suites Aragó 565 are connected to all of the city’s main sights by the convenient metro network. The awe-inspiring Sagrada Familia Gothic cathedral stands just 1.5 km from the property.

Each exterior apartment is air conditioned and soundproofed. Some also come with terraces.

Hotels: NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderon
Full_Descriptions:
The elegant NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderón has an excellent location just off Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in central Barcelona. It has fitness centre and a year-round free rooftop pool with spectacular city views.

The air-conditioned rooms at the NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderón feature free WiFi, a Nespresso machine and a private bathroom with a rain-effect shower and professional hairdryer.

Room service is also available 24 hours and the Eleven Bar serves cocktails and light snacks.

The breakfast buffet has a variety of high antioxidant dishes and a fresh juice corner. Breakfast can also be requested in your room, and a light early breakfast is available.

Staff in the Guest Relations department can help you throughout your stay and advise you on what to see and do in Barcelona.

The hotel is just one block away from Gaudí’s famous Casa Batlló. You can walk to the city’s Gothic Quarter in about 10 minutes.

The Barcelona EDITION has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Barcelona. Featuring a terrace, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. At The Barcelona EDITION all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

A la carte breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

You can play billiards at The Barcelona EDITION.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Barceloneta, Somorrostro and Sant Miquel Beach. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from The Barcelona EDITION.

Descriptions: 4 beds (1 single, 1 double, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Featuring free Wi-Fi, RAMBLA BEACH Barcelonastuff Apartments are located in different locations around Barcelona’s Poblenou district, within a 5-minute walk of the beach. The spacious apartments offer stylish décor and some apartments have the air-conditioning coming from the living room

Each bright apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. The well-equipped kitchen includes an oven and washing machine. Each apartment has 2 bathrooms and most apartments also offer a private balcony.

You can find a wide range of restaurants and tapas bars in the neighbouring streets, including on the popular Rambla de Poblenou Avenue.

RAMBLA BEACH Barcelonastuff Apartments offers an airport shuttle service on request and for an extra cost. Staff can also arrange bicycle rental and babysitting services, as well as tickets to FC Barcelona games.

Poblenou Metro Station is 450 metres from the apartments, connecting you with Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in under 15 minutes.

Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla is only 200 metres from Gaudi’s famous La Pedrera. This guest house offers rooms with free WiFi.

Rooms at the Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla have typical tiled floors and high ceilings. All rooms have heating, TV, and private bathroom. Some have a balcony with city views.

Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla is set on Rambla Catalunya, a tree-lined avenue full of shops, cafés and tapas bars.

Passeig de Gracia is 100 metres away, and Diagonal Metro Station is within 50 metres. Las Ramblas, Sagrada Familia and Camp Nou Stadium are all just a few stops away by Metro.

One of Barcelona’s tallest buildings, this design hotel offers spectacular views over the city and sea. Melia Barcelona Sky features an outdoor swimming pool. Treatments are available at the Serena SPA Wellness and free access is offered to the gym.

Each spacious room at Melia Barcelona Sky includes a 32-inch plasma-screen TV and offers city views. The stylish bathrooms come with a rain shower.

You can enjoy a cocktail on the 24th floor, at the Skyline 24 Panoramic Terrace, which offers views over the city.

El Merkado Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine, and you can enjoy a cocktail on its terrace. WiFi is free in all areas.

Located in the lively area of Poblenou, Melia Barcelona Sky is just 200 metres from Poble Nou Metro Station. The Forum and the International Convention Centre are within a 15-minute walk. The Mar Bella beach is only 10 minutes' walk of the hotel.

These apartments can be found in Barcelona's Born area, close to the Picasso Museum. They have free Wi-Fi.

The apartments have heating and air conditioning.

Bedrooms have an en-suite bathroom with a shower. The kitchen has a fridge, microwave and hob. There's a terrace.

Bicycle rental is available.

Staff at reception can organise your trip to Barcelona. Barceloneta with its seafront bars and restaurants is just a 10-minute away from the property. The Ramblas is also nearby.

ApartEasy - Central Gracia Apartments features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 500 metres from La Pedrera, less than 1 km from Casa Batllo and a 16-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

All units include a seating area, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near ApartEasy - Central Gracia Apartments include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Descriptions: 3 beds (1 double, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)

Full_Descriptions:
Renaissance Barcelona Hotel is located in the heart of the city, steps away from Passeig de Gràcia, main shopping boulevard, countless bars and restaurants, landmarks and cultural attractions.

The stylish rooms at the Renaissance Barcelona Hotel have been imaginatively designed to offer a standalone destination, perfect for kicking back and recharging after a day exploring Barcelona.

Guest rooms feature a unique stylish Gaudí-inspired décor, parquet floors, luxury bed linens and marbled bathrooms with exclusive toiletries.

The hotel’s stylish Rumbo Bar & Eatery offers Mediterranean dishes using local products. The bar serves signature cocktails, wines and local craft beer. The rooftop, Goja Rooftop is the go-to place to seize the moment, socialize, enjoy delicious Mediterranean food, inventive cocktails and great conversation.

Staff at reception can help you to book tickets for show and guided tours, as well as providing information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are both within a 10-minute walk of the Renaissance Barcelona Hotel

Hotels: Youth Hostel - Central and Basic Universitat
Full_Descriptions:
Set in the lively Ciutat Vella District, next to the MACBA Museum, it is 5 minutes’ walk from Plaça Universitat Square.

Decorated with bright colours, all the rooms come with single beds which can be joined together and some have a private bathroom with shower. Free toiletries are also provided.

Central & Basic Universitat is surrounded by a wide range of shops and supermarkets. You can find some of the trendiest restaurants and bars of the city in a 5-minute walk.

The Ramblas and Boquería Market are 800 metres away and you can walk to Plaça Catalunya Square in about 10 minutes’ walk. El Prat Barcelona Airport is 30 minutes by public transport. Regular buses leave from a bus stop located just 800 metres away.

Set within a 10-minute walk of La Pedrera in Barcelona, No 23 - The Streets Apartments Barcelona offers apartments in a same building with free WiFi.

Every unit has a well-equipped kitchen or kitchenette completed with an oven; while the bathroom has a shower. There is a washing machine, and bed linen and towels are provided.

Fresh produces can be found at the market located 700 metres away; and trendy bars, restaurants and shops are on the many surrounding public squares.

A 10-minute metro ride will take you to Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas.

Room018BCN is located 450 metres from FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium. This modern hostel offers rooms with free WiFi and individual lockers.

The air-conditioned dormitory rooms feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each bed has an LED reading light. Bed linen is provided, and towels can be rented on site. Some rooms have a private bathroom.

The reception is open 24 hours.

Staff at reception can arrange tickets for FC Barcelona matches, as well as other events or public transport tickets. There is a shared kitchen where you can prepare meals and there are vending machines on site.

Room018BCN is located next to Les Corts Metro Station, taking you to Drassanes at the bottom of the Rambla in around 15 minutes. You can walk to L'Illa Shopping Centre in around 10 minutes.

Hostal Alogar is located 5 minutes’ walk from the Corte Inglés Shopping Centre in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi district. It offers comfortable, good-value rooms and a car rental service.

Guests at the Alogar can make use of the communal kitchen with a hob, microwave and TV. Each room is allocated a different cupboard. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and rooms.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

Muntaner Metro Station is 5 minutes’ walk away and from here you can get to Plaza Catalunya in 10 minutes. There are also several bus stops within a 5-minute walk.

Descriptions: 4 beds (2 singles, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Apartaments-Hotel Hispanos 7 Suiza is set in Barcelona. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

The spacious aparthotel has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. The unit has soundproofing and a bath. The aparthotel offers bed linen, towels and daily maid service.

A minimarket is available at the aparthotel.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property. A car rental service is available at the aparthotel.

Popular points of interest near Apartaments-Hotel Hispanos 7 Suiza include Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Paraiso Hostel is in central Barcelona, 100 metres from Sant Antoni Metro Station. Rooms have free WiFi, and some have private bathrooms, a plasma TV and balcony.

Paraiso Hostel is located in the lively neighborhood of Ciutat Vella. Guests will find a variety of shops, museums and places to eat and drink.

Paraiso’s large common room includes satellite TV, including many international channels. There is also a DVD player and internet corner. Paraiso also has a large roof terrace with tables.

Parallel Metro Station is 250 metros from the property and a 10-minute walk will take you to Barcelona Museum of Contemporary Art.

This chic boutique hotel blends a carefully preserved, 18th-century setting with the most modern and impressive interior design. It lies in the fashionable La Ribera district of central Barcelona.

The Mercer House Bòria BCN is set in amongst the narrow, atmospheric streets just to the north of the famous El Born district. Its original 18th-century façade has been well-preserved and adds to the hotel’s unique charm. Inside, each suite and room has a clean, contemporary style complemented by works of modern art by young local artists.

To get an idea of the Boria’s great location, head to its own rooftop sun terrace, where you can look out over the city’s Gothic cathedral, the beautiful nearby church of Santa María del Mar and the Old Port beyond.

Ola Living Born offers accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. It is set 1.4 km from Somorrostro Beach and features a lift. The property is close to popular attractions like Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Reial and Picasso Museum.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a terrace. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Sant Miquel Beach and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Ola Living Born.

Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom. The property is 10 minutes’ walk from both La Pedrera and fashionable Passeig the Gracia.

Featuring an elegant décor, rooms at Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique have a flat-screen TV, free safe and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony with street views.

A breakfast is served every morning at Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique. Several restaurant, traditional tapas bars and shops can be found in the surrounding area. Some of the trendiest bars are in Gracia District, 500 metres away.

Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique is in the Eixample District of Barcelona. You can walk to Gaudi’s Casa Batlló in 15 minutes. The closest metro station is Diagonal Metro Station, just 400 metres away. Trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from a train station located 1 km away.

Centrally located, Ola Living Portaferrissa offers air-conditioned apartments and studios with free Wi-Fi and free safe. Accommodations are 100 metres from Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya is 5 minutes’ walk away.

Featuring modern and functional furniture each accommodation comes with a flat-screen cable TV and a fully equipped kitchenette including a coffee machine, microwave and oven. A washing machine, clothes dryer and iron facilities are also provided.

Ola Living Portaferrissa is surrounded by a wide range of bars, restaurant and traditional Spanish Granjas for a snack or a light meal. You can find fresh produce in La Boquería Market, 200 metres away.

You can walk to the Cathedral in 5 minutes from Ola Living Portaferrissa. Lively Plaza Reial is 400 metres away and Barcelona Museum of Contemporary Art is 7 minutes’ walk from accommodations. The closest metro station is Liceu, just 300 metres away.

Overlooking Barceloneta Beach and Barcelona city centre, this design hotel has 2 outdoor pools and luxury spa with city views. Hotel Arts offers art collection and a restaurant with 2 Michelin stars.

The Arts is situated next to Barcelona’s Olympic Port and surrounded by shops and lively bars. Barceloneta Beach is 250 metres away, while Ciutadella Park is 300 metres away.

The Arts Hotel’s rooms include a flat-screen TV and sound system. The bathrooms have a separate bath and a shower.

The hotel’s Enoteca restaurant, awarded 2 Michelin stars, serves fine Mediterranean cuisine. The property includes a number of other bars and restaurants, including a pool-side bar serving light meals in the summer.

Hotel Arts has a hair salon and various luxury fashion boutiques. The hotel also offers a multilingual concierge team and a fully equipped business centre.

Descriptions: 4 beds (2 singles, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Offering different apartments in Barcelona’s modern district of Diagonal Mar, Rent Top Apartments is within 10 minutes' walk from the beach. It offers stylish apartments with private terraces with city, garden or beach views.

Rent Top Apartments is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and from the Forum Building. There is a Tourist Bus stop and a taxi rank just in front of the property, which is also accessible by metro.

Each spacious and bright air-conditioned apartment features modern décor in light colours, and has free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour security service. All come with a lounge with flat-screen TV and DVD player, a well-equipped kitchen and private bathrooms. Some apartments have access to a shared seasonal swimming pool.

Featuring city and sea views, apartments at Rent Top include bed linen, towels, heating and a washing machine.

Elegant, air-conditioned apartments at BCN Apartments 41 come with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. They are located 500 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia.

The bright, spacious apartments each include a lounge area with sofas. Their kitchenettes are equipped with an oven, microwave and dishwasher.

Many bars, restaurants and shops can be found in the surrounding streets of the Eixample District. The fashionable Born area is just 10 minutes’ walk away.

Staff can provide tourist information, and the Arc de Triomf, Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Cathedral can all be reached in a 10-minute walk. Port Vell is 20 minutes away by foot.

Urquinaona Metro Station is 350 metres from the apartments and connects with the beach. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya. Private parking in the same building is available for an extra cost.

Conveniently located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Ola Living Calabria is situated 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.4 km from Boqueria Market. It is set less than 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and offers a lift. Tivoli Theatre is 2.9 km away and Palau Sant Jordi is 3.2 km from the apartment.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a toaster. The units have a coffee machine, a TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms also offer a terrace. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Cathedral of Barcelona and Montjuïc. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Ola Living Calabria.

With quiet street views, Boat Hotel Barcelona is situated in Barcelona and has a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, bar and garden. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The boat has family rooms.

The boat provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Kitchenware is also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the boat, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Popular points of interest near the boat include Forum Beach, Platja del Litoral and Llevant. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 19 km from Boat Hotel Barcelona.

Hotel Inglés is located right next to the Ramblas and Boquería market, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaça Catalunya. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

Air-conditioned rooms at the Inglés are simple and comfortable. They come with a private bathroom and some rooms have a private balcony.

A breakfast is served every morning in a restaurant located next to the hotel.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. You can also hire a car and store your luggage at the front desk.

The Palau de la Música Catalana, a Modernist auditorium, is 10 minutes’ walk from the Hotel Inglés. The characterful streets of the Gothic Quarter are on the doorstep, and you can walk to the trendy Born area in around 5 minutes.

Descriptions: 3 beds (1 single, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Located 10 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro Station, Deco- Diagonal Apartmens are set on Diagonal Avenue. These stylish loft apartments are housed in a striking Art Deco building offering impressive city views.

The Deco- Diagonal Apartmens are just 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia, the iconic boulevard which is home to Gaudí's famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Also 5 minutes away is Rambla de Catalunya, where there is a selection of cafés, bars and restaurants. There are also supermarkets within 350 metres of the apartments.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 20 minutes on foot.

Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region, 400 metres from Portal de l'Angel, Yurbban Passage Hotel boasts an outdoor pool and spa centre. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Each room includes a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes and slippers. Yurbban Passage Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property.

Guests can enjoy an authentic Catalan breakfast each morning.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

The hotel also offers bike hire. Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from Yurbban Passage Hotel, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 500 metres from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Smartr Barcelona Ramblas offers accommodation in Barcelona. Plaza Reial is 100 metres from the property.

There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, equipped with a refrigerator.

La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 600 metres from Smartr Barcelona Ramblas, while Portal de l'Angel is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Smartr Barcelona Ramblas.

Ola Living Aribau Apartments is situated in the Sarrià-St. Gervasi district of Barcelona, 1.5 km from Casa Batllo, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. It is set 1.1 km from La Pedrera and offers a lift. Plaça Catalunya is 2.5 km away and Sants Railway Station is 2.8 km from the apartment.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, microwave, toaster and a fridge. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms here will provide you with a balcony. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Tivoli Theatre is 3 km from the apartment, while Portal de l'Angel is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Ola Living Aribau Apartments.

Descriptions: 4 beds (1 single, 1 double, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Located on a quiet pedestrian street in Barcelona, these modern apartments are just 8 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s iconic Sagrada Família. They feature free Wi-Fi and a private balcony.

The Sagrada Família Apartments feature parquet floors and elegant décor and have air-conditioning coming from the living room.  They have a lounge with a sofa bed, flat-screen TV and a DVD player. The balcony has a table and chairs.

The well-equipped kitchen comes with utensils, an oven, coffee maker, dishwasher and washing machine. There is a hairdryer in the bathroom. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The apartments are just 200 metres from the beautiful Hospital Sant Pau, an impressive Modernist building. Located 300 metres away, Hospital Sant Pau Metro Station connects you with the city centre in 3 stops.

Next to the modernistic Palau de la Música Catalana, Ola Living Music offers air-conditioned apartments with free safe and free Wi-Fi. Apartments are 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas.

Featuring vaulted ceiling and traditional Catalan tiles, these apartments come with modern and functional furniture. They all have a fully equipped kitchenette including a microwave, and a washing machine, clothes dryer and iron facilities are also provided.

You can find some of the trendiest bars around beautiful Sant Pere Square and have fresh produce at Santa Caterina Market, just 350 metres away. There is also a plenty of shops and supermarkets open till late in the surrounding area.

Located in the Borne District of Barcelona, Ola Living Music is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral. The closest metro station is Urquinaona, just 300 metres away.

Situated in Barcelona, 120 metres from Hostafrancs Metro Station, Habitat Apartments ADN offers air conditioning, heating, and free WiFi.

The apartments feature modern décor and include a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV. Each also has a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher, washing machine, and hob.

The apartments have 1 or 2 bedrooms, as well as a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Toiletries, towels, and bed linen are provided.

Arenas Shopping Centre is 600 metres from the property and it includes a big supermarket and a number of rooftop restaurants with panoramic views of the city. Sants Train Station, where you can catch a train to the airport, is a 10-minute walk away.

Situated in central Barcelona, a 2-minute walk from Girona Metro Station, Tendency Apartments 6 offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and heating. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is a 17-minute walk away.

All apartments have a living area with a flat-screen TV, DVD player, and dining table. The private kitchen is equipped with a hob, microwave, and fridge. Kitchenware is provided in all apartments and some of them have a washing machine and dishwasher.

The apartments include modern furnishings and many of them have a small balcony with views of the city. Each apartment has a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower, and towels and bed linen are provided. A cot is available upon request.

There are bars and restaurant within a 10-minute walk of the apartments, and a 24-hour grocery shop is just around the corner. Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, famous for its high-end boutiques and Gaudì’s buildings, can be reached in 7 minutes on foot.

Located in Barcelona and with Mar Bella Beach reachable within 700 metres, Jacobs Inn Barcelona provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is situated 700 metres from Bogatell Beach, less than 1 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach and 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests.

Guest rooms include bed linen.

Speaking Catalan, Czech, Greek and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Barceloneta Beach is 2.8 km from the hostel, while Port Olimpic is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Jacobs Inn Barcelona.

Descriptions: 4 beds (2 singles, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Featuring free WiFi,  Radas is set in Barcelona, 500 metres from Montjuïc. Palau Sant Jordi is 1.3 km away and Fira Barcelona is a 13-minute walk away.

The apartment features a seating-dining area with a satellite flat-screen TV, CD and DVD player. All units include a kitchen fitted with a dishwasher, electric kettle, ceramic hob and oven. A microwave, a toaster and refrigerator are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. Some apartments have a terrace, balcony or chill out area.

Radas offers two-bedroom and one-bedroom apartments. They are equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided. Each apartment has a climate control system.

Plaza Reial is 1.5 km from Radas, while Plaça Catalunya is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 11 km from Radas, which you can reach by public transport from a bus stop 500 metres from the property.

Apartments Ramblas108 offers modern apartments situated right on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, in the heart of the city centre. Each air-conditioned apartment has free WiFi and most have a private balcony overlooking Las Ramblas.

The stylish Apartments Ramblas108 apartments have a living area with an LCD TV and a well-equipped kitchen area with a microwave, coffee maker and some have a washing machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Apartments Ramblas108 is set on the edge of the Gothic Quarter, just opposite the vibrant Boqueria Market and Liceu Metro Station. Buses to Barcelona Airport stop in Plaça Catalunya Square, a 3-minute walk away.

Centrally located just 2 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Urquinaona Metro Station, My Address in Barcelona offers large air-conditioned apartments with free WiFi, high ceilings and typical Modernist enclosed balconies.

The apartment comes with 2 bedrooms and a full bathroom. Each one has a spacious lounge-diner and a well-equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and washing machine.

There are lots of shops, bars and restaurants in the immediate area. You will find a supermarket and pharmacy in the same city block as the apartments. The Rambla and Plaza Catalunya’s Airport Bus Stop are within a 10-minute walk.

These modern and elegant apartments are located in the chic Eixample district, within 500 metres of Diagonal Avenue. They offer stylish apartments with air conditioning and free WiFi.

Barcelona 226 Center Exclusive apartments feature stylish décor.  Each has a lounge with plasma satellite TV and sofa and a kitchen with washing machine, dishwasher, microwave, hob and coffee maker. There is also a safe in all apartments. Some of them have a balcony.

There are numerous bars and restaurants within 5 minutes’ walk and there is a large supermarket 30 metres away. The charming Rambla de Catalunya is just 500 metres away.

The apartments are all within 15 minutes’ walk of the exclusive Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, with Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. The Barcelona Center Exclusive apartments are within 10 minutes' walk of either Gracia FGC Train Station or Diagonal Metro Station.

Set 2.7 km from Nova Icaria Beach, LucasLand Apartments Barcelona offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 3 km from Somorrostro Beach and offers a lift. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near LucasLand Apartments Barcelona include Sagrada Familia, Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

Ola Living Santa Anna provides accommodation within 100 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is close to popular attractions like Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Ola Living Santa Anna.

Set in a 19th-century building beside the enchanting Palau de la Música building, these chic and spacious apartments offer fashionable accommodation in the city’s historic heart.

Spend your Barcelona city break in style with a stay at Palau de la Musica Apartments. The interior of each apartment comes with tiled and parquet floors to complement the stylish design.

Prepare your own meals in the apartment’s well-equipped kitchen. Other great amenities feature music equipment, satellite TV and air conditioning for the warmer months.

As soon as you walk out of your apartment you will find yourself in the fashionable, central district of El Born – full of chic bars, restaurants and boutiques. The Gothic Quarter and La Rambla are also just a short walk away.

Featuring air conditioning, AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments offers pet-friendly accommodation in Barcelona. Plaza Reial is 900 metres from the property.

Featuring a balcony, the accommodation comes with a dining area and seating area with a TV. All units include a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher and microwave. A toaster is also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer in each unit. Towels and bed linen are featured.

AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments also some of the apartments include a terrace

Montjuïc is 1.1 km from AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km.

Happy People Sagrada Familia Apartments is a self-catering accommodation located in Barcelona. Free WiFi access is available. The property is 55 metres from Sagrada Familia and 500 metres from Monumental.

The apartment will provide you with air conditioning and free amenities including italian coffee maker. Complete with a microwave, the dining area also has a refrigerator and kitchenware. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer.

At Happy People Sagrada Familia Apartments you will find a terrace.

If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Tetuan (900 metres) and Estacio del Nord (1.1 km). Barcelona El Prat Airport is located 14 km from the property.

Pensión Arosa guest house is centrally located 300 metres from Barcelona Cathedral and Plaza Catalunya. It offers basic rooms with a sink and a fan, and shared bathroom facilities.

All rooms at the Arosa are heated and have a fridge. Some have a private shower and a private balcony. Triple and quadruple rooms are available.

The Pensión Arosa has a tour desk, and you can easily explore Barcelona city centre on foot. The Rambla is a 5-minute walk away, and you can walk to Barceloneta Beach in 20 minutes.

Habitat Apartments Arc de Triomf is set just off Passeig de Sant Joan and within 5 minutes’ walk of Arc de Triomf and its Metro station. These apartments come with free Wi-Fi.

Each apartment has contemporary décor. They have a living room with a flat-screen TV, and kitchen facilities including a microwave, fridge, oven, toaster, hob and a coffee maker.

The apartments are within 15 minutes’ walk of Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Passeig de Gràcia and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló are just over 1 km away.

The charming Born district and Ciutadella Park are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the apartments.

The Barcelona City North Hostal offers value-for-money accommodation and free Wi-Fi. It is in the quiet Sarrià-Sant Gervasi area of Barcelona, with good access by car to the airport.

The rooms at the Barcelona City North are clean, heated and air conditioned. All come with a private bathroom, a TV and a kettle.

Guests at Barcelona City North Hostal have access to a common area with a microwave and fridge.

The hostel is within walking distance of the popular Gràcia neighbourhood and the Modernist buildings of the Eixample.

Nearby Lesseps Metro Station offers easy access to Vallcarca and the Parc Güell. Plaça Catalunya is only 3 stops away.

Habitat Apartments Bailén is a modern apartment located in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Arc de Triomf and 280 metres from Tetuan Square. Free WiFi access is available.

The stylish, bright apartment features a furnished balcony and a living room with sofa bed, flat-screen TV and DVD player. The fully equipped kitchenette includes a dishwasher, while the bathroom has a hairdryer and a shower.

Bed linen and towels are included. There is a double bedroom and a twin bedroom.

Habitat Apartments Bailén is situated in a private building with lift. Transportation to El Prat Airport, located 18 km away, can be provided for an extra cost.

City sights like Barcelona Zoo or Ciutadella Park are within a 15-minute walk away.

Situated in Barcelona, 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach, Lodging Apartments Liceu G2 features accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Cathedral of Barcelona, Plaça Reial, and Passeig de Gracia. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. A TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Lodging Apartments Liceu G2.

Set just 500 metres from Plaza Espanya, Home to Home Barcelona offers modern, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. There is a shared terrace with a chill out zone and views of Montjuic.

Decorated in a minimalistic style, each apartment includes a living-dining area with a sofa bed and flat-screen satellite TV. Their kitchens are equipped with a microwave, electric hob, dishwasher and washer-dryer.

A wide range of shops, restaurants and bars can be found in the area. Arenas Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk from the apartments and offers great views of the city from its rooftop.

Fira de Barcelona Convention Centre can also be reached in 10 minutes’ walk. Espanya Metro Station is 500 metres away and connects with Plaza Catalunya. Airport buses also stop in Plaza Espanya.

Hotels: Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool
Descriptions: 3 beds (1 double, 1 bunk bed, 1 sofa bed)
Full_Descriptions:
Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool offers accommodation in Barcelona. Plaça Catalunya is located just 10 minutes walking from the property.

All units are air-conditioned and have a seating area. There is also a dining area and a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher and oven. A microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool also includes an outdoor pool, and free WiFi is available.

Portal de l'Angel is 1.2 km from Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool, while La Pedrera is 1.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 12 km from Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool.

Located 15 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas and Plaça Espanya, Hostal Barcelona has rooms with air conditioning, TV and free Wi-Fi. Famous for its theatres, Parallel Avenue is 100 metres away.

Hostal Barcelona can provide tourist information, assist with ticket reservations including the Barcelona Tourist Bus, and help arrange car/bike rental. There is an internet terminal in reception. A luggage storage service is available and all rooms have a safe. Reception is available 24 hours.

A continental breakfast buffet is served from 07:30 to 10:30 It offers different kinds of bread, butter, jams, cornflakes, yogurt, cheese, ham, salami, croissants, chocolate croissants, muffins, biscuits, gaufres, Nutella, fruit, juice, coffee, milk and tea. Cold and hot drinks and pastries are available 24 hours a day. Guests also have access to a microwave. There is a supermarket in the same building, restaurants and bars in the surroundings.

Parallel Metro Station and many bus routes are 100 metres from Hostal Barcelona. The Fira Convention Centre is 12 minutes away by public transport. Montjuïc is a 5-minute walk from the guest house, and the Old Harbour can be reached in 20 minutes on foot.

Featuring air conditioning, Habitat Apartments Cool Jazz is set in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Sagrada Familia. Park Güell is 2.1 km away.

The accommodation is fitted with a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchenette, fitted with an oven and microwave. A toaster and refrigerator are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer in each unit. Towels are featured.

La Pedrera is 2.2 km from Habitat Apartments Cool Jazz, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 15 km from the property.

Habitat Apartments Barcelona Balconies is 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s La Pedrera and from fashionable Passeig de Gracia. Diagonal Metro Station is 450 metres away and free WiFi is provided.

Housed in a modernist traditional Modernist building, the apartment comes with modern furnishing and parquet flooring. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, a dishwasher and kitchenware; while the bright living room comes with sofas and a flat-screen TV, and opens onto a balcony with city views.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the apartment.

A 10-minute train ride will take you to central Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas; Provença Train station is just 3 minutes’ walk away.

Set in Barcelona, less than 1 km from La Pedrera and a 16-minute walk from Casa Batllo, Bright & Breezy offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is situated 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, Tivoli Theatre and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Bright & Breezy.

Located within 3 km of La Pedrera and 3.5 km of Casa Batllo in Barcelona, Habitat Apartments Hot Jazz provides accommodation with seating area. It is set 3.9 km from Park Güell and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 1.1 km away.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a microwave, a toaster, and a fridge. At the aparthotel, all units have bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the aparthotel.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.9 km from Habitat Apartments Hot Jazz, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

Registration number AJ000517

Sant Jordi Hostels Sagrada Familia is located just moments from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia Church. It offers dorm rooms, private rooms and apartment-style accommodation. Free WiFi access in available most areas.

Featuring skateboard-themed décor and an indoor mini-ramp, the hostel offers a shared guest kitchen and lounge, as well as a stylish lobby with computer facilities.

All dormitory rooms and triple rooms are located in the hostel area, and have heating, air-conditioning and individual lockers and shelves with a reading light and plug.

All private double and single rooms are located upstairs from the hostel in the apartment-style area, and include air conditioner. Guests in this area have use of a shared kitchen and living room.

Sant Jordi Hostel is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Sant Pau Metro Station, giving easy access to all parts of the city.

When booking more than 10 beds, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

We are currently experiencing some issues processing payments with cards issued outside of the EEA. In this eventuality, SJH may require additional information about the payment method in order to guarantee the security of transactions and to be able to confirm your reservation.

Descriptions: 6 beds (4 singles, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
In the Sarrià-St. Gervasi district of Barcelona, close to Sants Railway Station, Rent Top Apartments Avenida Diagonal has free WiFi and a washing machine. It is situated 1.4 km from La Pedrera and features a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are equipped with a seating area. At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available around the property.

Casa Batllo is 1.9 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Rent Top Apartments Avenida Diagonal.

Located 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya Square, the air-conditioned apartments at Happy People Plaza España Apartments come with free Wi-Fi. The building has a rooftop chill-out terrace for all guests.

Bright and modern, the apartments feature a lounge with a flat-screen TV, and a kitchen with a dining area and microwave. Both apartments have 2 double rooms, 2 twin rooms and 2 bathrooms. Towels and bed linen are included.

Many restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surrounding area. Hostafrancs Metro Station is 300 metres from the apartments and you can reach Plaza Catalunya in a 10-minute metro ride.

Barcelona Sants Train Station is a 5-minute walk from Happy People Plaza España Apartments and trains to Barcelona Airport leave from there.

Situated opposite Paral·lel Metro Station, Stay Together Barcelona Apartments  offers stylish functional apartments with balconies, well-equipped kitchens and free Wi-Fi. La Rambla is just a 10-minute walk away.

Stay Together Barcelona Apartments are located in a restored corner building dating back to 1900. Each one is spacious and bright, with high ceilings and large windows.

All Stay Together apartments have a living area with an LED TV and 2 modern bathrooms. Kitchen facilities include a microwave, oven, ceramic hob and washing machine.

Various restaurants, cafés and convenience stores can be found directly outside the apartments, while the lively bars of the Raval district are just a 5-minute walk away. Barcelona Port is 800 metres away.

Habitat Apartments Eixample Balconies. Offers accommodation within 1.5 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This apartment features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. It is possible for guests to sit outside and enjoy the property grounds.

At the apartment complex, units come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. All units will provide guests with kitchenware.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Habitat Apartments Eixample Balconies. Include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Stay U-nique Apartments Rambla Catalunya offers air-conditioned apartments in Barcelona with 1 or 2 bedrooms. They are all around 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia Station and 500 metres from La Pedrera. Free WiFi access is available.

Each apartment has a living room with a flat-screen satellite TV. There is a full kitchen with a washing machine, fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided. Some apartments have a balcony.

Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas are a 5-minute walk from the apartments. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

Situated 5-minute walk from Paseo de Gracia and 550 metres from Gaudi’s La Pedrera, Casagrand Luxury Suites offers apartments with free access to a rooftop terrace with a pool and a sauna.

All soundproofed apartments includes, a pillow menu and turndown service. They all have a flat-screen satellite TV in all bedrooms and in the living-dining room; and a bathroom including a bathrobe and free Molton Brown toiletries. Some apartments have a private terrace. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Guests have access to an on-site 24-hour gym and the staff at the reception will provide services and suggestions about surroundings.

A selection of restaurants, cafes and bars can be found in Rambla de Catalunya Boulevard, 200 metres away.

You can reach the Sagrada Familia within 30-minute walk, while the closest metro station is Diagonal Metro Station, 350 metres away.

Gracia Apartments offer various apartments, all located in Barcelona's trendy Gràcia district, 750 metres from Gaudí's iconic Sagrada Família Basilica. These modern, air-conditioned apartments feature free WiFi.

Each apartment has stylish décor with parquet floors, while some apartments have a private terrace. The lounge has a sofa and flat-screen TV, and the kitchen includes an oven, hob, microwave and washing machine. There are 2 bathrooms, one with a bath and the other with a shower. A hairdryer, towels and bed linen are provided. The address of each apartment is provided in the descriptions of each one.

Information about what to see and do in the surrounding area is available, and you can walk to Hospital de Sant Pau, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 7 minutes.

Located 450 metres away, Joanic and Sagrada Família Metro Stations connect you with the rest of the city with ease.

Situated within the Sarrià-St. Gervasi district in Barcelona, Sarriá - Sant Gervasi has air conditioning, a terrace, and city views. With quiet street views, this accommodation provides a balcony. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a lift and free WiFi.

Boasting a DVD player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 3 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a hot tub. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Pedrera is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Sants Railway Station is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Sarriá - Sant Gervasi.

Chic & Basic Zoo is located in El Born, now one of the most fashionable and cosmopolitan districts of central Barcelona. On one side is the Gothic Quarter, to the other is Ciutadella Park, and the port is a few minutes away.

From the hotel, you can easily get to the historic city centre, the Gothic Quarter (Barrio Gótico) where the Cathedral, Santa Maria del Mar, Plaza Sant Jaume and Santa Anna are located.

The hotel is also very close to the zoo, the Ciutadella Park, beaches and the Olympic Port. In the neighborhood you will also find nightlife, bars, restaurants (the area of El Born is where you´ll find the most typical ‘tapas’) and museums, such as the Picasso Museum.

Descriptions: 5 beds (3 singles, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Rambla de Mar Apartments is designed to ensure you have a stay in Barcelona worthy of being remembered with your family or friends.

Newly renovated, well lit and equipped to make you feel at home, in Rambla de Mar you will get an excellent location and the freedom to organize your stay in the Catalan capital as it best suits you.

Let us share more with you: The spacious living room is equipped to spend the day to day with the greatest possible comfort, its kitchen will allow you to prepare from the simplest to the most sophisticated dish thanks to all its equipment, the rooms are designed for maximum relaxation and featuring a total of 2 private bathrooms per apartment.

Each spacious apartment at Rambla de Mar Apartments has free Wi-Fi, and a living room with a sofa bed, a TV and a dining area.

The entire common area is enabled for people with reduced mobility to move around. You will also have a common terrace/solarium for sunbathing.

The building is located next to the Ramblas, the Port Vell, the Palau Güell and the Liceo. The Cathedral and the Barceloneta beach can be reached on foot. The Drassanes stop on metro line 3 is less than a minute away; Plaça Catalunya is 2 metro stops away, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Espanya are 4 stops away and Sants station is 6 stops away (among others).

Check in is from 16:00h and check out is from 09:00h to 11:30h.

We are a Pet Friendly apartment.

Located just 350 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya, the elegant, modern apartments at Habitat Apartments Rambla Deluxe offer free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 250 metres away.

Featuring a stylish décor and large windows overlooking the streets, the apartments include a lounge area with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. Their kitchens are equipped with an oven, microwave and washing machine.

Passeig de Gracia and Rambla Catalunya boulevards offer a wide range of designer brands and fashion shops. There is also a wide range of dining options and bars in the area.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, while Airport Trains stop at Passeig de Gracia Train Station. You can reach the beach in a 10-minute metro ride.

This practical hotel is located 1 streets from Passeig de Gràcia, metres from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló. It offers simple rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The Barcelona City Hotel is situated within easy walking distance of the city’s famous Modernist buildings. These include La Pedrera and the Casa Amatller.

The surrounding streets are full of elegant boutiques and great restaurants. The shopping and touristic centre of La Rambla is a short stroll away.

There are many metro stations and buses near the Barcelona City. The tourist bus also stops on Passeig de Gràcia.

All rooms at the hotel are air conditioned and heated.

Situated on the central, tree-lined Rambla Catalunya, this boutique hotel is set in a stunning 19th-century palace. It maintains authentic features such as Baroque-style columns and colourful ceramic floors.

The chic rooms at the Praktik Rambla feature a minimalist design and come with air conditioning. They also include free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom, decorated with striking green tiles.

The hotel offers a terrace with comfortable sofas where guests can relax. From June to September, free fruit juice is served on the terrace from 16:00 to 20:00 every day.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 200 metres away from the Praktik Rambla. Barcelona’s famous Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away. The hotel is surrounded by restaurants, bars and shops.

This value-for-money hotel is located in central Barcelona, just off La Rambla and next to La Boquería market. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The rooms at Hotel Aneto feature tiled floors and simple décor. Each one has a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Hairdryers are available on request.

There is a wide variety of restaurants in the surrounding area.

Buses to the airport leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 7 minutes’ walk away from the hotel. You can walk to the Palau de la Música Catalana, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 15 minutes.

Boat Accommodations Barcelona offers air-conditioned accommodation in boats located in Port Forum in Barcelona. Private parking is available on site.

Each boat has free WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen, a seating area with sofa and flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower.

Platja del Litoral is less than 1 km from Boat Accommodations Barcelona, while Llevant is a 13-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 21 km from the accommodation.

Hotels: Lodging Apartments Forum 15 - Barcelona Forum apartment with sea view
Descriptions: 5 beds (3 singles, 1 sofa bed, 1 large double)
Full_Descriptions:
Offering a garden and sea view, Lodging Apartments Forum 15 - Barcelona Forum apartment with sea view is located in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Forum Beach and 1.3 km from Llevant. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.7 km from Platja del Litoral.

Featuring a Blu-ray player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 3 bedrooms, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a bidet. The unit is air conditioned and includes a terrace with an outdoor dining area as well as a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The property offers city views.

Port Olimpic is 4.5 km from the apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Lodging Apartments Forum 15 - Barcelona Forum apartment with sea view.

Boasting a terrace, Praktik Èssens is located in Barcelona and is 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The property is set 300 metres from Casa Batllo and 350 metres from Tivoli Theatre. The accommodation features free WiFi and an outdoor terrace, tea and coffee with free pastries corner and happy hour every day from 19:00 hours to 20:00 hours (free wines and snacks).

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom, while certain rooms at Praktik Èssens also feature a seating area. All rooms have a desk.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Praktik Èssens.

Ideally set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, ibis Styles Barcelona Centre is situated less than 1 km from Casa Batllo, a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia and 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Featuring a bar, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and 500 metres from La Pedrera.

All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At ibis Styles Barcelona Centre the rooms come with bed linen and towels.

With staff speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, non-stop advice is available at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sagrada Familia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from ibis Styles Barcelona Centre.

Ramblas Hotel is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, just 500 metres from Port Vell Harbour. It offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony or terrace.

Each bright room at the Hotel Ramblas includes satellite TV, a minibar and a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and toiletries. Some rooms have views over the Ramblas.

The Ramblas Hotel has a lobby bar and a charming café with original Modernista design and a pavement terrace. Breakfast is included in all room rates.

Located at the edge of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, the hotel is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. Liceu Metro Station is just 250 metres away.

Located in the modern Diagonal Mar district of Barcelona, Attica 21 is only 300 metres from the beach. The hotel has a rooftop swimming pool and free Wi-Fi.

The contemporary rooms in Attica 21 Barcelona Mar all have wooden floors and large windows. They include air conditioning and a private bathroom.

Attica 21’s rooftop pool is surrounded by a sun terrace and loungers, with stunning views of the city. In the summer there is also a pool bar. The hotel also offers a coffee bar and tour desk.

The nearest Metro station is Selva de Mar, about 400 metres away. The Fòrum entertainment venue is 15 minutes’ walk away, while the Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre is 5 minutes away. Private parking is available on site at an extra cost.

Just 1 minute's walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Casa Batlló, Casa Consell Apartments offers stylish apartments with free WiFi. Some apartments have a terrace and others balconies.

Each bright apartment at Casa Consell has heating and a fan.

There is a range of cafes, bars and restaurants on the nearby Rambla de Catalunya and on Passeig de Gràcia.

Passeig de Gràcia Metro and Railway Station is less than 100 metres from Casa Consell. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are within 15 minutes’ walk of the property.

These elegant, fully-equipped apartments are located in a new building just 4 minutes’ walk from Fontana metro station. They have a roof terrace with views over the Gracia neighbourhood and free Wi-fi.

Bonavista’s air-conditioned apartments have floor-to-ceiling windows and a modern décor with stone flooring and a neutral colour scheme. The kitchen features a vitroceramic hob, oven, dishwasher and toaster. The bathroom has a shower and includes a heated towel rail and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There are 2 food markets within less than 10 minutes’ walk of Bonavista Apartments. Visitors will also find many shops, bars, cafés and restaurants in Gracia.

Gaudí’s famous creations, such as Parc Güell, Sagrada Família, and La Pedrera are all within less than 20 minutes’ walk of the apartments. The number 39 bus to Barceloneta beach stops on Gran de Gracia, about 5 minutes’ walk away. Private parking is available upon request and at an additional cost.

These stylish apartments close to the Torre Agbar and Glòries Metro station have free Wi-Fi and fully equipped kitchens.

The Barcelona City Apartments offer flexible accommodation for up to 4 people. They have TV and DVD player, and the kitchens have microwave, fridge, hob and washing machine. The apartments also have an iron, towels, and bed linen.

Barcelona City Apartment can be found close to Plaça de les Glòries, a transport hub in Barcelona. You have easy access to several Metro, bus and tram routes. You are only 10 minutes’ walk from the beach.

Located in Barcelona, just a 15-minute walk from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia, U-nique Rosello offer self-catering accommodation with free WiFi. Verdaguer Metro Station is 300 metres away.

These modern, air-conditioned apartment come with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and 1 toilet. Their living rooms include a sofa bed, TV and dining area. The kitchen is equipped with a microwave, coffee machine, kitchenware and electric kettle.

You will find many restaurants in the surrounding streets and the nearest supermarket is 3 minutes’ walk away.

Gaudi’s La Pedrera is 550 metres from U-nique Rosello and a 10-minute walk will take you to Passeig de Gràcia Train Station, with direct trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport.

Descriptions: 5 beds (2 singles, 1 extra-large double, 2 large doubles)
Full_Descriptions:
Located in Barcelona within 1.1 km of La Pedrera and less than 1 km of Sagrada Familia, Habitat Apartments Grace provides accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and a kitchen. The property has city views and is 1.1 km from Casa Batllo and 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from Habitat Apartments Grace, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Centrally located, just 3 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Metro and Train Station, these modern air-conditioned apartments offer 4 or 5 bedrooms. Each apartment features free WiFi and a balcony with garden views.

The spacious living rooms come with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. Private bathrooms have a shower. Each apartment offers a well-equipped kitchen, which includes a dishwasher and washing machine. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Thanks to its central location, you will find lots of shops, bars and restaurants in the immediate area. The famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló buildings on Passeig de Gracia are a 5-minute walk away.

U-nique Calabria offers self-catering apartments in different locations in the Sarriá and Sant Gervasi districts of Barcelona. The staff is multilingual and all buildings have a lift.

Full_Descriptions:

Hotel L’Alguer Nou serves a daily breakfast consisting of a buffet of cold and hot dishes.

Collblanc Metro Station takes you to Barcelona Aiport in 30 minutes. L'Alguer Nou is a 20-minute walk from the campus of Barcelona University. Sants Train Station is a 10-minute bus ride away, and regular bus services stop within 200 metres of the hotel.

Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Parque güell has a terrace and sea views. The property features garden and city views, and is 2.2 km from La Pedrera. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and a shared lounge for guests.

Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Camp Nou, Arya Stadium Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. Hotels: Rooms in the center of Barcelona
Full_Descriptions:

Air-conditioned rooms at Argo feature stylish Minimalist décor in neutral tones. They feature parquet floors, a TV and a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are included.

Duquesa de Cardona has spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and slippers.

The hotel’s restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. During summer, the snack bar serves creative tapas, BBQ dishes and cocktails.

H10 Itaca is within 10 minutes’ walk of Sants Train Station, the AVE High-Speed Railway, Plaza España and the FIRA Exhibition Centre. It features a stylish 700 m² terrace with a plunge pool.

Each bright room at this modern hotel includes free Wi-Fi, a safe, a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a desk. They all have a private bathroom including a hairdryer and Textures Collection amenities.

Barcelona city centre, including Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia, can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro, and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium is just 2 stops away. Sants Station runs local and national rail services, including the airport train and the AVE link to central Madrid.

Hotel H10 Itaca offers a free welcome glass of cava for all guests. The hotel features a smart restaurant serving signature cuisine and you can enjoy a drink in the chic lobby. The relaxing terrace features sofas and comfortable chairs set under parasols, ideal for enjoying a cocktail.

The Itaca also features a fitness room and a sauna. There is a business corner open 24 hours a day. Free national and international newspapers are provided.

Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

At the homestay, units include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. All units will provide guests with kitchenware.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2 km from the homestay, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Alojamiento Diputacion.

Located in a typical Eixample-style building in Barcelona’s Quadrat d’Or, Bonavista Apartments Eixample offers modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Plaza Catalunya Square is 1.5 km away.

All 2-bedroom apartments feature a modern décor with parquet flooring and contemporary furnishings. Each includes a 32-inch flat-screen TV, a washing machine and ironing facilities. The fully-equipped kitchenette includes a kettle, microwave and dishwasher.

Hostal Felipe 2 is located in a Modernista building just off Diagonal Avenue, less than 5 minutes’ walk from Verdaguer Metro Station. This guest house offers free Wi-Fi in all areas.

The Felipe’s rooms have a TV and either a private, or shared bathroom. All rooms are bright and have wooden flooring. The majority of the rooms have air conditioning and heating, and some have a balcony. Bed linen and towels are included.

The property has an area with computers which are available in the afternoon. You can also leave your luggage at reception, and safes are available.

There is a selection of restaurants and shops in the streets surrounding the Felipe 2. The famous Sagrada Familia is just a 10-minute walk away, while Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudí’s La Pedrera are less than 1 km from the apartments.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 20 minutes by Metro, while Sants Railway Station and Nord Bus Station are less than 3 km away.

Offering free Wi-Fi, these modern décor apartments are located in Sant Gervasi District, less than 15 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig the Gracia Avenue and the Modernist buildings.
