Numerous bars and restaurants as well as supermarkets can be found nearby. You can also visit the charming Gracia District, less than 15 minutes’ walk from the apartments.

Muntaner Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments while Diagonal Metro Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Apartments are well connected to the city centre, only 10 minutes away by public transport.

These bright modern apartments each have a furnished terrace with excellent views over the sea or Barcelona’s Hospital de Sant Pau, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Sant Pau Terraces Apartments also come with free Wi-Fi.

Apartments have an integrated heating and cooling system. The living room includes a sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. There is a dining table and a kitchenette with a washing machine, fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and shower.

You will find lots of shops and restaurants along Avenida Gaudi, which starts next to the apartments. You can stroll along this avenue to the Sagrada Familia in 10 minutes. From Sant Pau/Dos de Maig Metro Station, 2 minutes’ walk away, you can reach central Barcelona in 10 minutes.

The One Barcelona GL has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The property is 1.2 km from the city centre and 200 metres from La Pedrera.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms are fitted with a kettle, while some rooms also boast a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. At The One Barcelona GL all rooms come with bed linen and towels.

A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

At the accommodation guests will find facilities including a sauna and a spa and wellness centre.

Speaking Arabic, Catalan, Czech and German at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

Popular points of interest near The One Barcelona GL include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Located in the centre of Barcelona, 1.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, Mr Born provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property is set 700 metres from Cathedral of Barcelona, 200 metres from Santa Maria del Mar and less than 1 km from Plaça Reial. Palau de la Musica Catalana is less than 1 km away and Tivoli Theatre is a 16-minute walk from the apartment.

Located within a 15 minutes’ walk of the University of Barcelona and Plaza Universitat, NiM Eixample 5 offers an air-conditioned apartment with free WiFi. Gaudi’s Casa Batlló is 1 km away.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 2-minute walk of the NiM Eixample.

The apartment is a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Train Station connected to Barcelona El Prat Airport.

Set in the traditional, fishing district of Barceloneta, next to the central city beach. This hotel provides value and practical accommodation, ideal for those travelling on a budget.

After a hearty breakfast, head out along the impressive Barcelona beachfront. Stop for a morning coffee or a bite to eat, next to the waterfront. Here you can spend the day strolling around this charming neighbourhood, or you can walk into the Gothic Quarter, or the popular Born neighbourhood – 5 minutes’ walk away.

This hotel has a small social lounge, where you can sit and read, or chat with friends or fellow guests.

Boasting a terrace and views of quiet street, BcnStop Sant Pau Suites is a recently renovated apartment situated in Barcelona, 3 km from Nova Icaria Beach. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms also boast a balcony. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property.

Sagrada Familia is less than 1 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from BcnStop Sant Pau Suites.

Located in Barcelona, 2.6 km from Barceloneta Beach, 2.7 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 500 metres from Passeig de Gracia, Flateli Llúria provides accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. It is situated 400 metres from Palau de la Musica Catalana and features a lift. The property is 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Flateli Llúria include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Mambo Tango is a backpackers’ hostel located in Barcelona’s Poble Sec district, just 100 metres from Parallel Metro Station. It offers free daily activities and free Wi-Fi access.

Mambo Tango Hostel offers colourful dormitories and private rooms, all with air conditioning, heating and individual lockers.

You can prepare meals in the Mambo Tango’s shared kitchen, or enjoy a film in the TV lounge. The hotel’s free activities include photo exhibitions, music classes and city walks.

Staff can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions, as well as help with ticket reservations and discounts. The property also organizes daily guided walking tours and night tours to bars and nightclubs. The famous Gaudí houses are within 15 minutes’ walk of the hostel.

Situated at the foot of Montjuïc Hill, the hostel is an ideal base for visiting Montjuïc Castle and the Magic Fountains. The lively Raval district is just a 5-minute walk away.

Set the centre of Barcelona, 400 metres from Picasso Museum and Barceloneta Metro Station, Duquesa Suites Barcelona features a year-round outdoor plunge pool, sun terrace and free WiFi. It is housed in a building from the 18th century with the Speciality Monument status.

Rooms at this hotel come with 1 extra large double bed, a sofa bed and a bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and capsule coffee machine.

Please note that the hotel reserves the right to pre-authorise credit cards prior to arrival. When booking more than 3 rooms, different policies and additional charges may apply. Buffet breakfast is served at Hotel Duquesa de Cardona. Local City Tax pending to be paid at Front Desk.

Plaza Reial is 500 metres from Duquesa Suites Barcelona, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Duquesa Suites Barcelona.

Facilities at the MH include 24-hour customer service, and guests are provided with bed linen, towels and basic cleaning materials.The apartments can arrange car hire and provide tourist information.

The apartments are a 2-minute walk from Sagrada Familia Metro Station and 20 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaza de Catalunya is a 15-minute Metro journey from the apartments and Sants Train Station is less than 4 km away.

Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views, Well and Come Hotel is located right beside Verdaguer Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia.

This boutique hotel offers soundproofed rooms with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and laptop safe. There is also a Nespresso coffee machine, kettle and minibar with free water in all rooms.

Rooms have individually controlled air conditioning and heating. They also come with a private bathroom which includes a rain shower, free toiletries, hairdryer and vanity mirror.

Some rooms come with a balcony, terrace or city views.

Hotel Well and Come features a 24-hour reception, a lounge area with a fireplace, an on-site bar and a fitness area.

The famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard is 5 minutes’ walk from Well and Come hotel. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló houses can be reached within a 15-minute walk.

Hotels: Unique premium suite with sunset terrace in Born neighborhood

Guests can benefit from a terrace and an outdoor fireplace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

The Roger de Llúria is a 10-minute walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, on Passeig de Gràcia and around 700 metres from Las Ramblas.

Rooms at the Roger de Lluria are spacious and well-equipped. Each room has a marble bathroom with a bath, bathrobe and hairdryer. There is a daily turn-down service.

The Roger de Lluria offers a transfer service from the airport, at an additional cost. There is also a ticket service and business centre.

A large buffet breakfast is served every morning.  There is also a lounge bar.

Hotels: TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel 4* Sup- Adults Only
Full_Descriptions:
Offering a rooftop pool with a large sun terrace, TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel is located in the heart of the gay district of Barcelona, 2 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The hetero-friendly hotel offers on-site private parking. There is also a  24-hour reception and guests can get information on the gay scene and the city at the on-site tour desk. On the rooftop guests will also find the Sky bar, gym, steam bath and a massage room.

Each room here will provide you with air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. A safety deposit box and a universal phone charger are also provided.

Guests can sample a drink at the rooftop bar, whilst taking in stunning city views or enjoy the delicious cocktails served in the Lounge Bar. A buffet breakfast is available and free high-speed WiFi access is provided throughout.

Staff can give information about the surrounding area, which is known as "Gayxample" because of its lively gay nightlife.

The hotel is 2 minutes' walk from Rocafort Metro Station and Plaça d'Espanya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is a 10-minute walk away. Paral·lel, with bars, restaurants, clubs and theatres is 1.3 km from TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel.

Hotel Gótico is 50 metres from Barcelona’s Jaume I Metro Station and a 2-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers a rooftop terrace, and stylish, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV.

Soundproofed rooms are heated and feature beautiful tiled floors. They have a safe and work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the Gótico hotel café-bar, which features impressive stone arches. Packed lunches can be requested and there are vending machines for drinks and snacks.

There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge. The hotel is just 5 minutes’ walk from La Rambla.

Attractively set in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, HOSTAL BEDMATES is situated 2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach. This 2-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at HOSTAL BEDMATES have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the accommodation rooms come with bed linen and towels.

HOSTAL BEDMATES offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from HOSTAL BEDMATES.

Located in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 10 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and Diagonal Metro Station, Wow Hostel Barcelona offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

Wow Hostel Barcelona offers dormitories and private rooms. Dormitories have shared bathroom facilities. Double and triple rooms can have private or shared bathrooms. There is a TV lounge with a pool table and vending machines.

You will find many bars and restaurants in the surrounding area. Staff can also provide tourist information, a party guide and discounts for night clubs. You can access the hostel 24 hours a day.

You can reach Barcelona city centre in 15 minutes by bus. Private parking is possible 150 metres away.

All rooms are outward-facing, with both views over Pau Claris Street or over the courtyard garden which has Gaudí’s chimneys in the background. All have smart temperature control and high-quality amenities including a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a digital safe box. Some rooms also have spacious terraces.

The on-site El Til•ler Restaurant serves a delicious breakfast with a buffet consisting of natural products and a selection of à la carte dishes. The Lobby Bar also offers light meals and is also an excellent meeting point for a drink.

The beautiful garden retains some former cabins which are located in a courtyard that is typical of the Eixample district; and has a large variety of Mediterranean greenery such as a century-old palm tree, an impressive lime tree and mimosas, which give the hotel’s name. In the garden there is also an elevated swimming pool and a sun lounger area.

From here, there is access to the Las Cocheras meeting room, a former garage with high-ceilings and a capacity up to 100 people.

Ideally located, H10 Casa Mimosa is 10 minutes’ walk from Casa Battló; Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas can be reached within 15 minutes’ walk. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

Enjoying from an ideal location right opposite the sea in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, Serras Barcelona is a 5-star hotel with a rooftop infinity pool and with our Restaurant Informal by our Michelin Starred chef Marc Gascons . Free WiFi access is available.

Set in a historic building where the famous painter Pablo Picasso started his career in 1896, the hotel preserves the building's original façade. Luxurious services like airport pick-up, limousine, concierge and valet parking are standard in this hotel.

All stylish rooms at Serras are air conditioned and soundproofed, featuring a private balcony with views of Barcelona's Port Vell or Mercè Street in the Gothic Quarter. Each comes with state-of-the-art facilities such as a Smart HD TV, wireless sound system and bathrooms with bathrobes and slippers.

Featuring attractive sea views, guests can have a signature cocktail on the stylish lounge in the rooftop terrace, while listening to chill-out music. The mezzanine level in Serras Barcelona features a cosy library with bar, while the restaurant serves Catalan specialities and Mediterranean tapas. The restaurant opens for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

This boutique hotel is 10 minutes' walk from Picasso Museum and Estaciò de França Railway Station. Plaça Reial Square is 650 metres away, and Santa María del Mar Cathedral is 500 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 minutes by car.
